['', "Be a leader in Business Intelligence and Reporting efforts. Mentor and provide input to team members and other analysts to execute on the team's vision, design and execute projects from start-to-finish, inform technical direction, and support reporting of accomplishments.", 'The initial project for this role will be developing a commercial field sales report for deployment through a mobile device. An existing PowerShell app is currently being refined to expand and adapt to the new needs.', '\ufeffRational\xa0is committed to ensuring\xa0all candidates have an equal opportunity to be considered for employment.\xa0Please let us know if you need any reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process.', 'Build collaboration among stakeholders, working across our clients to bring consensus to achieve objectives. Become a sought-out subject matter expert by consistently producing high-quality results.', "7+ years' experience with SQL Server and PowerShell", 'Who you are:', 'Interface with Architects to recommend new technology opportunities that will have an impact on BI systems', 'Experience participating in workstream planning process including inception, technical design, development, testing and delivery of BI solutions.', 'Strong professional experience analyzing business and functional requirements and translating these requirements into robust, scalable, operable solutions.', "Rational is a customer experience (CX) solutions firm that pairs the capabilities of a strategic consultancy with the creativity of a full-service digital agency. We design and activate compelling experiences that create strong connections between people and brands. We put humans at the center of business and partner with our clients to deliver meaningful experiences that help their customers while driving business success. Customer satisfaction at every level is our ultimate metric, and it's what drives our mindset, skillset, and company culture.", 'Adaptable. Change happens at lightning speed;\xa0you are flexible, enjoy challenge, and get behind new ideas\xa0', 'Experience implementing data structures using best practices in data modeling, processes, and technologies.', 'Demonstrated ability in selecting, developing, and applying data modeling tools and processes with proven business utility', 'Proactive', 'Create and maintain documentation(s) for implemented business intelligence processes', 'Creates scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation, and model implementation.', 'Working knowledge of modern large-scale data systems and architectures; ability to manage and manipulate large disparate data sets', 'Support eDW team and Developers to build data warehousing systems for business intelligence, reporting and analytics.', 'Support the development of business intelligence standards to meet business goals.', 'Visionary.\u202fAbility to see "the whole picture" and simultaneously remain slightly obsessed with the details\u202f\xa0', 'Assist in business report generation', 'As an integral member of our report delivery team, the Data Engineer role works closely with customers and BI Analysts to turn data into critical information and knowledge that can be used to make sound business decisions. They provide data that is accurate, congruent and reliable and is easily accessible.', 'Incredible people are our non-negotiable. Our experienced team of consultants spans the globe. We love what we do, and who we do it with – let’s begin our next chapter together.\u202f', 'Knowledge of implementing tools and frameworks for automating report generation, identification of data-quality issues, and data governance.', 'Recommend enhancements and modifications to optimize business intelligence processes.', 'Adaptable', 'Analyze and test new releases/versions of software.', 'What you will do: ', 'Proven experience exploring the data and discovers patterns, meaningful relationships, anomalies, and trends.', 'Works on highly complex and cross-functional BI solutions.', 'Data Lover.\u202fYou know your numbers and value the metrics behind the buyer story.', 'Data Lover.', 'Identify valuable data sources and automate collection processes', 'Experience collecting, analyzing, and sharing data to help business teams drive improvement in key business metrics, customer experience, and business results.', 'Propose solutions and strategies to address operational business challenges', 'Visionary.', 'Collaborative to the Core.', 'Conduct research and makes recommendations on BI products and services.', 'The Data Engineer is responsible for the full life cycle development, implementation, production support, and performance tuning of the Enterprise Data Warehouse, Data Mart, and Business Intelligence Reporting environments, and support the integration of those systems with other applications. They design and implement reporting and analytical solutions, including both the design of table structures and the processes used to populate those structures with data from internal and external sources.\xa0', 'Track and report out on issues and enhancement request for the business in a timely manner.', 'Rational is growing, and we need amazing talent to join our team. If you have an entrepreneurial attitude with a deep spirit of service and killer subject expertise, we want to talk to you. We are always looking for the next great consultant to raise the bar and push Rational to be better than we were yesterday. Staying hungry, curious, and looking forward to what’s next is part of our DNA.', 'Work closely with customers and BI Analysts to create ad hoc reports to support timely business decisions and project work.', 'Snowflake experience is highly-valued, but not required', 'Coordinate with customers, Business Analysts and DW Architects to implement business data reporting and analysis requirements.', 'Ensure adherence to process, policies, and standards', 'Ability to lead the integration efforts for merging BI platforms with enterprise systems and applications.', "Coordinate with customers, Business Analysts and DW Architects to implement business data reporting and analysis requirements.Assist in business report generationSupport eDW team and Developers to build data warehousing systems for business intelligence, reporting and analytics.Assist in data administration, modeling and integration activities using data warehouse systems in the reporting layer.Implement business intelligence solutions to achieve data reporting and analysis goals.Support the development of business intelligence standards to meet business goals.Support Analysts with new data requirements, analysis strategies and reporting mechanisms.Recommend enhancements and modifications to optimize business intelligence processes.Address business intelligence queries and issues in a timely fashion.Create and maintain documentation(s) for implemented business intelligence processesPropose solutions and strategies to address operational business challengesIdentify valuable data sources and automate collection processesBe a leader in Business Intelligence and Reporting efforts. Mentor and provide input to team members and other analysts to execute on the team's vision, design and execute projects from start-to-finish, inform technical direction, and support reporting of accomplishments.Build collaboration among stakeholders, working across our clients to bring consensus to achieve objectives. ['Requirements  ', 'Advanced experience in Python, R, MATLAB, Spark/PySpark, SQL, and other related programming languages ', "Data science consulting is an integral and rapidly growing part of our firm's offerings; we are seeking a talented, self-starting data scientist to help lead our efforts in both business facing data science and machine learning engineering. At Aimpoint Digital, you will have the opportunity to lead customer engagements and make impactful recommendations in a fast and dynamically changing environment.   We are actively considering applicants that are fully remote in addition to our office in Boston, MA. ['', '_________________________', 'The hiring process for this role is managed by Scouted, a job-matching platform focused on early-career talent. In order to be considered, click the ‘Apply’ button. If you have an\xa0urgent\xa0question, email scouted@scouted.io.', 'Please\xa0do\xa0NOT\xa0use InMail. You will not get a response.', 'What will you do?', 'Data is a core part of our business and our data-focused software developers are among our most valued resources. This role is mission-critical, so we’re searching for an uncommonly reliable professional who enjoys coding, working with and analyzing data, and providing support for production systems. In addition to programming and data analysis, this position is likely to involve interaction with external resources such as data providers, brokers, dealers, and software vendors.', 'Applications: experience designing, developing, and maintaining software applications', 'What are you like?', 'System tools: experience with scripting languages (Perl, Python, shell scripts, etc.), and Unix-based operating systems (especially Linux)', 'Vendor interaction: working with external resources to solve problems, acquire data, and improve relationships.', 'Successful candidates will have experience in a number of the following general areas:\xa0', 'Programming: strong experience with Python, Java, SQL, and/or similar languages', 'Large data sets: experience developing programs to parse, process, clean, organize, and analyze large data sets', 'Programming: strong experience with Python, Java, SQL, and/or similar languagesLarge data sets: experience developing programs to parse, process, clean, organize, and analyze large data setsApplications: experience designing, developing, and maintaining software applicationsVendor interaction: working with external resources to solve problems, acquire data, and improve relationships.System tools: experience with scripting languages (Perl, Python, shell scripts, etc.), and Unix-based operating systems (especially Linux)', 'Role Overview', 'For over two decades, our team has built quantitative trading systems that have produced exceptional results across a range of financial markets. We use scientific methods and engineering discipline to solve challenging problems and develop technology solutions. Our Irvine office is as unique as our Southern California location, combining elements of high tech, finance, and applied research in a collegial atmosphere and beautiful workspace.']

['', 'Substantial experience with several of the following: mitochondrial function, energy metabolism, metabolomics and/or isotope tracing (preferably in vitro and in vivo), assessment of mitochondrial and cytoplasmic bioenergetics, microscopy and imaging of subcellular morphology and function, tissue dissection, and culturing / assaying of primary cells or organoids.', 'Cytokinetics is an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Positive can-do attitude, strong organizational and time management skills, attention to detail, and flexibility are required.', 'Please visit our website at: www.cytokinetics.com', 'Prior supervisory experience.', 'Responsibilities', 'Enthusiasm for working in a team-based, multi-disciplinary environment, paired with excellent verbal and written communication skills are required.', ' Ph.D. required in cell biology, biochemistry, or related field preferably with 2-5+ years drug discovery experience in an industry or academic setting. Experience should include hands-on work with drug targets from diverse classes with a focus on cardiovascular or neuromuscular disease; biochemical, cell-based functional assays of soluble or membrane proteins; mechanism of action studies; mammalian protein expression, purification and characterization; mammalian cell culture, immunofluorescence and other assay methods such as proteomics, metabolomics, gene expression profiling and RNA-Seq. Substantial experience with several of the following: mitochondrial function, energy metabolism, metabolomics and/or isotope tracing (preferably in vitro and in vivo), assessment of mitochondrial and cytoplasmic bioenergetics, microscopy and imaging of subcellular morphology and function, tissue dissection, and culturing / assaying of primary cells or organoids. Prior supervisory experience. Positive can-do attitude, strong organizational and time management skills, attention to detail, and flexibility are required. Enthusiasm for working in a team-based, multi-disciplinary environment, paired with excellent verbal and written communication skills are required. ', 'Experience should include hands-on work with drug targets from diverse classes with a focus on cardiovascular or neuromuscular disease; biochemical, cell-based functional assays of soluble or membrane proteins; mechanism of action studies; mammalian protein expression, purification and characterization; mammalian cell culture, immunofluorescence and other assay methods such as proteomics, metabolomics, gene expression profiling and RNA-Seq.', 'Ph.D. required in cell biology, biochemistry, or related field preferably with 2-5+ years drug discovery experience in an industry or academic setting.', 'Qualifications']

Collaborates with analytics and business teams to improve data models that feed business intelligence tools, increasing data accessibility and fostering data-driven decision making across the organization. Implements processes and systems to monitor data quality, ensuring production data is always accurate and available for key stakeholders and business processes that depend on it. Writes unit/integration tests and documents work. Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issues and assist in the resolution of data issues. Works closely with a team of product managers, and analysts. Designs data integrations and data quality framework. Designs and evaluates open source and vendor tools for data lineage. Works closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long term data platform architecture. ', 'Experience with data warehouse services such as Redshift, Snowflake and/or Hive. ']

['', 'Ability to code, experiment and fail fast\xa0', 'Benefits:', 'A breadth of technical aptitude to talk shop to our engineers Ambitious, accountable, and be a self-starter', 'Startup Experience', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0', 'Work with the technical product manager team to review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0', 'Evaluate accuracy of detection methods and propose enhancements as needed\xa0', 'Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0', 'Research and develop new ML models as necessary to meet agreed upon product requirements and goals\xa0', 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'Previous experience in a ML or data scientist role and a track record of building ML or DL models\xa0', 'Solid understanding of the world wide web ecosystem, including protocols (HTTP, DNS), coding (HTML, JS, CSS), issues around privacy…\xa0', '3+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science and analysis\xa0', 'Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0', 'General Requirements:', "Example of this includes: user-agent deprecation and transition to client-hints Google privacy sandbox and privacy budget proposal, Safari's intelligent tracking prevention, Firefox enhanced tracking prevention\xa0", 'Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0', 'We are a fast-growing startup that is disrupting the fraud industry by putting the control back into the hands of digital businesses with an innovative approach that bankrupts the underlying business model of fraudsters. Our fraud and abuse prevention platform combines real-time intelligence, rich analytics and adaptive step-up challenges to progressively diminish the profitability of attacks while adapting to evolving attack patterns. We offer the only fraud solution with a 100% SLA guarantee. The world’s largest brands trust us to protect their customer journey while delivering unrivaled customer experience.', 'A Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, job_title: Quantitative Software Engineer / Data Scientist, 3+ years of experience
job_text: ['', '\ufeffAbout Qtron Investments', 'Partner with portfolio managers to implement your ideas into investment products', 'Identify unique data sets, dive into a diverse set of data domains, visualize and explore underlying data drivers. Write code and run experiments to improve our understanding of how data discover value in equity markets worldwide', 'ResumeCover letterProgramming sample in Python and a brief descriptionU.S. working status', 'Build tools and engines that bring our platforms and models to life', 'Advanced degree in Computer Science or other STEM field3+ years of experience in data analysis or similar roleExcellent programming skills in Python, C++, or similar languagesKnowledge of Python packages such as numpy, matlibplot, and pandasKnowledge of object oriented design, SQL database design, algorithm complexity analysis, Unix, Linux, or equivalentHands-on experience with cloud environments and multi-machine setupsInternships/work experience with financial data. Familiarity with quantitative back-testing, financial modeling, and public equity marketsExperience applying statistical methods (distribution analysis, classification, clustering, etc.) with finance intuition to datasetsCreativity, superior analytical and problem solving skills', 'Application', 'Programming sample in Python and a brief description', 'and include “Quantitative Programmer” in the subject line.\xa0Applications on job websites are not considered.', 'Remain connected to the broader research community by partnering with internal and external collaborators and participate in relevant conferences', 'MUST', 'www.qtroninvestments.com', 'Qtron Investments is looking for creative experts who are interested in building next generation of data services. This opportunity represents an exciting career path in the investment field for computer scientists who wish to disrupt the very core of the investment industry.\xa0We are avid users of the AWS and open source software.', 'Excellent programming skills in Python, C++, or similar languages', 'Tackle the interesting challenge of discovering value hidden in the world’s data through software engineering. Architect, design, and develop software that enables us to scrub and transform financial dataIdentify unique data sets, dive into a diverse set of data domains, visualize and explore underlying data drivers. Write code and run experiments to improve our understanding of how data discover value in equity markets worldwideUse Python to develop investment engines and core infrastructure, from the initial idea to the product, maintain a suite of analysis tools and robust data pipelines Build tools and engines that bring our platforms and models to lifePartner with portfolio managers to implement your ideas into investment productsRemain connected to the broader research community by partnering with internal and external collaborators and participate in relevant conferences', '\ufeffQualifications', 'Knowledge of object oriented design, SQL database design, algorithm complexity analysis, Unix, Linux, or equivalent', 'Hands-on experience with cloud environments and multi-machine setups', 'Creativity, superior analytical and problem solving skills', 'Responsibilities', 'Quantitative Programmer', 'Internships/work experience with financial data. Familiarity with quantitative back-testing, financial modeling, and public equity markets', 'Use Python to develop investment engines and core infrastructure, from the initial idea to the product, maintain a suite of analysis tools and robust data pipelines ', 'Knowledge of Python packages such as numpy, matlibplot, and pandas', 'Advanced degree in Computer Science or other STEM field', '3+ years of experience in data analysis or similar role', 'U.S. working status', 'Founded in 2016, Qtron Investments is a growing quantitative equity manager that serves institutional clients in the Global Equity space.\xa0Innovation and Technology are at the centers of our business.\xa0We seek to harness competitive advantages through creative research, technical knowhow, and investment acumen.\xa0Qtron Investments is looking for professionals with intellectual curiosity, responsibility, and devotion.\xa0For more information, please visit us at www.qtroninvestments.com', 'Tackle the interesting challenge of discovering value hidden in the world’s data through software engineering. Architect, design, and develop software that enables us to scrub and transform financial data', 'Experience applying statistical methods (distribution analysis, classification, clustering, etc.) with finance intuition to datasets', 'Resume', 'Qualified candidates MUST contact hcm@qtroninvestments.com with all of the following', 'Cover letter']

['', 'Manipulate, analyze, assess, and prepare tables and visualizations required for IC EEOD Congressional Budget Justification Book (CBJB) submissions, briefings, and other ad hoc data queries, and', "Five (5) years of relevant analytic experience, including demonstrated advanced ability to use statistical software programs (e.g., SPSS, STATA, Tableau, text analytics, Microsoft excel pivot tables). If a candidate holds a Bachelor's degree, the five (5) years of relevant analytic experience is in addition to the four (4) years of additional analytic work referenced above.", 'Demonstrated ability to develop methodological designs to address research questions.', 'Experience delivering presentations to senior level officials with minimal guidance and on short notice; seasoned facilitation skills; polished oral communication skills that encourage collaboration; and superb written communication skills that require minimal edits.', "On occasion (as directed) represent IC EEOD (with prior approval of the EEOD COTR or designated POC) in IC element and inter-agency engagements (meetings, phone calls, briefings) to facilitate coordination of activities, but not to commit the Government to any course of action. As appropriate, shape the agenda for such meetings to achieve the ODNl's strategic EEOD objectives.", 'Desired:', 'Provide support through responding to inquiries, requests for presentations, assistance in preparing presentations, and ad hoc data meetings during the reporting timeframes of Oct.1-Sept. 30;', 'Required:', 'Position Overview', 'Demonstrated ability to present data analysis and provide innovative solutions.', 'Experience with annual and quarterly congressional reporting requirements.', "A Bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, or other technology-related field with four (4) years of additional analytic work specific to those duties that would be typically required of a data scientist or data methodologist. The Government will not accept Bachelor's degrees in business or the social sciences.", "Master's degree in computer science, information systems, or other technology-related field, an M.B.A or a Master's degree in the social sciences.A Bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, or other technology-related field with four (4) years of additional analytic work specific to those duties that would be typically required of a data scientist or data methodologist. The Government will not accept Bachelor's degrees in business or the social sciences.Five (5) years of relevant analytic experience, including demonstrated advanced ability to use statistical software programs (e.g., SPSS, STATA, Tableau, text analytics, Microsoft excel pivot tables). If a candidate holds a Bachelor's degree, the five (5) years of relevant analytic experience is in addition to the four (4) years of additional analytic work referenced above.Demonstrated ability to develop methodological designs to address research questions.Excellent presentation skills to include data visualizationDemonstrated ability to present data analysis and provide innovative solutions.At least 3 years of experience working in the IC.Experience delivering presentations to senior level officials with minimal guidance and on short notice; seasoned facilitation skills; polished oral communication skills that encourage collaboration; and superb written communication skills that require minimal edits.", 'Excellent presentation skills to include data visualization', 'Collect pertinent workforce data from all 17 IC agencies (including ODNI); track submissions and ensure verification, timeliness, and completion of data collected and establish benchmarks using similar data collected from other federal agencies. ['', 'You have strong written and verbal communication skills in English.', 'We have near-full test coverage on the backend, and are making progress on our frontend and integration tests.', 'You are fluent in SQL and Python.You have experience building and using data infrastructure, including systems like Postgres and Redshift.You’ve used reporting tools like Metabase, Tableau, or Looker in the past.You know that no dataset is ever pristine, but love to interrogate, structure, and clean data.You’ve contributed to extract-transform-load pipelines to collect data from disparate sources and centralize them in a data warehouse.\xa0You feel comfortable managing your time and deciding amongst competing priorities.You have worked with non-engineering teams and are comfortable explaining technical solutions to them.You are passionate about the future of work.You enjoy learning and teaching.You have strong written and verbal communication skills in English.', 'We value sharing our work with the outside world. Our team has\xa0published papers\xa0on forming expert flash teams and machine-mediated worker hierarchies. We’ve baked our research into\xa0Orchestra, the system that coordinates our expert and machine teams, and released Orchestra into open source to contribute our software back to the community.', 'You’ve used reporting tools like Metabase, Tableau, or Looker in the past.', 'You feel comfortable managing your time and deciding amongst competing priorities.', 'We like to move fast and support point-in-time recovery :).', 'You have worked with non-engineering teams and are comfortable explaining technical solutions to them.', 'We build our product on Python/Django and JavaScript/React.We store blobs in Amazon’s S3, munch on them in Amazon’s EC2, develop in Docker, and deploy containers to Amazon’s Elastic Beanstalk.We believe Postgres should be the first system you consider when you think about persisting structured data.We religiously clean and centralize data in Amazon’s Redshift, and are able to answer most any question in SQL. We recently wrote our 1000th query in Metabase!Before building complex statistical machine learning models, we build simple ones we can understand. Rarely, we build complex models.We have near-full test coverage on the backend, and are making progress on our frontend and integration tests.We set up continuous integration and deployment because, while this model comes with its own pains, we’ve disliked being on fixed release schedules on previous projects.We like to move fast and support point-in-time recovery :).', "B12's engineering team views software as a craft, but improving the world as the reason to practice it. Our engineers are responsible for prioritizing, conceptualizing, co-designing, building, testing, and engaging users for any concept we are building out. We’re generalists in encouraging each other to experience the full stack, but we’re also aware of each other’s preferences in the stack. We mentor and teach where we can, both inside and outside of the company.", 'As a Data Engineer, you will', 'You enjoy learning and teaching.', 'We build our product on Python/Django and JavaScript/React.', 'Build rules-based models and statistical machine learning models in Python using packages like scikit-learn.', 'You have experience building and using data infrastructure, including systems like Postgres and Redshift.', 'We religiously clean and centralize data in Amazon’s Redshift, and are able to answer most any question in SQL. ['', 'Work as the lead data strategist to identify compelling patterns and come up with the solutions. Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with the new products. Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models. Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting. Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion. Improve the run- time of existing algorithms. Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms. Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms. ', 'Experience with schema design and data modeling. ', '4+ years of experience in working with relational databases such as MySQL, Postgres etc. ', 'Experience in building data warehouse and data lake. ', 'Improve the run- time of existing algorithms. ', 'Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion. ', 'We are seeking a Lead ML Engineer in our Ads Engineering team, empowering cutting edge mobile advertising technologies to create the next generation of our Ads Platform. ', 'Work as the lead data strategist to identify compelling patterns and come up with the solutions. ', 'Knowledge of advertising platform.', 'Level Up - Your Role With Activision Blizzard Media', '9+ years of hands- on experience in software design and development. ', 'Responsibilities ', 'Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting. ', 'Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP) ', 'Advance level expertise in Java Development. ', 'Bonus points', 'The idea is simple: great game experiences offer great marketing experiences. ', 'Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models. ', "If you want to create amazing user experiences using the latest technologies, then this is the right job for you. You're an excellent communicator, happy to work with people from several different business units. You can translate business needs into technical requirements and implementation. We are problem solvers, constantly reviewing how and why we do things and learning from each other. We are experimental, trying out new tech and ideas and willing to take risks to drive the entire industry forward. We are sociable and fun, and we like to hang out together. We are passionate, some might even say quirky, and while we love what we do, our lives are about more than work. We love games, and are obsessed with creating the best player experience. ", 'Strong understanding of large- scale distributed data processing. ', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience. 9+ years of hands- on experience in software design and development. Advance level expertise in Java Development. 4+ years of experience in working with relational databases such as MySQL, Postgres etc. 4+ years of experience in NoSQL databases like Bigtable, Cassandra, HBase etc. Experience with schema design and data modeling. Strong understanding of large- scale distributed data processing. Experience with developing extract- transform- load (ETL). Experience with distributed messaging systems like Kafka and RabbitMQ Experience with distributed computing framework like Apache Spark and Flink. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Understanding of machine learning concepts and some experience in working with machine Learning libraries. ', 'Game Changer - What You Bring To The Role', 'Experience with developing extract- transform- load (ETL). ', 'Activision Blizzard Media is the gateway for brands to the #1 cross- platform gaming company in the western world, with hundreds of millions of players across over 190 countries. Our legendary portfolio includes iconic mobile game franchises such as Candy Crush™, esports opportunities like the Call of Duty® and Overwatch® Leagues, and some of the top PC and console gaming franchises such as World of Warcraft®, Call of Duty®, and StarCraft®. ', '4+ years of experience in NoSQL databases like Bigtable, Cassandra, HBase etc. ', 'Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms. ['', 'Analyzed, reviewed and translated product management artifacts like product requirements documents and product roadmaps, into actionable engineering requirements documents.', 'Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is required', "Building and deploying large-scale, complex data processing pipelines.Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is requiredPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQueryYou've led planning, launching, optimizing, and refactoring phases of data pipeline platforms.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.", 'Evaluated new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', "You've led planning, launching, optimizing, and refactoring phases of data pipeline platforms.", 'The Life Sciences Product team is looking for a Senior Data Engineer to help us build next generation data pipelines, data infrastructure and databases, and to develop data processing that is scalable, reliable and automated. The ideal candidate has demonstrated experience going from understanding business use cases and whiteboard designs all the way through to the nuances of implementation and rollout. The ideal candidate would have experience with product development and has gone through different phases of product growth and maturity.', 'Collaborated closely with the Product and Program Management team to build out new data features.', 'Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate our data infrastructure and our data pipelines.', 'Collaborated with Data Scientists to implement descriptive, forecasting, and predictive algorithms and models using latest technologies.', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. Komodo Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data processing pipelines.', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'What you bring to Komodo:', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'Designed, developed, and implemented data infrastructure, data pipelines and data processing code for product features.', 'This is an opportunity to help solve complex challenges, and be a part of a team of folks accomplished in diverse Engineering disciplines; focused on using the best of what lies at the forefront of technology and skills to address complex, real-world problems in the Healthcare and Life Science space. Some of the tools we use are: Spark, Snowflake, Airflow, Python, Amazon AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Kubernetes, and Docker.', 'Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery', 'Designed, developed, and implemented data infrastructure, data pipelines and data processing code for product features.Analyzed, reviewed and translated product management artifacts like product requirements documents and product roadmaps, into actionable engineering requirements documents.Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate our data infrastructure and our data pipelines.Evaluated new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborated closely with the Product and Program Management team to build out new data features.Collaborated with Data Scientists to implement descriptive, forecasting, and predictive algorithms and models using latest technologies.', 'Experience with...', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health']

Best known for critically acclaimed franchises including Lineage, Aion, Guild Wars, and Blade & Soul, NCSOFT is also one of the world’s top mobile developers with Lineage 2M occupying the #1 grossing revenue slot on Google Play. Our core goal is making people in this world happier by delivering games that entertain a globally connected audience has remained the same. ['Please apply/send resume for a confidential review, consideration and additional details.', '\uf0b7 Excellent analytical, organizational, written, and verbal communication skills', '\uf0b7 Minimum 2 years of experience in the lifesciences/biotech/healthcare or healthcare investments/finance industry, with experience in venture capital, public investing, basic, clinical, or regulatory roles at a biotech or pharmaceutical company, biotech or pharma business development, investment banking, equity research, or biotech consulting.', '\uf0b7 Know, or be willing to learn, how to evaluate the above data points to generate actionable investment theses', '\uf0b7 A strong passion for biotech investing on both the public and private side', '\uf0b7 Perform technical analysis for both prospective and existing public and private biotech investments', '\uf0b7 Review, synthesize, and present disease pathophysiology, drug mechanism of action, PK/PD, preclinical and clinical data, CMC/regulatory considerations, and prevalence/incidence data for internally-generated reports and presentations', 'Sizable fund in NY seeks Biotech Associate for its expanding investment management team. Primary Responsibilities:', '\uf0b7 Maintain a critical approach to data interpretation, with a focus on independent verification of assumptions', 'Requirements:', '\uf0b7 Ability to take detailed notes in real-time during presentations, company meetings and calls', '\uf0b7 Monitor a variety of data sources to detect changes in fundamental and sentiment changes for portfolio positions, and identify potential risks to current investments', '(exceptional candidates coming from academia may be considered if they can demonstrate a very strong sincere interest for investing)', '\uf0b7 A desire to learn how to synthesize highly complex information, distill it to key questions, generate an investment theses, and test theses objectively', '\uf0b7 An M.D. or Ph.D. in a life sciences field is a plus']

job_title: Senior Research Data Scientist, Run Research Lab
job_text: ['', 'Strong project management and analytical skills.\xa0Detail oriented. Strong organization and time management skills with the ability to work independently are a must.\xa0', 'Proven track record of successfully delivering impactful results to the business and creating innovative data science initiatives that enhance the understanding of human performance that can be applied to products', 'Proven leadership capabilities to supervise a team and lead strategic business objectives.\xa0', 'Liaise with enterprise data and analytics teams to develop, evolve and manage data using defined patterns, frameworks, approaches, standard and guidelines.\xa0Coordinate and conduct application testing (New support packages, releases, functionality and customizing) in close cooperation with the data enterprise team.\xa0Troubleshoot data issues and perform root cause analysis to proactively resolve product and operational issues', 'Manage the Research Data Scientists on your team to execute against their projects and the strategic roadmap at a high level.\xa0Instilling the ability to challenge the status quo, think outside the box, and translate data science findings and concepts into tangible and actionable product advancements.', 'Collaborate with software engineering, product management and other appropriate data owners and key stakeholders including Research, Assessment, Run Sights, Product Creation and IT (Data & Analytics) to define requirements for data and analytics to develop solutions that utilize the highest standards of statistical rigor and data integrity.', '\xa0', '3+ years of experience in managing, mentoring and leading direct reports', 'Manage the Research Data Scientists on your team to execute against their projects and the strategic roadmap at a high level.\xa0Instilling the ability to challenge the status quo, think outside the box, and translate data science findings and concepts into tangible and actionable product advancements.Lead the strategic planning for data science programs and development within the Run Research Lab, working closely with the Senior Managers of the Run Research lab and cross functional leadership to ensure alignment across product initiatives and Data and Analytics servicesManage and evolve Run Research data science initiatives related to human performance and runner perception data that innovate for the runner, collaborating closely with Researchers, Analysts, Developers and Data Analytics Services.Display an expert understanding of data science as it pertains to human movement, runner perception data and the interaction/ application with performance running product.\xa0Collaboratively partner with Data Analytics Services within IT to identify opportunities between software engineering and Run Research, creating prototypes for data science concepts unlike anything else on the market.Manage (including goal setting, performance review, hiring decisions, team culture, etc.) and support the career development of direct reports to ensure job satisfaction, retention and to identify and develop organizational strength.Provide direction, input and leadership in the research, development and management, implementation and deployment of scalable data analytics vision and machine learning solutions across the organization and to direct reports with the ability to teach and guide.Lead the development, management and execution of short and near-term programs critical to the Run Research Lab’s success.\xa0Lead the development and execution of the strategic roadmap.\xa0Partner with leadership on the Data Analytics Services Team with IT, representing the Run Research Lab, providing point of view on key architectural and technical decisions as they apply to Run Research Data, including but not limited to kinetics, kinematics, physiology and runner perception.Lead advancements in data driven decision making for product creation utilizing human performance and subjective perception data as we build for the runner.\xa0Identify new data sources that may bring value to identifying unique attributes of runners related to their running performance and emotional responses to product and the run.\xa0Solve new and hard problems using statistical, Machine Learning, or optimization approaches to create measurable runner facing impact.\xa0Anticipate future data research & methodological opportunities, trends and vulnerabilitiesCollaborate with enterprise and data analytics teams to advance patterns, frameworks, approaches, standards and guidelines for ingestion of human performance and runner perception data.\xa0Decide which data to use to solve problems.\xa0Design experiments leveraging your models to measure effectiveness.Teach, train and present scientific principles related to data science using human movement and runner perception data and their relationship to product performance.\xa0Present to technical and non-technical groups, clearly communicating the Brooks point of view and sharing the learnings and application of findings to our products and the run.Translate prototype models to production quality, scaling to runners around the globe.Clean, prepare and optimize data at scale including interfaces between Brooks and third-party systems to enable real time data preparation and analysis.Collaborate with software engineering, product management and other appropriate data owners and key stakeholders including Research, Assessment, Run Sights, Product Creation and IT (Data & Analytics) to define requirements for data and analytics to develop solutions that utilize the highest standards of statistical rigor and data integrity.Identify data quality gaps and work with the data owners to develop solutions and close gaps.\xa0Participate in on-going service delivery, including documentation and ownership of relevant change control requests including evaluation, test, implementation and verification.Write code or use specialized development tools to create product features, enhance and/ or customize software components.Engage systems owners to filter, size and prioritize business requests and drive towards appropriate decision points.Liaise with enterprise data and analytics teams to develop, evolve and manage data using defined patterns, frameworks, approaches, standard and guidelines.\xa0Coordinate and conduct application testing (New support packages, releases, functionality and customizing) in close cooperation with the data enterprise team.\xa0Troubleshoot data issues and perform root cause analysis to proactively resolve product and operational issuesNetwork with industry leaders and participate in key industry functions to communicate Brook’s point of view to help shape the current thinking of data science using human performance and runner perception data to advance research and product performance.\xa0Maintain expert knowledge of development tools, technologies and related delivery methodsAble to work across matrix organizations to champion the use and application of human data to product and service innovations', 'Sound business judgement with demonstrated ability to balance technical and business needs to make the right decisions about technology, models and methodologies', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills to be able to work with both tech and business leaders.\xa0Ability to communicate a point of view concisely to both technical and non-technical audiences.\xa0', 'Collaborate with enterprise and data analytics teams to advance patterns, frameworks, approaches, standards and guidelines for ingestion of human performance and runner perception data.\xa0Decide which data to use to solve problems.\xa0Design experiments leveraging your models to measure effectiveness.', 'Advanced experience in algorithms, especially in the field of AI and machine learning', '7+ years demonstrated data science experience working collaboratively, with hands on mining and analysis of larger datasets, developing predictive or explanatory models and/or experimentations processes including data synthesis, machine learning, statistical modeling or signal processing, preferably in the lab based setting', 'Experience in teaching, training and presenting scientific principles to technical and non-technical groups to communicate the Brooks point of view to internal and external stakeholders.', 'Expert understanding of anatomy, physiology, biomechanics or running, biomechanical principles and experimental design and statistical methods with and understanding or performance and injury mechanisms for running', 'Manage (including goal setting, performance review, hiring decisions, team culture, etc.) and support the career development of direct reports to ensure job satisfaction, retention and to identify and develop organizational strength.', 'Experience in standard machine-learning and statistical modeling tools and techniques (e.g. Random Forests, LASSO, Logistic Regression)', 'Experience in optimization problems and operations research modeling tools and techniques (e.g. Linear Programming, Search Algorithms)', 'Expert knowledge and experience in use of biomechanics systems, working with human subject data collection for analyzing running/ walking gait. 3D Mocap systems: 3D motion capture, kinematic and kinetic models, EMG, plantar pressure systems (Novel), VO2 max required', 'Please see full job description here: https://jobs.lever.co/brooksrunning/20882df6-30ca-4220-b094-6237b62f2c03', 'Teach, train and present scientific principles related to data science using human movement and runner perception data and their relationship to product performance.\xa0Present to technical and non-technical groups, clearly communicating the Brooks point of view and sharing the learnings and application of findings to our products and the run.', 'Ph.D. in an analytical area such as data science, computer science, statistics, mathematics or applicable engineering fields with a background in biomechanics, kinesiology, engineering, exercise science or an equivalent analytical field plus 5+ years of relevant work experience.', 'Significant experience in programs to prep, blend, analyze and visualize perception data (e.g., MATLAB, Alteryx, Tableau, etc.).', 'Manage and evolve Run Research data science initiatives related to human performance and runner perception data that innovate for the runner, collaborating closely with Researchers, Analysts, Developers and Data Analytics Services.', 'Partner with leadership on the Data Analytics Services Team with IT, representing the Run Research Lab, providing point of view on key architectural and technical decisions as they apply to Run Research Data, including but not limited to kinetics, kinematics, physiology and runner perception.', 'Network with industry leaders and participate in key industry functions to communicate Brook’s point of view to help shape the current thinking of data science using human performance and runner perception data to advance research and product performance.\xa0Maintain expert knowledge of development tools, technologies and related delivery methods', 'Evidence of using relevant statistical measures such as confidence intervals, significance or error measurements, development and evaluation data sets, etc. in data analytics projects', 'Provide direction, input and leadership in the research, development and management, implementation and deployment of scalable data analytics vision and machine learning solutions across the organization and to direct reports with the ability to teach and guide.', 'Lead the development, management and execution of short and near-term programs critical to the Run Research Lab’s success.\xa0Lead the job_title: R&D Lead Data Scientist | Fortune 10 US Healthcare Company
job_text: ['', 'A tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first business', 'You’ll be joining a team of MDs, PhDs, MBAs, and MSc from top tier universities and industries that bring their clinical, technical, and economic experience to bear on some of the toughest targets in healthcare – chronic disease.\xa0', 'Are comfortable acting as a focal point with product development teams in a consultative and scientifically rigorous manner, and juggling multiple ongoing, and competing priorities across a complex stakeholder landscape.', 'Join an unparalleled platform to make a difference in healthcare in the US and beyond!\xa0', 'Have experience (~2 years) leading a team of 2-4 data scientists and are comfortable leading a ‘squad’ of data scientists working across multiple disease areas.', 'R&D Lead Data Scientist | Fortune 10 US Healthcare Company\xa0', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits, and moreA tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first businessAutonomy and end-to-end ownershipOpportunity for fast growth & promotion', 'Have 3 or more years of technical data science leadership, focusing on the application of ML to large datasets for healthcare or similar applications.Have strong (~2 years) consultatory, clinical and commercial stakeholder management, and leadership skills.Have experience (~2 years) leading a team of 2-4 data scientists and are comfortable leading a ‘squad’ of data scientists working across multiple disease areas.MD and/or Ph.D. in a technical field or equivalent practical experience (e.g., Ph.D. in machine learning, computer science, or statistics and modeling heavy engineering field (chemistry and bioengineering)).\xa0Are passionate about helping patients by integrating data science research into application.Are expert in python and/or R, git, bash, and hive/SQL.\xa0Are comfortable acting as a focal point with product development teams in a consultative and scientifically rigorous manner, and juggling multiple ongoing, and competing priorities across a complex stakeholder landscape.An understanding of healthcare claims data.', "Intelletec has teamed up with one of the US's Leading Healthcare firms. They are going through a massive transformation and are looking for a Lead Data Scientist with deep experience working with claims/healthcare data – particularly those that have an understanding of its implications, and it's scientific and/or clinical value. As well as experience architecting and evaluating cutting edge mechanistic and empirical models.", 'Are expert in python and/or R, git, bash, and hive/SQL.\xa0', 'Skills and Qualifications:', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits, and more', 'On offer:', 'Have strong (~2 years) consultatory, clinical and commercial stakeholder management, and leadership skills.', 'Autonomy and end-to-end ownership', 'You must wear a lot of ‘hats’ to make a product work. You excel in translating business and stakeholder needs into data science direction, and vice versa.\xa0', 'Opportunity for fast growth & promotion', 'Are passionate about helping patients by integrating data science research into application.', 'Have 3 or more years of technical data science leadership, focusing on the application of ML to large datasets for healthcare or similar applications.', 'An understanding of healthcare claims data.', 'MD and/or Ph.D. in a technical field or equivalent practical experience (e.g., Ph.D. in machine learning, computer science, or statistics and modeling heavy engineering field (chemistry and bioengineering)).\xa0']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05 Years with a PhD: 5 years experience working with inferential statistics and/or machine learning required. Experience working in healthcare or related field preferred.', 'Texas Health Resources seeks to hire a DATA SCIENTIST LEAD to work Full Time in the Data Integration Department.', '\xa0', 'Salary range is Min. $53.48/hr to Max. $85.73/hr – based on relevant experience ', ' Work Schedule\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Full Time; 1st\xa0Shift-Flexible Schedule (1-2 days a week you will have the option to work from home).', 'The address is ', 'Leads multiple projects in an analytic role, and overcome roadblock in data to get things done. Works with minimal guidance and can manipulating and join data from multiple sources into population set for comparative analysis. To be accomplished using a SQL, or No-SQL tool approach. Partners with senior leadership across the organization to assess need and define business questions. Leads analytic meetings to translate business questions/problems into analytical questions and deliver analytic insights back to the business. Ability to communicate complex methodologies of analytics to a non-technical user. Works with multi-disciplinary or cross functional teams to plan and build efficient scalable models that can be automated for large scale data analyses, development, validation, and implementation. Ability to communicate this plan Deliver actionable insights with data to propose operational or process changes. Identify key driver of desired outcomes both known and unknown at the start of the analysis. Explaining the analysis to key stakeholders. Program or project analysis using statistical techniques to prove or disprove efficacy of the projects, tying in sources from the EMR, Supply Chain, Finance, Patient Experience, and third-party sources. Presentations to upper leadership on findings through graphical displays, and ability to tell the story through data and examples. Write statistical methodology and results for technical reports and publication. Submit for publication insights discovered at THR. Effectively manage diverse assignment with shifting priorities and tight timeframes. Mentor analytic team members to grow their skills and ability. This might include creating training classes on analytic concepts, or leading a monthly journal article review. ', 'Essential Functions:', 'At Texas Health, we strive to create an atmosphere of respect, integrity, compassion and excellence for all who come in contact with us, be they patients or our employees. We are committed to diversity in our workforce, and our mission to serve spreads\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent skills using Tableau, Power BI, Cognos, or equivalent visualization software.', 'Texas Health Resources is one of the largest faith-based, nonprofit health care delivery systems in the United States and the largest in North Texas in terms of patients served.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. Statistics, Engineering, Epidemiology, Health Service Research, Operation Research, Economic, Statistics or equivalent area. Preferred', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor's Degree Statistics, Engineering, Epidemiology, Health Service Research, Operation Research, Economic, Statistics or equivalent area. Required AND", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent skills using SPSS, R, SAS or python.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Able to take on multiple projects concurrently and manage changes in scope along the way.', "The Data Scientist Lead role will be a self-motivated individual, who can inspire others by telling stories with data. The individual will lead and manage other analyst on projects. They will help educate the business on data analysis and drive business decisions through their team's analytic work. Regularly exercising independent judgment and decision making in projects across the entire enterprise of Texas Health Resources. This position manages four people.", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent skills doing data discovery in an EDW or data lake environment. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven track record of building intuitive statistical model that provide actionable insight to business users', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent skills using SQL to query, join tables, and create tables.', 'Skills:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Job Description:', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa07 Years with a Master's degree: 7 years experience working with inferential statistics and/or machine learning required. create software architecture and design solutions to improve customer experience; write, edit, and review technical requirements documentation; and collaborate with product teams to implement and test new features.REQUIREMENTS: REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor’s degree (or foreign equivalent) in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field, and one (1) year of experience utilizing Agile methodologies, Java, Python, and C++ to develop software applications; utilizing Apache Flink and Apache NiFi to design and develop data processing pipelines and frameworks on Amazon Web Services (AWS); utilizing Kafka and Kinesis to access real time data streams; utilizing Elasticsearch to store and retrieve data; ['', '-Prides yourself on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use PySpark)', '-Knows Spark inside and out.\xa0Optimizing Spark code and cluster configuration is second nature.\xa0You can quickly reason about and diagnose unexpected issues.', 'Rapidly growing global data intelligence firm seeks Senior Data Infrastructure Engineer.\xa0The Data Infrastructure is the factory that converts hundreds of sources of raw data on small and medium businesses (SMBs) into actionable intelligence for decision makers to provide credit, insurance and other services to SMBs.\xa0In today’s environment, where millions of SMBs in the United States are struggling, their mission has never been more important. The team synthesizes billions of records from hundreds of different data sources, identifies common businesses in these billions of records (entity resolution) and runs dozens of calculators to extract signal on each business’ growth, health and continuity risk.', '-Is driven to unlock the potential of data to positively impact the real world', '-Constantly questions how things are done and use evidence to convince people to try different approaches', '-Reflexively tests and measures your results', '-You will be building and extending a sophisticated data pipeline with predictive models embedded at multiple stages.\xa0You’ll need to simultaneously balance system reliability, rigorous data quality requirements and an ambitious forward development plan.', 'Entity resolution is a hard problem and they’re continuously tuning our algorithms and experimenting with new methods. Data freshness and accuracy are critical.\xa0We maintain reliability and quality while operating at a large scale. The world is always changing--They’re continuously adding new data sources and calculators to provide better intelligence on SMBs', '-The Data Infrastructure team has solved many problems.\xa0And yet there are more open questions than closed ones.\xa0We love people who bring new ideas and show us how to make our data more powerful.', 'We’re looking for someone who:', '-Thrives on small, focused and highly collaborative teams', 'You will work on:']

['A strong track record of academic achievement — a BA/BS degree at a minimum; a concentration in analytics, statistics, economics, or English is preferred.', 'Twitter', 'Someone who is analytical, articulate, organized, detail-oriented, and self-motivated.', '\xa0', 'At least two years of work experience in the field of research, analytics market research, or consulting.', 'Exempt', 'Help the research team interface with Forrester sales, marketing, and editorial teams.', 'The Researcher plays a key role for the team in delivering our research, client advisory, and consulting, as well as our team’s events and coordination of internal resources. Specific responsibilities include: 1) supporting team initiatives and processes, such as survey management, in-depth background and desk research, and social promotion and 2) working with analysts to produce high-quality reports, presentations, and client advisory across our playbooks and research reports.', 'Instagram', 'We are looking for someone who is self-motivated and can manage own schedule, prioritize the needs of the team, perform quality survey data analysis, produce powerful presentations, and create coherent written arguments. Candidates must display a strong interest in our research content development and support content delivery in partnership with an analyst. Candidates must also demonstrate strong interest in topics such as machine learning, AI, advanced analytics, customer analytics, data management, customer insights, digital intelligence, data science, and other related areas. Some experience in research-based roles in these areas is extremely valuable.', 'Design and conduct interviews and surveys to gain insight into the practices and priorities of senior data and analytics leaders across industries.', 'The Researcher is a critical member of Forrester’s research team that creates, publishes, and delivers research and consulting services to help leaders with their most critical initiatives.', 'Superior communication skills and an excellent command of the English language.', 'Support end-to-end research production processes and work with internal stakeholders to deliver a high-quality report.', 'Assist and partner with analysts in conducting primary and secondary research, analyzing findings, and producing reports and presentations.Design and conduct interviews and surveys to gain insight into the practices and priorities of senior data and analytics leaders across industries.Support end-to-end research production processes and work with internal stakeholders to deliver a high-quality report.Participate in vendor briefings, client inquiries, webinars, and industry events to help the team stay on top of industry trends and best practices.Help the research team interface with Forrester sales, marketing, and editorial teams.', 'The ability to work with a team under tight deadlines and to handle multiple tasks.', 'Glassdoor', 'Forrester Research, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer that is committed to equal employment opportunity for all qualified individuals without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, sex, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, marital status, genetic information, military service, veteran status, or any other status protected by applicable law. Minorities, Women, Individuals with Disabilities, and Veterans are especially encouraged to apply.', 'FLSA Status:', 'A strong track record of academic achievement — a BA/BS degree at a minimum; a concentration in analytics, statistics, economics, or English is preferred.A strong understanding of how enterprise data (customer data, marketing data, and operational data) can be leveraged for business insights using advanced analytics, machine learning, AI, and other technologies.At least two years of work experience in the field of research, analytics market research, or consulting.Superior communication skills and an excellent command of the English language.A track record in report writing.The ability to work with a team under tight deadlines and to handle multiple tasks.The ability to work independently and as part of a global research team.Someone who is analytical, articulate, organized, detail-oriented, and self-motivated.', 'The ability to work independently and as part of a global research team.', 'About This Role:', 'Facebook', 'YouTube', 'Assist and partner with analysts in conducting primary and secondary research, analyzing findings, and producing reports and presentations.', 'A track record in report writing.', 'Participate in vendor briefings, client inquiries, webinars, and industry events to help the team stay on top of industry trends and best practices.', 'LinkedIn', 'It starts with an insatiable curiosity about clients, colleagues, and the future. At Forrester, we believe curiosity powers progress.\u202fForresterites\u202fbring a diversity of opinions and the courage of their convictions to collaborate on the ideas and initiatives that change the course of business. As a trusted advisor to the most influential companies in the world, we live at the nexus of what’s next. Our purpose is to imagine the possibilities of change. Our job is to be bold at work.', 'A strong understanding of how enterprise data (customer data, marketing data, and operational data) can be leveraged for business insights using advanced analytics, machine learning, AI, and other technologies.', 'Explore #ForresterLife on:']

["Botkeeper is an automated bookkeeping solution transforming the accounting industry. ['', 'Develop perception algorithms to detect and identify objects, etc. for autonomous driving systems.', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.\xa0', 'Our team is commercializing a world-class driverless system. The Motional team is behind some of the industry’s largest leaps forward in the last decade, including the first fully-autonomous cross-country drive in the U.S, the launch of the world’s first robotaxi pilot, and operation of the world’s most-established public robotaxi fleet. Strategically formed by Hyundai Motor Group, one of the world’s largest vehicle manufacturers offering smart mobility solutions, and Aptiv, a global technology leader in advanced safety, electrification, and vehicle connectivity, Motional is fundamentally changing how people move through their lives.\xa0', 'Partner with colleagues to design innovative algorithms in motion planning, and control.', "What You'll Bring:", 'Experience with MATLAB.', 'Experience with simulation environments', 'Develop perception algorithms to detect and identify objects, etc. for autonomous driving systems.Collect data and analyze the results of benchmarks, road, and regression tests.Partner with colleagues to design innovative algorithms in motion planning, and control.Integrate perception software into prototype autonomous driving systems.', '5+ years of experience in C++, Python, or other programming languages.', 'Our Principal Research Scientist will play a key role in making the vehicle of the future a reality by developing technologies that deliver a turnkey, fully autonomous driving system for our customers, and enable Mobility on Demand (MoD). As we expand our global footprint, we are looking for exceptional perception engineering talent to research and apply innovative solutions to our products. Do you enjoy working with prototypes? Do you have a knack for developing algorithms to identify objects and occlusions? If the answers are yes, we’re looking for you.', "What You'll Do:", 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to learn.', 'About Us', 'Experience with mathematical modeling.', 'Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Robotics, ECE, Computer Science, or a related field.Experience with Radar, LiDAR, computer vision, sensor fusion, probabilistic perception, point cloud processing, object tracking, data association, optimization, and/or machine learning is a plus.5+ years of experience in C++, Python, or other programming languages.Experience with MATLAB.Experience with mathematical modeling.Experience with simulation environmentsStrong problem-solving skills with the ability to learn.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Flexible and creative thinking.', 'Integrate perception software into prototype autonomous driving systems.', 'Experience with Radar, LiDAR, computer vision, sensor fusion, probabilistic perception, point cloud processing, object tracking, data association, optimization, and/or machine learning is a plus.', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.', 'About Us\xa0', 'Flexible and creative thinking.', 'About this position:', 'Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Robotics, ECE, Computer Science, or a related field.', 'Headquartered in Boston, Motional has operations in the US and Asia. For more information, visit www.Motional.com and follow us on Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.', 'Collect data and analyze the results of benchmarks, road, and regression tests.']

job_title: Staff Machine Learning Engineer - Home Timeline
job_text: ['', " Staff Machine Learning Engineer - Home Timeline Locations San Francisco, Remote USAdditional InformationWe are committed to an inclusive and diverse Twitter. Twitter is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, veteran, genetic information, marital status or any other legally protected status.San Francisco applicants Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.Engineering hiring processStep 1Once your application is received, a recruiter will reach out pending your qualifications are a match for the role.Step 2If your background is a match, you may have 1-2 technical phone interviews or be given the chance to provide a work sample depending on the role.Step 3If the phone interviews go well or your work sample is strong, the final step includes interviews with 5-6 people via a video conference call.ApplicationRead Twitter's Applicant and Candidate Privacy Policy here .U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity information (Completion is voluntary)Voluntary InformationPrivacy and dataStaff Machine Learning Engineer - Home Timeline Locations San Francisco, Remote USAdditional InformationWe are committed to an inclusive and diverse Twitter. Twitter is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, veteran, genetic information, marital status or any other legally protected status.San Francisco applicants Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.What You'll DoAlthough you will work on cutting-edge problems, this position is not a research position. You will participate in the engineering life-cycle at Twitter, including designing distributed systems, writing production code, conducting code reviews and working alongside our infrastructure and reliability teams. You’ll apply data science, machine learning and/or graph analysis techniques to a variety of modeling and relevance problems involving users, their relationships, their tweets and their interests.Twitter's Consumer Product Teams are responsible for core features of twitter.com , which includes Timelines, Tweets, Search, Trends, Recommendations, Notifications, Tweet details/permalink, and more! Our code operates at massive scale and speed, serving billions of requests per day, connecting hundreds of millions of active Twitter users to real-time information about their lives and the world we live in.What You'll DoAlthough you will work on cutting-edge problems, this position is not a research position. You will participate in the engineering life-cycle at Twitter, including designing distributed systems, writing production code, conducting code reviews and working alongside our infrastructure and reliability teams.
