['Title: Scientist I, Translational Sciences', '', '•\xa0Present results at conferences and seminars', 'Benefits', 'Click Therapeutics, Inc. develops and commercializes software as prescription medical treatments for people with unmet medical needs. Through cognitive and neurobehavioral mechanisms, Click’s Digital Therapeutics™ enable change within individuals, and are designed to be used independently or in conjunction with biomedical treatments. The Clickometrics® adaptive data science platform continuously personalizes user experience to optimize engagement and outcomes. Following a groundbreaking clinical trial, Click’s industry-leading smoking cessation program is available nationwide through a wide variety of payers, providers, and employers. Click’s lead prescription program is entering into a multi-center, randomized, controlled, parallel-group, phase III FDA registration trial for the treatment of Major Depressive Disorder in adults. Major pipeline expansion and progression is in process.', '•\xa0Assist in the training of junior team members including research coordinators and interns', '\xa0', '•\xa0Record of scientific publication and presentation', 'Title:', 'Who We Are', '•\xa0Work with Discovery team members to develop prototypes for testing', 'Click Therapeutics is committed to equal opportunity in the terms and conditions of employment for all employees and job applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, gender identity or gender expression, national origin, disability or veteran status. Click Therapeutics also complies with all applicable national, state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment as well as employment eligibility verification requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act. All applicants must have authorization to work for Click Therapeutics in the U.S. In certain circumstances it may be advantageous to Click Therapeutics to support the application(s) for temporary visa classification and/or sponsor applications for permanent residence so that a foreign national colleague can accept or remain in a work assignment in the U. S. For certain classes of temporary visas, the resulting work authorization may be specific to Click Therapeutics and the specific job and/or work site. Click Therapeutics may at its business discretion decide to or refrain from obtaining, maintaining and/or extending the temporary visa status and/or sponsoring a colleague for permanent residency and /or employment eligibility, considering factors such as availability of qualified U.S. workers and the colleague\'s long-term prospects for securing lawful permanent residence, among other reasons. Employment applicants requiring immigration sponsorship must disclose, when initial application for employment is made, whether or not they are legally authorized to work for Click Therapeutics in the U.S. and, if so, whether that authorization permits them to work in the job they seek. In no case should Click Therapeutics support of a colleague\'s temporary visa application or sponsorship of a colleague for permanent residence be construed to guarantee success of that application or amend or otherwise invalidate the "at-will" employment relationship between the colleague and Click Therapeutics.', 'Stock options | Competitive salary with annual review | 401(k) matching | Annual performance-based cash bonus | Comprehensive medical benefits through Aetna | Flexible Spending Accounts | Life insurance and disability benefits | Open vacation policy / unlimited PTO | Generous paid parental leave | Commuter subsidies | Monthly catered lunches | Choice of Mac, Windows, or Linux equipment | Sponsored company events | Free, unlimited office snacks and beverages | Much more…', '•\xa0Experience in representative populations (see Click product pipeline) and with behavioral interventions preferred', '•\xa0Design and conduct exploratory research projects to optimize cognitive and behavioral interventions and related product features', 'Location: TriBeCa, New York City, United States', '•\xa0Ph.D. in Psychology or Neuroscience (Cognitive, Behavioral or Affective focus) or related discipline', '•\xa0Experience executing translational cognitive and behavioral research', '•\xa0Work with Product and Design team members to translate cognitive and behavioral interventions into digital format on Click Therapeutics’ proprietary platform', '•\xa0Conduct data analyses and publish findings in top-tier journals', '•\xa0Maintain familiarity with scientific literature to identify novel mechanisms of action (MOAs) for development and evaluation', '•\xa0Experience in a clinical setting working with patients to deliver cognitive and behavioral therapies', 'Responsibilities', '•\xa0Assist with grant applications, progress reports, and IRB applications', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'About the Role', 'Qualifications', 'Digital Therapeutics', 'This is a highly visible, creative, and agile role within a rapidly growing pre-IPO company in a nascent and fast-growing space. The role will be located in our trendy TriBeCa HQ, includes great benefits, and is an excellent wealth-building/equity opportunity for the right individual.', '•\xa0Experience writing grant applications for early-stage research preferred', 'The Scientist I reports directly to the leading Scientist in the Translational Sciences office and will contribute directly to the development, digitization and optimization of cognitive and neurobehavioral mechanisms of action for Click Therapeutics’ products. The Scientist I will also analyze data collected from past and ongoing projects in innovative ways.\xa0The Scientist I, Translational Sciences will build a program of research focused on advancing the science of deploying cognitive and behavioral interventions digitally in small, early-stage research projects in collaboration with Click’s industry-first Discovery research team. This will involve working closely with Discovery team members to build prototypes and with clinical research staff on project execution. \xa0This role requires regular crossfunctional team interactions, strong interpersonal and writing skills are required. The Scientist I will have opportunities to author publications based on these projects as well as ongoing early-stage Digital Therapeutics research projects, and to contribute to grant applications to secure funding for additional research.', 'Location:', '•\xa0Experience working with patients with Serious Mental Illness (SMI) a plus', '•\xa0Tech savvy with confidence in the transformative potential of software as treatments']

Teamwork – Commitment to the successful achievement of team and organizational goals through a desire to participate with and help other members of the team. Customer Service Focus – Demonstrate a focus on listening to and understanding client/customer needs and then delighting the client/customer by exceeding service and quality expectations. ', 'May have exposure to high noise levels, fumes and bio-hazardous material in the lab environment.', 'Excellent molecular biology lab skills and working knowledge and experience with molecular lab equipment.', 'Ability to sit for extended periods of time.']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Complete client system data reviews including assessment of data structure and quality; make recommendations on how to close gaps identified', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Capable of managing junior resources to develop robust analytics solutions as a team', 'Requirements', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in computer science, mathematics, engineering or related field', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working knowledge of data transformation tools (e.g., Alteryx)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Serve as lead point of contact with the client and be accountable for all matters related to data acquisition, management, transformation, interpretation, and analytics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Teamwork and collaboration', 'To learn more about Axiom Consulting Partners, please visit our website at www.axiomcp.com.', 'Axiom Consulting Partners is a fast-growing management consulting firm, serving clients across a range of industries and geographic locations. We are looking for data and analytics-savvy professionals to join our Chicago-based team of consultants who have proven Data Engineering expertise, experience working with other data analysts and project resources. This role is client-facing and requires managing work, guiding and directing junior resources and participating on internal teams to understand and solve complex problems. ', 'The candidate will be expected to pass a remote assessment on data structure and manipulation using SQL before we bring you in for interview.', 'Valued Skills', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience operationalizing data pipelines to support analytics in a production environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Lead discussions internally around the relationship between different data elements to help the Axiom team build a detailed understanding of the business problem or opportunity ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Problem solving and root cause diagnosis', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Python (preferable) or R', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for learning and track record of keeping up to date on technologies, platforms, and tools', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience applying ML techniques in real world business scenarios', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience communicating directly with clients and addressing business problems through analytics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Production databases (e.g., SQL Server, MongoDB) and related administrative tools (e.g., SQL Management Studio, Navicat)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coursework or qualification in Machine Learning ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0At least two years of experience working on an analytics or data science team ', ' Qualifications & Experiences', ' Nice to have…', 'To apply, please email resume to careers@axiomcp.com.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with Power BI or Tableau to test hypotheses and to create compelling data visualizations that generate new insights or reveal complex relationships between variables', 'Please note:', '\ufeffWe are unable to consider any applicants without US citizenship or a green card.\xa0This position is located in our Chicago office; relocation expected should candidate be selected.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with the Axiom team to develop hypotheses that explain the reason behind business problems or opportunities, and then create the analytical work plan to test them', 'Axiom’s consultants use their skills and experience to develop client solutions that cover strategy development and implementation, strategic and operational planning, business process and organizational design, as well as talent management. As a core member of our team, you would work directly with colleagues at all levels, including our most senior professionals and Partners, to drive the design and implementation of business transformation and growth initiatives.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Business acumen ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Project management', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working knowledge of Azure (AWS also a plus) ', ' Must have experience and be capable of working with…', 'Manager (Data Engineer)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop the data request and manage the process of data gathering (e.g., create highly structured data requests that acquire the right information in the right format)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Complete or oversee data cleaning, integration, and transformation to support analytical efforts ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and present Axiom’s point of view on complex concepts through simple, plain spoken materials ', 'Skills & Capabilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience managing databases in the cloud (AWS also a plus)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Willingness to travel up to 25%', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Business Intelligence tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau)', 'Primary Responsibilities']

['Experience with SQL Server.', 'Expert in DevOps practices and modern CI/CD tools and deployment models.', 'Must have expertise in DataOps techniques and modern cloud computing technologies, most importantly deep familiarity with the Azure stack', '\xa0', 'Expected Outcomes', 'Position Responsibilities', 'Identify, assess, track and mitigate issues and risks at multiple levels within the organization', 'Manual processes around data delivery are identified so that automation can be designed and implemented for greater scalability and organizational efficiency', 'Must have 5+ years of experience building and optimizing data pipelines, architectures and data sets within a cloud computing environment', 'Cloud data pipelines are developed and supported in an efficient fashion to ensure large, complex data sets are effectively maintained and continuously augmented', 'Experience with C#/.NET.', 'Previous work experience partnering with data analytics teams to increase the effectiveness of internal business intelligence systems preferred', 'Superior verbal and written communications skills and history of excellent team collaboration', 'Design, build, operate, and monitor our cloud data pipeline assets using the latest tools and techniques to enable rapid evaluation, deployment, and tuning of schema and data changes. Ensure the data pipeline infrastructure meets non-functional requirements such as scalability, performance, and reliability through effective architecture design and directing performance engineering efforts. Oversee cloud based relational databases and non-relational, time series data collections. Contribute to cross-team efforts requiring compiling data from telemetry, application logging, and application data to identify and investigate anomalous activity. This is a key role on the DevOps team that serves to connect our innovative digital banking product to the distinct business units with reliable, high-quality, insightful data.', 'Infrastructure is configured for optimal extraction, transform and loading of data from a wide variety of external sources', 'B.S. in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or other quantitative field preferred', 'Cloud data pipelines are developed and supported in an efficient fashion to ensure large, complex data sets are effectively maintained and continuously augmentedManual processes around data delivery are identified so that automation can be designed and implemented for greater scalability and organizational efficiencyInfrastructure is configured for optimal extraction, transform and loading of data from a wide variety of external sourcesCloud-based analytics tools will make extensive use of our highly reliable data infrastructure to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, product performance, fraud detection and other key business performance metricsKnowledge sharing is performed across all technology teams to increase business alignment, quality and efficiencyPartners are satisfied with our level of professionalism and technical expertiseIdentify and deliver improvements to the SDLC in general - and the operations experience in particular - to ensure that the status quo is safe, high-quality, rapid releases.Document your work so that others can understand it.', 'Experience Required', 'Knowledge sharing is performed across all technology teams to increase business alignment, quality and efficiency', 'Established in 2015, BankMobile is a division of Customers Bank and America’s largest and fastest growing mobile-first bank offering checking and savings accounts. BankMobile provides an alternative banking experience to the traditional model and is focused on technology, innovation, easy-to-use products and education with the mission of being “customer-obsessed” and creating “customers for life.” The disruptive, multi-partner distribution model, known as “Bank-as-a-Service,” created by the executive team enables BankMobile to acquire customers at higher volumes and substantially lower expense than traditional banks. Its low-cost operating model enables it to provide low-cost banking services to low/middle-income Americans who have been left behind by the high-fee model of “traditional” banks. Today, BankMobile provides its “Bank-as-a-Service” platform to colleges and universities and currently serves nearly two million account-holders at 800 campuses (covering one out of every three students in the U.S.). BankMobile is operating as the digital banking division of Customers Bank, which is a Federal Reserve-regulated and FDIC-insured commercial bank.', 'Document your work so that others can understand it.', 'Must have advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with both relational databases in a query authoring capacity as well as big data technologies such as No SQL and unstructured data store', 'Must have 5+ years of experience building and optimizing data pipelines, architectures and data sets within a cloud computing environmentMust have advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with both relational databases in a query authoring capacity as well as big data technologies such as No SQL and unstructured data storeMust have expertise in DataOps techniques and modern cloud computing technologies, most importantly deep familiarity with the Azure stackPrevious work experience partnering with data analytics teams to increase the effectiveness of internal business intelligence systems preferredStrong attention to detail including precise and effective customer communications and proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneouslySuperior verbal and written communications skills and history of excellent team collaborationB.S. in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or other quantitative field preferred', 'Strong attention to detail including precise and effective customer communications and proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously', 'Partner with the Data Architect to meet the functional needs of business operations, business product management, and disparate technical teams by delivering best-in-class data solutions', 'Identify and deliver improvements to the SDLC in general - and the operations experience in particular - to ensure that the status quo is safe, high-quality, rapid releases.', 'Continuously monitor our business for new opportunities to automate inefficient internal processes around data acquisition and availability', 'Collaborate with business units to help define our data analytics strategy with the goal of building and driving adoption of a new unified business intelligence platform', 'Cloud-based analytics tools will make extensive use of our highly reliable data infrastructure to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, product performance, fraud detection and other key business performance metrics', 'Experience with Azure, or related cloud provider.', 'For more information, please visit www.bankmobile.com. BankMobile, a division of Customers Bank, will provide consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to their race, color, religion, national origin, sex, protected veteran status or disability. BankMobile, a division of Customers Bank. Member FDIC - Equal Housing Lender - All Rights Reserved', 'About BankMobile:', 'Expert in Cloud-native computing (IaaS, PaaS, FaaS).', 'Experience with PowerShell.', 'Experience operating Multi-Tenant SaaS systems.', 'This is a hands-on systems engineering role that focuses on building and deploying data pipelines within our Azure environment with the express purpose of organizing our complex data effectively while ensuring data integrity and securityPartner with the Data Architect to meet the functional needs of business operations, business product management, and disparate technical teams by delivering best-in-class data solutionsCollaborate with business units to help define our data analytics strategy with the goal of building and driving adoption of a new unified business intelligence platformContinuously monitor our business for new opportunities to automate inefficient internal processes around data acquisition and availabilityIdentify, assess, track and mitigate issues and risks at multiple levels within the organizationExpert in Cloud-native computing (IaaS, PaaS, FaaS).Expert in DevOps practices and modern CI/CD tools and deployment models.Experience with Azure, or related cloud provider.Experience with SQL Server.Experience with PowerShell.Experience with C#/.NET.Experience operating Multi-Tenant SaaS systems.', 'Partners are satisfied with our level of professionalism and technical expertise', 'This is a hands-on systems engineering role that focuses on building and deploying data pipelines within our Azure environment with the express purpose of organizing our complex data effectively while ensuring data integrity and security', 'Position Accountability']

job_title: Big Data Engineer- Remote East Coast
job_text: ['', 'Startup experience', 'Python, Spark, Big Data, Data Engineering experience', 'Presales SaaS product experience', '\xa0', "We are partnering with our client to identify a presales engineer / solution architect to drive the presales process, demo to prospects, support POC's and value engineer the product fit for clients.\xa0This is not a professional services role, the sales engineer will be responsible for positioning the product, its features and capabilities based on the prospects current/future state and the product roadmap.", 'Python, Spark, Big Data, Data Engineering experiencePresales SaaS product experienceStartup experience', ' ', "Data Engineering teams are experiencing high pipelines costs, quality issues, time to value issues.\xa0With the amount of people supporting the monetization and pipeline buildout of scalable solutions, often times issues arise with the management and maintenance of their data pipelines.\xa0Our Client is innovating and automating how Data Engineering and Data Science teams mature.\xa0Their SaaS product monitors, alerts and debugs data.\xa0The product hooks into prebuilt pipelines and reduces issues, costs and audits data streams for performance.\xa0Their API's are connected to data pipelines, the data is vacuumed out and ingested into their product, the outcome is a more mature, less costly, quality and scaled data pipeline that is optimized for monetization.", ' Required Skills:', "Our client\xa0is an innovative startup company at the forefront of the new data operations (DataOps) market. The company's mission is to empower organizations to build trusted and reliable data products. They are\xa0helping clients achieve this with a product that provides deep monitoring (observability) over their pipelines and data engineering infrastructure. Having recently closed their series A funding round\xa0with one of the top VCs in the world, they are looking to scale up their team..."]

job_title: Sr. Research Scientist I (Upstream) Process Development – Oceanside, CA
job_text: ['', ' Collaborate with technical operations and biologics production teams to transfer process to and support pilot scale and clinical manufacturing upstream operations.', 'Qualifications/Skills/Experience', ' Review GMP and non-GMP technical documentation (batch records, SOPs, validation protocols and reports; process characterization protocols and reports).', ' Lead aspects of upstream process development and support technology transfer activities for monoclonal antibody, recombinant protein, and novel platform programs.', ' Ph.D. and 0-5 years of experience in a relevant scientific discipline (biology, bioengineering, chemical engineering, biochemical engineering). Excellent communication, technical report writing, and presentation skills and aptitude for creative problem solving. Strong organizational and planning skills. Experience in statistics and data analysis (e.g. JMP, Spotfire). Previous direct management experience is a plus. Working knowledge of Matlab or similar programming language is highly desirable. Familiarity with SQL databases is a plus.', 'For Current Gilead Employees And Contractors', ' Hands-on laboratory operations such as shake flask, bench scale bioreactor, and pilot scale cultures as well as novel culture platforms.', 'Job Description', 'For Jobs In The United States', ' Participate in cross-functional CMC teams.', 'Key Responsibilities', ' Support internal and external manufacturing, including travel to sites (10%).', ' Excellent communication, technical report writing, and presentation skills and aptitude for creative problem solving.', ' Manage direct reports and mentor junior group members while working in a flexible resourcing environment.', ' Previous direct management experience is a plus.', 'Sr. Research Scientist I, Process Development – Oceanside, CA', ' Strong organizational and planning skills.', ' Contribute to written technical reports, present in group meetings, and work cross-functionally to achieve common goals.', ' Ph.D. and 0-5 years of experience in a relevant scientific discipline (biology, bioengineering, chemical engineering, biochemical engineering).', ' Lead aspects of upstream process development and support technology transfer activities for monoclonal antibody, recombinant protein, and novel platform programs. Review GMP and non-GMP technical documentation (batch records, SOPs, validation protocols and reports; process characterization protocols and reports). Participate in cross-functional CMC teams. Support upstream bioprocess development activities including clone selection, technology development, media development, process optimization, and process characterization studies. Hands-on laboratory operations such as shake flask, bench scale bioreactor, and pilot scale cultures as well as novel culture platforms. Collaborate with technical operations and biologics production teams to transfer process to and support pilot scale and clinical manufacturing upstream operations. Contribute to written technical reports, present in group meetings, and work cross-functionally to achieve common goals. Manage direct reports and mentor junior group members while working in a flexible resourcing environment. Support internal and external manufacturing, including travel to sites (10%).', ' Experience in statistics and data analysis (e.g. JMP, Spotfire).', ' Working knowledge of Matlab or similar programming language is highly desirable.', ' Familiarity with SQL databases is a plus.', ' Support upstream bioprocess development activities including clone selection, technology development, media development, process optimization, and process characterization studies.']

['', 'Familiarity with relational databases and SQL a plus.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Math, Computer Science, Statistics, Finance or another relevant field.', 'Provide pricing benchmarks for quote requests submitted by TSMs.', ' Develop models to set pricing benchmarks by product type and locations as well as to illustrate price/margin performance and areas for opportunity. Partner with IT to maintain and update the product category information at the SKU level in the EDW. Use Alteryx data management software to update the pricing tools each week. Create templates to report on KPIs as well as the financial and volume impact of pricing actions. Assist with calculating unit costs by product type and location for the reconditioning segment for use in identifying low-margin customers. Partner with Territory Sales Managers (Territory Sales Managers) to gain an understanding of each market’s competitive landscape, seasonal trends, raw material sourcing capacity, and plant utilization. Provide pricing benchmarks for quote requests submitted by TSMs. Assist with ad hoc requests and other duties as assigned. ['', 'Partner with the Data Science and Engineering teams to define and improve best practices over data and information modeling, data structures, and technologies', 'We are energized by the opportunity of identifying and placing top Executive talent.', 'Design the overall data architecture of the products and platforms with the help of the team', 'We like working with organizations that are positive, adaptable and growth-minded.', 'Experience architecting data warehouses and/or data lake with big data technologies such as Spark, Python, and Kafka', 'Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Statistics or Mathematics', 'As a Principal Data Engineer, you will be responsible for driving the discovery, design, and execution of a wide variety of data solutions. In this role, you will provide leadership, strategic decision making, and guidance within technical disciplines, responding to disruptive big data technologies and solving unique problems.', 'Partner with the Security and DevOps teams to define security practices, provide software upgrades for platforms, and integrate those across the portfolio based on required data security and flow needs', 'We care how work gets accomplished and are deeply invested in the success of our clients and their Executive Professionals.', 'As we continue to grow and deepen our impact on organizations around the world, we are looking for the right people to place in key executive roles. If you are interested in finding the best opportunity on your career path, there are a few things you should know about RGP:', 'We are energized by the opportunity of identifying and placing top Executive talent.We like working with organizations that are positive, adaptable and growth-minded.We care how work gets accomplished and are deeply invested in the success of our clients and their Executive Professionals.', 'If this sounds like you, we invite you to read on and learn more.\xa0THE RGP EXECUTIVE SEARCH EXPERIENCEAt RGP, we’re deeply invested in identifying your strengths as an Executive Professional. We understand it’s not simply about finding a position – it’s about your career objectives, goals and aspirations. In other words, it’s about you.\xa0PURPOSE OF THE ROLE', 'ATTRIBUTES OF PROFESSIONALS IN THIS ROLE', 'Equal Opportunity EmployerRGP is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, gender, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic information or veteran status, and encourage all applicants to apply.', 'DESIRED EXPERIENCE AND REQUIREMENTS', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills\xa0', 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE ROLE', 'Mentor and coach the Data Engineering teams', 'THE RGP EXECUTIVE SEARCH EXPERIENCE', 'Foster a culture of sharing, re-use, design for scale stability, and operational efficiency of data and analytical solutions', 'Partner with the Data Science and Engineering teams to define and improve best practices over data and information modeling, data structures, and technologiesMentor and coach the Data Engineering teamsDesign the overall data architecture of the products and platforms with the help of the teamPartner with the Security and DevOps teams to define security practices, provide software upgrades for platforms, and integrate those across the portfolio based on required data security and flow needsFoster a culture of sharing, re-use, design for scale stability, and operational efficiency of data and analytical solutions', 'Our Executive Recruiters have established relationships with many of the best and brightest professionals in the industry. Based on our unique approach to recruiting and expertise in assessing opportunities and talent, we have the ability to expose you to the top career opportunities on the market.', 'PURPOSE OF THE ROLE', 'RGP is a global Consulting and Executive Search firm helping some of the most recognized companies in the world work differently. Whether it’s a position in Accounting, Finance, Audit, Tax, Technology, Human Resources or Supply Chain, we understand the challenges in finding the next opportunity on your career path. We will connect you to opportunities that matter, putting your expertise to best use while developing skills for the future.\xa0', 'Hands on experience devising Data Engineering best practices, deliverables, drawings, and frameworks', 'Strong analytical skills\xa0', '5+ years of experience as a Principal Data Engineer or Senior Data Architect', 'Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Statistics or Mathematics5+ years of experience as a Principal Data Engineer or Senior Data ArchitectExperience architecting data warehouses and/or data lake with big data technologies such as Spark, Python, and KafkaHands on experience devising Data Engineering best practices, deliverables, drawings, and frameworks', 'Detail oriented\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills\xa0Strong analytical skills\xa0Detail oriented\xa0']

['', 'Work with various analytical methods including cleaning verification, assay and impurities, dissolution, residual solvents for raw materials, in-process samples or finished products testing.', 'Join the global drug development and delivery leader and help us bring over 7,000 life-saving and life-enhancing products to patients around the world. Catalent is an exciting and growing international company where employees work directly with pharma, biopharma and consumer health companies of all sizes to advance new medicines from early development to clinical trials and to the market. Catalent produces more than 70 billion doses per year, and each one will be used by someone who is counting on us. Join us in making a difference. ', 'Provide training to QC analysts after methods are validated/transferred/verified. job_title: Data Engineer with Google Cloud Platform

job_text: ['', 'Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and stability of data collection, storage, and retrieval processes for our core systems.Create and manage platform-specific APIs.Create new data processing systems as necessary to support our Data Scientists and Research Analysts.Ultimately, build robust, high-volume production software.', 'Ultimately, build robust, high-volume production software.', 'Excellent problem solving skills. Ability to interpret and analyze data is a must. Consequently, mathematical inclination is a major plus.', 'Solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design.', 'Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and stability of data collection, storage, and retrieval processes for our core systems.', 'Strong command of a programming language or two – while we code primarily in Python, we acknowledge that engineers with sound fundamentals can pick up new languages relatively quickly.', '3+ years of professional development experience building high-performance, large-scale applications/pipelines.', 'Responsibilities', 'Help us transform the TV viewing experience for everyone!', 'At Samba TV, we are on a mission to fundamentally change television viewing for everyone. We are doing this by leveraging our data to enable advertisers to engage and measure TV viewers across all their devices. We have an amazing story with a unique perspective formed by innovative technology.', 'Requirements', 'Create new data processing systems as necessary to support our Data Scientists and Research Analysts.', 'Strong command of a programming language or two – while we code primarily in Python, we acknowledge that engineers with sound fundamentals can pick up new languages relatively quickly.Excellent problem solving skills. Ability to interpret and analyze data is a must. Consequently, mathematical inclination is a major plus.3+ years of professional development experience building high-performance, large-scale applications/pipelines.Solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design.Experience with Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies is desirable.Experience with running production systems on AWS is also a plus.', 'Experience with Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies is desirable.', 'Create and manage platform-specific APIs.', 'Experience with running production systems on AWS is also a plus.']

['', "Independently leads data analysis and modeling projects from project/sample design, business review meetings with internal and external clients deriving requirements/deliverables, reception and processing of data, performing analyses and modeling to final reports/presentations, communication of results and sales support.Leads the group responsible for insurance application and claim fraud and other point-of-quote/bind solutions for auto and property lines. Explores internal and external data to create innovative new products to be implemented at a variety of insurance carriers.Functions as an insurance analytics expert on meetings with customers (insurance companies) and partner companies.Manages staff including goal setting, performance evaluation, effective resource allocation and career/skill development, hiring and training.Utilizes advanced statistical techniques to create high-performing predictive models and creative analyses to address business objectives and client needs.Proactively and effectively communicates in various verbal and written formats with internal stakeholders on product design, data specification, model implementations, with partners on collaboration ideas and specifics, with clients and account teams on project/test results, opportunities, questions. Resolves problems and removes obstacles to timely and high-quality project completion.Actively contributes to insurance analytics strategy by contributing ideas, preparing presentation/sales material for customers, and product design/business case materials for TransUnion leadership.Follows industry trends in insurance and related data/analytics businesses. Contributes ideas and actively participates in the investigation and research of new processes, resources and technologies that can potentially be implemented to provide improved customer solutions or to broaden TransUnion's analytic consulting and related services capabilities.Assures compliance with regulatory and privacy requirements during design and implementation of modeling and analysis projects.Travels to client and partner meetings as needed.", 'Expertise in statistical modeling techniques such as linear regression, logistic regression, GLM, GAM, GBM, tree models (CART, MART, CHAID), cluster analysis, principal components, and feature creation and validation.', 'Utilizes advanced statistical techniques to create high-performing predictive models and creative analyses to address business objectives and client needs.', 'Functions as an insurance analytics expert on meetings with customers (insurance companies) and partner companies.', "What You'll Bring:", "Follows industry trends in insurance and related data/analytics businesses. Contributes ideas and actively participates in the investigation and research of new processes, resources and technologies that can potentially be implemented to provide improved customer solutions or to broaden TransUnion's analytic consulting and related services capabilities.", "A graduate degree in a STEM field with advanced coursework in statistics and machine learning or Associateship/Fellowship in the Casualty Actuarial Society.8+ years of experience with statistical modeling and data mining using large and complex datasets. Experience with personal lines and commercial lines rating plan modeling is a strong plus. Knowledge of credit attributes is preferred but not required.Deep professional expertise in one or more subject-matter areas or technical disciplines that would complement and significantly enhance TransUnion’s existing analytic capabilities. A consistent record of applying this expertise to drive positive outcomes, and a passion for sharing it with colleagues and business partners.3+ years of people management experience. Ability to effectively manage own and associates' time while multitasking between multiple projects in a dynamic business environment with a variety of internal stakeholders, partners and customers.Strong verbal and written communications skills, listening and teamwork skills, and effective presentation skills. This is absolutely essential since you will have a lot of exposure to different internal groups (data, IT, product and sales) as well as third-party partners and customers (insurance companies).Executive presence on high-level meetings. Credible functional expertise in P&C insurance and predictive analytics.Expertise in statistical modeling techniques such as linear regression, logistic regression, GLM, GAM, GBM, tree models (CART, MART, CHAID), cluster analysis, principal components, and feature creation and validation.Programming experience with SAS (STAT, macros, EM) and other statistical software (R, Python, SPSS, Matlab). Emblem experience is a plus.Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).Ability to travel 10-20%.", "TransUnion's Internal Job Title", 'Strong verbal and written communications skills, listening and teamwork skills, and effective presentation skills. This is absolutely essential since you will have a lot of exposure to different internal groups (data, IT, product and sales) as well as third-party partners and customers (insurance companies).', 'Actively contributes to insurance analytics strategy by contributing ideas, preparing presentation/sales material for customers, and product design/business case materials for TransUnion leadership.', "What We'll Bring:", "3+ years of people management experience. Ability to effectively manage own and associates' time while multitasking between multiple projects in a dynamic business environment with a variety of internal stakeholders, partners and customers.", 'Assures compliance with regulatory and privacy requirements during design and implementation of modeling and analysis projects.', "What We'll Bring", 'Independently leads data analysis and modeling projects from project/sample design, business review meetings with internal and external clients deriving requirements/deliverables, reception and processing of data, performing analyses and modeling to final reports/presentations, communication of results and sales support.', 'Programming experience with SAS (STAT, macros, EM) and other statistical software (R, Python, SPSS, Matlab). Emblem experience is a plus.', "Impact You'll Make", 'Proactively and effectively communicates in various verbal and written formats with internal stakeholders on product design, data specification, model implementations, with partners on collaboration ideas and specifics, with clients and account teams on project/test results, opportunities, questions. Resolves problems and removes obstacles to timely and high-quality project completion.', 'Executive presence on high-level meetings. Credible functional expertise in P&C insurance and predictive analytics.', 'Travels to client and partner meetings as needed.', 'Deep professional expertise in one or more subject-matter areas or technical disciplines that would complement and significantly enhance TransUnion’s existing analytic capabilities. A consistent record of applying this expertise to drive positive outcomes, and a passion for sharing it with colleagues and business partners.', 'Leads the group responsible for insurance application and claim fraud and other point-of-quote/bind solutions for auto and property lines. Explores internal and external data to create innovative new products to be implemented at a variety of insurance carriers.', 'A graduate degree in a STEM field with advanced coursework in statistics and machine learning or Associateship/Fellowship in the Casualty Actuarial Society.', '8+ years of experience with statistical modeling and data mining using large and complex datasets. Experience with personal lines and commercial lines rating plan modeling is a strong plus. Knowledge of credit attributes is preferred but not required.', 'Ability to travel 10-20%.', "What You'll Bring", 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).', 'Manages staff including goal setting, performance evaluation, effective resource allocation and career/skill development, hiring and training.']

At Sigma, we are building a cloud-native business intelligence platform that anyone can use -- no programming required.\xa0', 'Ability to execute a range of research methodologies, especially usability testing and concept testing', 'Desired Experience and Skills:', 'Creativity, flexibility, and a desire to really help our customers use Sigma', 'Do more generative and evaluative research', 'Excellent communication and presentation skills', 'Understand our customers more deeply', 'Understand our customers more deeplyDo more research and testing earlier in the product development cycleDo more generative and evaluative researchIncrease volume and speed of usability testingExpand how we can help other departments utilize qualitative and quantitative research findings for their own initiatives', 'Use methodologies such as contextual inquiry, user journey mapping, usability tests, quantitative surveys, concept testing, qualitative interviews, and more\xa0', 'Do quick and dirty research efforts or mini-studies. with qualitative and quantitative data collection and analysis', 'Excellent at planning and executing UX research studies, from defining scope to documenting learnings', 'Collaborate with Product Few business tools of any power have been truly easy for non-technical users to pick up. And that’s true in BI, but we’re going to change that. Our Research & Insights team has already uncovered keys for doing just that and we’re looking for a UX Researcher to help us get there.\xa0', 'Experience doing UX research for SaaS business tools or products with similarly complex workflows', 'One of our goals is to move research further upstream in the product development lifecycle, so our team can more readily identify what to build and how to build it (rather than just test what was already built). job_title: Research Scientist - AAV Upstream Process Development
job_text: ['', 'At UCB, we strive to attract passionate and outstanding talents who thrive on change and are ready to bring real value to patients. Working for us you’ll discover a place where you can grow and express your full potential. We place an emphasis on innovation, collaboration and impact. Through meaningful recognition and a motivating work atmosphere, we aim to provide an optimal experience by caring about and valuing our employees – just as we do for the patients we serve.', 'With a team of approximately 7,500 employees and operations in more than 40 countries, we are a global biopharmaceutical company investing more than a quarter of our revenue in cutting-edge scientific research. We are focused on addressing chronic, neurological, immunological, and bone diseases.', 'Major Accountabilities/Responsibilities:', 'At UCB, we put our heart, soul, and skills into making a difference for people living with severe disease. Working together to push the boundaries, we blend the best of our talents to unlock innovation.\xa0Will you join us in our pioneering adventure?', 'Research Scientist – AAV Upstream Process Development.', '\xa0', 'Collects and visualizes online and offline data from bioreactors, BGA, metabolite analyzers to monitor process performance and report deviations', 'If you believe you are the perfect match to join us on our pioneering adventure, then we invite you to apply and tell us more about your profile and motivation.', 'Why you should apply', 'Responsible for maintenance and calibration of laboratory instruments and management of reagents and chemicals inventory', 'Experience in process modeling tools is a plus', 'Interested? For this position you’ll need the following\xa0education, experience\xa0and\xa0skills:', 'UCB- Inspired by Patients. Driven by Science. Everything we do starts with a simple question: “How will this create value for people living with severe diseases?” By putting patients at the heart of what we do, our approach – from discovery to development to delivery – is continuously transformed and designed around patient needs and their journey.', 'Curious to know more? Please visit: https://careers.ucb.com/job/Boston-Research-Scientist-AAV-Upstream-Process-Development-Mass/619384801/', "Help us transform patients' lives.", 'As a\xa0Research Scientist\xa0\xa0you will contribute to multiple therapeutic gene therapy programs by supporting AAV upstream platform process development and enhancement. You will investigate bioreactor parameters to streamline process scale up from bench-scale to pilot-scale bioreactors.\xa0\xa0', 'Good understanding of scaling up considerations', 'About us.', 'Designs and executes bioreactor or shake flask studies to develop AAV upstream processes', 'Ability to function independently and communicate cross functionally across various UCB teams.', 'UCB and its subsidiaries encourage diversity and inclusion in the workplace; we are an Equal Opportunity Employer.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s DegreeExperience in upstream process development and bioreactor operation for AAV (1-3 years) or biologics (3+ years)Good understanding of scaling up considerationsExperience in process modeling tools is a plus', '\ufeff', 'Gene Therapy Vector Core Team,', 'Research Scientist\xa0', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum Qualifications:', 'To strengthen our\xa0Gene Therapy Vector Core Team,\xa0based in our\xa0Boston Office,\xa0in\xa0Bedford MA,\xa0we are looking for a talented individual to fill the position of:\xa0Research Scientist – AAV Upstream Process Development.', 'Bachelor’s Degree', 'Bedford MA,', 'Contributes to development of scale up strategy by analyzing in-house data, literature research, and communicating with external vendors to bring in new technologies', 'Designs and executes bioreactor or shake flask studies to develop AAV upstream processesContributes to development of scale up strategy by analyzing in-house data, literature research, and communicating with external vendors to bring in new technologiesCollects and visualizes online and offline data from bioreactors, BGA, metabolite analyzers to monitor process performance and report deviationsResponsible for maintenance and calibration of laboratory instruments and management of reagents and chemicals inventoryAbility to function independently and communicate cross functionally across various UCB teams.Ability to manage priorities, and engage/communicate in a multidisciplinary environment', 'Boston Office,\xa0', 'Experience in upstream process development and bioreactor operation for AAV (1-3 years) or biologics (3+ years)', 'Ability to manage priorities, and engage/communicate in a multidisciplinary environment']

['', 'Drive sales and marketing activities within assigned states', 'Would you be interested to work for a private, dynamic, entrepreneurial company?', 'Some of the things you will be involved in:', 'Who might have this background? Perhaps an actuarial pricing analyst who no longer wishes to take the exams, a very commercially astute statistician/data scientist who wants a more "front office role", a product analyst or junior product manager wanting a step up or perhaps an underwriter who is very statistically minded.', 'Our client is looking to recruit a Product Manager and would love a candidate with previous P&C insurance experience (ideally personal lines, but commercial lines would be ok too). This is a position that will involve significant autonomy and will be responsible for all development, pricing, rollout, and management of products within a group of assigned states.\xa0This role is also responsible for underwriting profitability and controlled premium growth based on annual objectives.', 'Responsible for ongoing modifications to forms, agency manuals, product announcements, etc.', 'Develop and manage strategies to open, penetrate or expand markets for non-standard auto product', 'Are you a highly driven and motivated insurance professional?', 'Interact and influence external constituents such as agents, regulators and vendors', 'Do you have a good sense of what is "good business" - in other words commercial acumen?', 'Consult on corporate objectives and resolve business problems associated with state programs', 'Ensure compliance with state laws and regulations relative to rate, rule and form filings', 'Do you have some experience of the P&C industry (ideally personal lines)?', 'Obtain regulatory approval for filings', 'Interact with and influence all areas of organization including IT, Claims, Underwriting, Executive and Marketing to implement new products or product revisions', 'The base salary will be very competitive (likely range $100-130k) with a 20% cash bonus. The salary and bonus offered will be on the basis of the quality of experience that the candidate brings to the table. Please note that we are also looking for a Senior Product Manager (range $130-$150k) with c 30% cash bonus. You only need to apply once and we will evaluate what role you are best suited to.', 'Responsible for all aspects of implementation, including state filings and interaction with third party vendors', 'Extraction and analysis of statistical data for decision-making purposes', 'Responsible for policy form and endorsement construction and ancillary form construction (cancellation notices, applications for insurance, etc.)', 'If the answer to the above is yes, we would be interested to see your application. Our client is a holding company that underwrites and distributes primarily non-standard personal automobile insurance products to individuals in Southern US. They offer coverage that is typically provided to insureds who are unable to obtain standard insurance because of their payment history, driving record, age, vehicle type, or other factors. These policies generally require higher premiums than standard policies for comparable coverage. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are currently licenced to write auto insurance in 24 states and active in 10.', 'We are NOT looking for an actuary, a machine learning data scientist etc. This is a product manager role, not an actuarial pricing role. A diligent, conscientous insurance professional with good solid spreadsheet skills and perhaps a BI tool and/or SAS/R would be more than enough. What matters is that you can get things done, you spot opportunities and you work well with colleagues. ', 'Determine profitable and salable price levels and program construction for given states', "Do you have good GENERAL analytical skills (perhaps you've used SAS, R or Python, or a business intelligence tool such as Tableau)?", 'Develop and manage strategies to open, penetrate or expand markets for non-standard auto productDetermine profitable and salable price levels and program construction for given statesExtraction and analysis of statistical data for decision-making purposesIdentify product issues and opportunities and perform and / or oversee the analytical work necessary to complete national, group, state, or product level analysesConsult on corporate objectives and resolve business problems associated with state programsDrive sales and marketing activities within assigned statesEnsure compliance with state laws and regulations relative to rate, rule and form filingsObtain regulatory approval for filingsResponsible for policy form and endorsement construction and ancillary form construction (cancellation notices, applications for insurance, etc.)Responsible for ongoing modifications to forms, agency manuals, product announcements, etc.Interact with and influence all areas of organization including IT, Claims, Underwriting, Executive and Marketing to implement new products or product revisionsResponsible for all aspects of implementation, including state filings and interaction with third party vendorsInteract and influence external constituents such as agents, regulators and vendors', 'Identify product issues and opportunities and perform and / or oversee the analytical work necessary to complete national, group, state, or product level analyses', 'The role will be remote/WFH until covid-19 has been brought under control. Thereafter it will be office-based.', 'Are you a highly driven and motivated insurance professional?Do you have some experience of the P&C industry (ideally personal lines)?Do you have good GENERAL analytical skills (perhaps you\'ve used SAS, R or Python, or a business intelligence tool such as Tableau)?Do you have a good sense of what is "good business" - in other words commercial acumen?Would you be interested to work for a private, dynamic, entrepreneurial company?']

['', '1.\xa0Spatiotemporal\xa0ML for Cardiovascular data:\xa0\xa0', '- Strong programming skills.', 'The successful candidates should have:', 'How to apply:', '- Prior knowledge, experience, and interest in\xa0multimodal\xa0machine learning, deep learning and computer vision are expected for position 2.', '- Familiarity with computing in\xa0AWS\xa0and\xa0GCP\xa0also\xa0advantageous.', "The successful candidate will join a core team of 2 research assistant professors,\xa04 postdocs, 5 research engineers, as well as 10 PhD students mostly drawn from\xa0Georgia\xa0Tech's\xa0ML and Engineering PhD programs, as well as from Emory's Computer\xa0Science & Informatics PhD. The wider collaborative teams constitute around 100 researchers.\xa0The team is spread across research space located on both campuses; on the 15th floor of Georgia\xa0Tech's\xa0Coda High Performance Computing Building\xa0in Tech Square, and on the 4th floor of the\xa0Woodruff\xa0Memorial Research Building,\xa0attached to Emory University Hospital at the heart of Emory's beautiful campus.\xa0Both office spaces have been recently (re)constructed to create state-of-the-art collaborative environments with the best coffee machine in Atlanta.\xa0", 'You may work remotely until the pandemic subsides, or in the Coda Building if you prefer to be in an office.', '2.\xa0Multimodal\xa0ML for\xa0Neuropsychiatric\xa0data:\xa0\xa0', 'With strong ties to industry and philanthropy, resources are excellent and career prospects are strong. You will be mentored to join world-class companies or institutions, with former researchers now at MIT, Harvard, The\xa0Technion,\xa0Oxford, Google,\xa0AWS\xa0and other prestigious organizations. There are also opportunities for involvement in early stage\xa0startup\xa0companies with\xa0significant financial backing.\xa0Your research will directly impact\xa0healthcare, while you will have the intellectual freedom to explore new research paradigms.', 'These positions involve working on multidimensional signals, images\xa0and videos for cardiovascular diagnoses. With access to over\xa060 million recordings, this position requires the development of\xa0novel ensemble and noisy label approaches for boosting classifier and prediction\xa0performance.\xa0Candidates will also participate in the design and organization of the\xa0Physionet\xa0/\xa0CinC\xa0Challenges,\xa0as well as other related projects.', 'Job Description:', '- Prior knowledge, experience, and interest in adversarial networks, attention modeling, and noisy label learning are advantageous.', 'Environment:', 'These positions involve the integration\xa0of neurological, clinical, motion,\xa0and audio-visual data to determine and predict\xa0changes in cognitive state. As part of two $50 million five-year projects, the candidate will interact with\xa0clinical\xa0experts, architects,\xa0HCI\xa0experts and ML experts, collaborating\xa0on large quantities of\xa0heterogeneous\xa0data types collected\xa0continuously\xa0', 'To apply, email a CV and covering letter with your career aspirations and availability for interview and commencing\xa0employment at:\xa0bmi-jobs [at]\xa0dbmi\xa0.\xa0emory\xa0.\xa0edu', '- PhD in electrical engineering, computer science, machine learning, information engineering, statistical\xa0signal processing, physics, mathematics,\xa0or a related field.', 'At Emory University Department of Biomedical Informatics, we have several\xa0postdoctoral research positions in signal processing and machine learning applied to large-scale\xa0neuropsychiatric\xa0and cardiovascular data available. Specifically, they are focused on:', 'in both home and a purpose-built hospital environment.\xa0', '- Prior knowledge, experience, and interest in machine learning, and\xa0spatiotemporal\xa0signal processing/deep learning are expected for position 1.', '- Strong written and oral communication skills in scientific English.', 'Candidates will also participate in the design and organization of the\xa0Physionet\xa0/\xa0CinC\xa0Challenges,\xa0as well as other related projects.']

job_title: Scientist II (R&D Scientist II - Immunoassay Development)
job_text: ['', 'What will you do?', 'Contribute to the design of new immunoassay products, conducting experiments under the guidance of more senior scientists.', 'How will you get here?', 'Hands-on lab skills and experience is required with a strong desire to work in the lab.', 'Good organization and time management skills are required.', 'Ability to work constructively on a team is required.', 'Screen antibodies for performance in new immunoassay products. May work with Senior scientist in the production of new antibodies.', 'Create test protocols and execute the benchtop testing in the lab against those protocols. Plan day-to-day tasks without direct guidance', 'Contribute to the development of new immunoassay products for drug of abuse testing.', 'Review experimental results to confirm data accuracy, perform data analysis and make recommendations based on those results.', 'Strong preference will be given to those candidates having hands-on lab-based experience in IVD assay development of from concept through development to commercialization', 'Knowledge of FDA/ISO design control and regulatory requirements related to IVD products is preferred.', 'How will you make an impact?', 'Knowledge and hands-on experience immunoassay techniques and antibody-based technology is preferred', 'Ability to use word processing, presentation and spreadsheet software is required', 'Perform other responsibilities to support the needs of the department as assigned.', 'Perform all work in compliance with FDA Design Control guidance, ISO standards, cGMP, and other applicable regulations in the performance of your responsibilities.', ' Bachelor in Biochemistry, Molecular Biology, Immunology, Microbiology or other related life science discipline with a minimum of 2 years of IVD product development experience. Or, M.S. or a Ph.D. in Biochemistry, Molecular Biology/related discipline with a minimum of 1 year of experience. Hands-on lab skills and experience is required with a strong desire to work in the lab. Experience working with biological materials is preferred. Strong verbal and written communication skills are required. Ability to work constructively on a team is required. Ability to use word processing, presentation and spreadsheet software is required Good organization and time management skills are required. Strong preference will be given to those candidates having hands-on lab-based experience in IVD assay development of from concept through development to commercialization Knowledge and hands-on experience immunoassay techniques and antibody-based technology is preferred Knowledge of FDA/ISO design control and regulatory requirements related to IVD products is preferred. ', ' Contribute to the development of new immunoassay products for drug of abuse testing. Screen antibodies for performance in new immunoassay products. May work with Senior scientist in the production of new antibodies. Contribute to the design of new immunoassay products, conducting experiments under the guidance of more senior scientists. Create test protocols and execute the benchtop testing in the lab against those protocols. Plan day-to-day tasks without direct guidance Formulate and optimize reagents for clinical analyzer testing, maintaining meticulous records in your lab notebook. Review experimental results to confirm data accuracy, perform data analysis and make recommendations based on those results. Perform all work in compliance with FDA Design Control guidance, ISO standards, cGMP, and other applicable regulations in the performance of your responsibilities. Perform other responsibilities to support the needs of the department as assigned. Maintain a constant focus on safety in the lab and within the site. Demonstrate a strong continuous improvement focus and execution of improvement projects. ', 'Experience working with biological materials is preferred.', 'Formulate and optimize reagents for clinical analyzer testing, maintaining meticulous records in your lab notebook.', 'Bachelor in Biochemistry, Molecular Biology, Immunology, Microbiology or other related life science discipline with a minimum of 2 years of IVD product development experience. Or, M.S. or a Ph.D. in Biochemistry, Molecular Biology/related discipline with a minimum of 1 year of experience.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills are required.', 'Demonstrate a strong continuous improvement focus and execution of improvement projects.', 'Maintain a constant focus on safety in the lab and within the site.']

['', ' Evolve our process for organizing User research and testing across multiple Product Squads and multiple User Researchers, ensuring an appropriate prioritization of projects and creating and managing short- and long-term research plans. Collaborate with product managers and UX designers to understand Product and UX “questions to be answered” and then design testing methodology, timeline, and scope to investigate those questions. Source participants for user testing and handle logistics and schedules around live testing. Conduct user testing on design mockups, prototypes, beta versions, and finished products and features supplied by the Product Squads. Compile and present learnings to the relevant stakeholders in a clear and actionable way they can use to design product improvements. Evolve Peloton’s existing user-experience testing infrastructure to ensure conducting virtual, field, and in-office user testing is seamless, efficient, and easy to analyze and report on. Conduct qualitative and quantitative research using a range of tools and approaches (e.g. interviews, ethnography, card sorting, surveys) to answer Product and UX questions and produce new insights. Help to formulate research documentation to better understand Peloton-specific user behavior. Document and track learnings gathered through testing and research so insights can easily be referenced and applied for future projects. job_title: USER EXPERIENCE RESEARCHER (UXR), Architecture, Engineering and Construction
job_text: ['Onx is a stealth start-up focused on delivering innovative building life cycle cloud solutions for the built environment. We are looking for a User Experience Researcher (UXR) to help us shine a light on the needs and workflows of those focused on project design and delivery in the Architecture, Engineering, and Construction (AEC) industry. By conducting research and performing usability studies, you will help make good features great, identify when to abandon features that do not add value, and assess the viability of new ideas. Most of all, you will help us understand what would make a more intuitive, accessible, and seamless experience for the next generation tools we are developing by being the voice of our users.']

['', 'To continue our mission to transform healthcare, we’re assembling a team of talented individuals who know how to work collaboratively and authentically, to innovate and think transformation, not status quo.', 'Pharmacoepidemiology experience preferred.', 'The Senior Scientist will be an active individual contributor role at Aetion. A successful candidate will help Aetion and our customers deliver results through use of the Aetion Evidence Platform. To do this, the Senior Scientist will work with our customers to train and mentor them on the use of the AEP and to drive the initial use and long-term adoption and growth of the Aetion software platform. This individual will also work on scientific studies (descriptive, comparative, effectiveness, adherence and others) to help our customers create impactful evidence for themselves and participate in high-value, multi-party engagements.', "Lead at all levels – Aetion is a diverse workforce of scientific thought leaders and technological innovators coming together with a vision to dramatically improve the Healthcare industry.\xa0Aetion supports and maintains a presence in organizations such as ISPOR, ISPE, ASHP, and HIMSSLocated in three cities — We have offices located in Midtown Manhattan near Penn Station, Boston's financial district, and Los Angeles. All locations are accessible by various forms of public transportation.Social and energetic offices – with a modern layout, and a giant kitchen and eating/social area. We have an open floor plan with an abundance of conference rooms, designed for impromptu collaboration, company gatherings, and industry meetups and events.\xa0Great perks – We offer competitive salaries, top-of-the-line benefits, company ownership stock options, 401(k) and unlimited PTOAwards – In 2020 Aetion was awarded the\xa0Databricks Data Team Award\xa0in recognition of our platform analyzing COVID-19 data. Aetion is also the recipient of\xa0Parity.org’s 2020 Best Companies for Women to Advance\xa0highlighting our efforts to close the gender gap in leadership!", 'Graduate degree (in epidemiology, biostatistics, health economics or a related field) with at least 2+ years of related work experience in an analytical area within healthcare or related industry or PhD with at least 1+ years of related work experience.\xa0Working knowledge of health care datasets including medical and pharmacy claims, EMR/EHR, genomics, registry and other data types.', 'Working knowledge of health care datasets including medical and pharmacy claims, EMR/EHR, genomics, registry and other data types.', 'Strong ability to self-motivate and lead others.', 'Actively collect customer feedback and ensure information is shared with internal departments.', 'Description', 'Experience client facing and engaging with customers in-person, on the phone and in writing.Pharmacoepidemiology experience preferred.Strong experience in cross-functional teams and decision making.Strong ability to self-motivate and lead others.Ability to travel to customer sites or other Aetion facilities.', 'Experience client facing and engaging with customers in-person, on the phone and in writing.', 'If that’s you, we’d love to hear from you.', 'The following duties include, but, are not limited to:', 'Develop and maintain scientific assets, such as study templates, measures in the Aetion Measure Library and other deployable scientific components.', 'Travel may be required (25% or more).', 'Career growth opportunities will also include additional responsibilities in leadership, process development, team mentoring and recruiting.', 'Social and energetic offices – with a modern layout, and a giant kitchen and eating/social area. We have an open floor plan with an abundance of conference rooms, designed for impromptu collaboration, company gatherings, and industry meetups and events.\xa0', 'Respond to and follow-up on customer requests submitted through the Aetion support system.', 'We achieve this with our Aetion Evidence Platform, a software platform used to evaluate the safety, effectiveness and value of medications, delivering better outcomes to patients, medical professionals and clients.\xa0We’ve partnered with top biopharma companies and are backed by leading venture capital firms to help increase our medical research and expand our product line.', 'Awards – In 2020 Aetion was awarded the\xa0Databricks Data Team Award\xa0in recognition of our platform analyzing COVID-19 data. Aetion is also the recipient of\xa0Parity.org’s 2020 Best Companies for Women to Advance\xa0highlighting our efforts to close the gender gap in leadership!', 'Preferred Qualifications\xa0', 'Work with customer scientists to guide them in designing, creating and delivering scientific results using the Aetion platform.', 'Work with customer scientists to guide them in designing, creating and delivering scientific results using the Aetion platform.Work with customers and Aetion teammates to create and implement detailed protocols for scientific use cases and scientific validation studies.Develop a deep understanding of the Aetion platform and measurement system and share that understanding with customers and teammates through 1:1 discussion, written communications and/or delivery of training seminars.Teach and mentor customers on the use of the Aetion platform in their organization.Develop and maintain scientific assets, such as study templates, measures in the Aetion Measure Library and other deployable scientific components.Develop and maintain knowledge base articles, documentation and other learning materials, in text and video form.Respond to and follow-up on customer requests submitted through the Aetion support system.Actively collect customer feedback and ensure information is shared with internal departments.Career growth opportunities will also include additional responsibilities in leadership, process development, team mentoring and recruiting.Travel may be required (25% or more).', 'The Senior Scientist will develop data connection specifications, scientific protocols, scientific validation studies, knowledge base items, videos, and other key materials, as well as participate in the delivery of studies on the Aetion platform. The Senior Scientist will also help to develop and maintain Aetion’s scientific assets, such as dashboards, study templates and our measure library. We are open to candidates based near our Boston or New York City offices as well as remote candidates. ', "Located in three cities — We have offices located in Midtown Manhattan near Penn Station, Boston's financial district, and Los Angeles. All locations are accessible by various forms of public transportation.", 'Develop and maintain knowledge base articles, documentation and other learning materials, in text and video form.', 'Work with customers and Aetion teammates to create and implement detailed protocols for scientific use cases and scientific validation studies.', 'Responsibilities', 'About Aetion...', 'Lead at all levels – Aetion is a diverse workforce of scientific thought leaders and technological innovators coming together with a vision to dramatically improve the Healthcare industry.\xa0Aetion supports and maintains a presence in organizations such as ISPOR, ISPE, ASHP, and HIMSS', 'Graduate degree (in epidemiology, biostatistics, health economics or a related field) with at least 2+ years of related work experience in an analytical area within healthcare or related industry or PhD with at least 1+ years of related work experience.\xa0', 'Great perks – We offer competitive salaries, top-of-the-line benefits, company ownership stock options, 401(k) and unlimited PTO', 'The Company', 'Qualifications', 'Aetion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Aetion is committed to being an employer of choice, not just a good place to work, but a great and inclusive place to work. To that end, we strive to recruit and maintain a workforce that meaningfully represents the diverse and culturally rich communities that we serve. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status or disabled status or, genetic information. EEO is the Law.', 'Strong experience in cross-functional teams and decision making.', 'Ability to travel to customer sites or other Aetion facilities.', 'Develop a deep understanding of the Aetion platform and measurement system and share that understanding with customers and teammates through 1:1 discussion, written communications and/or delivery of training seminars.', 'Welcome to Aetion! Since our debut in 2013, we have grown into one of the country’s leading science-driven technology companies using real-world evidence to provide innovative healthcare solutions.', 'Teach and mentor customers on the use of the Aetion platform in their organization.', 'Basic Qualifications']

work with our scientific team to support customer projects, answer technical questions, and find creative approaches to genomic-scale problems.\xa0You will work in a variety of diverse application areas including comparative genomics, metagenomics, biosafety, short read sequence, and statistical analysis of quantitative data.\xa0You will also act as an interface between science and sales,
