Personnel recruitment agencies need not respond.', 'Identify customer needs, and map them to the capabilities of the software', 'Troubleshoot scientific and technical support issues and capture user feedback', 'Genedata offers an attractive Total Reward Package that comprises a competitive salary and attractive benefits in return for your contribution to our success.', 'Are you a scientist or computational biologist with an interest in analyzing and interpreting ‘omics datasets and genome/proteome sequences?\xa0Does the idea of working in partnership with the world’s leading agribusiness, industrial biotechnology, and pharmaceutical companies to solve big data challenges sound exciting to you? \xa0If so, we would like to talk with you as we seek to grow our interdisciplinary scientific consulting and application support team in our East Coast Office.', 'Genedata’s success in providing computational solutions for bio-pharmaceutical R&D depends on its people from all over the world: innovative data scientists, talented soft-ware engineers, strategic marketing thinkers, communicative business developers plus any others with unique skills that make a difference in a highly innovative environment.']

job_title: Research Associate to Senior Scientist, Gene Therapy
job_text: ['', 'Prepare summaries of data and present internally to colleagues and management', 'For Scientist to Senior Scientist role, a\xa0PhD and postdoctoral training in biological sciences, with an emphasis on\xa0genetic engineering, molecular and cellular biology and/or related fields.\xa0For Research Associate to Associate Scientist level, a\xa0Bachelor of Science in the life sciences with4+\xa0years of research experience, preferably related to drug discovery.\xa0Prior industry experience is\xa0a plus.Proficiency in vector design, cloning, transfection, viral transduction, cell culturing, cell imaging, nucleic acid sequencing,\xa0and\xa0qPCR/ddPCR\xa0techniques. Direct experience with AAV viral gene therapy in preclinical research is preferred.Proven experience in developing cell-based models\xa0using a variety of molecular, biochemical, immunological, and/or imaging-based endpoints, preferably in the neuromuscular disease field.A record of productivity and scientific excellence based on consistent high-impact publications, patents, and/or external presentations.\xa0Independent and critical thinker, multi-tasker,\xa0and problem solver with strong verbal and written communication skills, and a team-first mindset.', 'Ability to assist\xa0with\xa0execution,\xa0sample collection,and analysis\xa0of\xa0in vivo\xa0preclinical animal studieswould be preferred, but is not a key component of the role', 'We are currently recruiting\xa0highly motivated and independents Research Associates, Associate Scientists (Bachelor’s, Master’s), Scientists and Senior Scientist\xa0(PhD) levels\xa0to join our team\xa0to help\xa0expand our discovery research efforts\xa0and advance our lead assets into the clinic. This\xa0laboratory-based\xa0position will be responsible for\xa0the development\xa0of\xa0in vitro\xa0cell-based tools and genetic screens to aid in the discovery and optimization of novel regulated gene therapies for neuromuscular diseases.\xa0The successful applicant will collaborate with\xa0in vivopharmacologists, bioinformatics scientists,\xa0and other\xa0external\xa0scientists across academia and industry to advance the pipeline.\xa0As\xa0we are\xa0a start-up company,this\xa0position has tremendous room for growth andopportunities\xa0across\xa0multiple areas of\xa0R&D,\xa0including\xa0in vivo\xa0pharmacology, bioanalytics, toxicology and CMC, in addition to collaborative opportunities with\xa0external\xa0partners.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'For Scientist to Senior Scientist role, a\xa0PhD and postdoctoral training in biological sciences, with an emphasis on\xa0genetic engineering, molecular and cellular biology and/or related fields.\xa0For Research Associate to Associate Scientist level, a\xa0Bachelor of Science in the life sciences with4+\xa0years of research experience, preferably related to drug discovery.\xa0Prior industry experience is\xa0a plus.', 'in vivo', 'Position Summary:', 'Design, construct,\xa0and test candidate AAV gene therapy vectors\xa0in vitro\xa0using a variety of cell-based models and\xa0molecular\xa0endpointsDevelop\xa0in vitro\xa0cell-based assays and disease models to evaluate and optimize AAV-based\xa0gene\xa0therapiesAbility to assist\xa0with\xa0execution,\xa0sample collection,and analysis\xa0of\xa0in vivo\xa0preclinical animal studieswould be preferred, but is not a key component of the roleMaintain up-to-date knowledge of emerging technologies and scientific approaches in the gene therapy\xa0area, particularly\xa0with regard toAAVPrepare summaries of data and present internally to colleagues and managementDrafting SOPs, following protocols, diligently documenting experimental data in electronic lab notebooks,\xa0and authorizing scientific reports for internal documentation or regulatory submissionsLead and contribute to publications and presentations at industry conferences and/or business meetingsActively support a culture of innovation, learning, respect,\xa0and\xa0trust', 'Actively support a culture of innovation, learning, respect,\xa0and\xa0trust', 'A record of productivity and scientific excellence based on consistent high-impact publications, patents, and/or external presentations.\xa0', 'in vitro', 'Lead and contribute to publications and presentations at industry conferences and/or business meetings', 'Client Summary:\xa0We are a stealth model\xa0preclinical\xa0stage biotechnology company\xa0based in San Diego, California. We are\xa0focused on developing the next generation of\xa0recombinant AAV-based gene therapies to treat genetically defined\xa0neuromuscular diseases.\xa0With novel AAV capsids and transgenes, we are addressing key limitations of\xa0current\xa0gene therapies\xa0to improve\xa0their efficacy and safety.\xa0', 'Develop\xa0in vitro\xa0cell-based assays and disease models to evaluate and optimize AAV-based\xa0gene\xa0therapies', 'We are seeking a Research Associate to\xa0Senior Scientist –\xa0Gene Therapy', 'Design, construct,\xa0and test candidate AAV gene therapy vectors\xa0in vitro\xa0using a variety of cell-based models and\xa0molecular\xa0endpoints', 'Drafting SOPs, following protocols, diligently documenting experimental data in electronic lab notebooks,\xa0and authorizing scientific reports for internal documentation or regulatory submissions', 'Client Summary:\xa0', 'Maintain up-to-date knowledge of emerging technologies and scientific approaches in the gene therapy\xa0area, particularly\xa0with regard toAAV', 'Proven experience in developing cell-based models\xa0using a variety of molecular, biochemical, immunological, and/or imaging-based endpoints, preferably in the neuromuscular disease field.', 'We are a privately held start-up company with experienced leadership, a world-class scientific advisory team,\xa0and with strong and supportive investment partners. We want to hire bright, creative, and entrepreneurial scientists who are committed tohelping\xa0patients, doing the right thing and building\xa0a\xa0high performing\xa0team.', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Proficiency in vector design, cloning, transfection, viral transduction, cell culturing, cell imaging, nucleic acid sequencing,\xa0and\xa0qPCR/ddPCR\xa0techniques. Direct experience with AAV viral gene therapy in preclinical research is preferred.', 'Independent and critical thinker, multi-tasker,\xa0and problem solver with strong verbal and written communication skills, and a team-first mindset.']

The successful applicant will be responsible for performing small molecule synthesis, analysis of peptide designs, peptide-lipid conjugation, bioanalytical chemistry, molecular characterization, and biochemical data analysis. The research is a collaboration between the labs of Professor Porotto and Professor Moscona at Columbia University Medical Center and Professor Alabi at Cornell University. The successful applicant will interact with the multi-disciplinary research teams in both labs but will be stationed in the Alabi research lab at the Cornell University Ithaca campus. Occasional travel to Columbia Medical in NYC will be involved. We seek applicants that are independent thinkers with a strong', 'Bioconjugate Chem., 2018, 29(10), 3362–3376. http://doi.org/10.1021/acs.bioconjchem.8b00527']

job_title: Bootcamp 33 - Data Science in Financial Services Bootcamp
job_text: ['', 'In Banking and Finance, this is more essential than in any other industry due to the complex nature of the highly regulated and massively broad spectrum of domain skills that make up the industry. In Capital Markets and Investment Banking, especially, Client Lifecycle, IBOR, Derivatives and Structured Financial Products, Trade Lifecycle, Compliance, and Risk are just a few of the areas to understand.\xa0', 'Expand your capabilities in this intensive 2-day bootcamp that will give you real insight into the Financial industry and complexities of this market. We will give you a 360° perspective of what it is like to work as a Data Scientist in the Financial Services industry today. Hear from leading industry experts, meet other like-minded individuals, and ultimately determine if you have what it takes to be the best of the best.', 'Practice using different models and feature engineering methods to solve real-world problems\xa0', 'For those who do, we will make you a productive and well rounded professional with the right skills and knowledge to get your career started with confidence.', '\xa0', 'ACCELERATE YOUR CAREER', 'Experience common tools for ETL, data warehousing, and data governance', 'GET REAL PROJECT EXPERIENCE', 'Strategically implement end-to-end data management solutions', 'Take our preliminary quiz to test if you have what it takes to attend and request a spot in Bootcamp 33: https://form.typeform.com/to/ejGtf7pS', 'Take a deep dive into the full project life cycle', 'Boost your resume with valuable project experience and an AI software solution to Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Anti-Financial Crime (AFC), Know Your Client (KYC), and the complex matter of Client Lifecycle Management (CLM)', 'ENHANCE YOUR DATA KNOWLEDGE', 'Are you a skilled Data Scientist looking to Fast Track your career? Is your lack of real-world experience holding you back from getting the job you graduated for? Our clients are looking for Data Scientists with deep domain experience to reinvent the way banks handle, manage, model, and analyze their data.\xa0', 'We passionately believe that the only way to be an expert data scientist is to have a deep understanding of the domain environment in which you work.', 'Use the foundational data science skill set, such as SQL, python, and pandas, to solve problems around AML & KYC', 'Over the course of the 3 months, you will be immersed in deep domain exercises. You will explore the financial services industry as a whole and learn about the ongoing data initiatives in major financial institutions. You will research and present on multiple topics as well as gain insider knowledge into this complex industry and its intricate data environment. You will plan, lead, and execute a large change program. You will also work with your peers and mentors to build a viable proof of concept (POC) for machine learning software to solve Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Know Your Client (KYC) issues that financial institutions are facing right now.\xa0', 'Prospect 33 is the leading project consultancy in the Capital Markets and Investment Banking sector today.\xa0', 'Become a data expert in the most complex data environment', 'There can be no doubt that banking and financial services represent the most complex data & domain environment in existence today. Due to a lost decade brought on by the financial crisis in 2008, today’s banks are only now starting their data journey. Over the coming decade the sector will change inexorably. The challenges of helping achieve this change will be led by an elite group of data scientists who start their careers over this period.\xa0', 'Mentored by industry leaders and subject matter experts', 'Must be strongly capable with SQL, Python and associated Data Science libraries', 'Bootcamp Attendees will have:', "A master's degree in Data Science, Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Computer Science, or other related fields OR an equivalent combination of education and experience or other credible Data Science Bootcamps", 'Other Bootcamps are oriented toward teaching Data Science. Our program assumes that you have that knowledge. We have a high regard for some of the other programs out there, but (from what we’ve seen) none of the other programs out there (excellent as some are) even attempt to tackle the issues we focus on.\xa0', 'Plan, lead and execute large change initiatives in our simulated environment', 'Time to dedicate to a 2-day Bootcamp that requires attendance for the entirety of both days 0900-1800 EST', 'Gain insider knowledge into a complex industry with intricate dataUse the foundational data science skill set, such as SQL, python, and pandas, to solve problems around AML & KYCExperience common tools for ETL, data warehousing, and data governancePractice using different models and feature engineering methods to solve real-world problems\xa0', 'If not in a program that is specifically related to data science then you must have significant data science project experience and/or 2 years of relevant work experience', 'Time to dedicate to the programme should you be successful at Bootcamp (8-12 hours per week)', 'We focus on teaching you these essential skills and do so in the most productive way possible by running a real project to help solve real-world problems.\xa0Over the course of our 3-month program, you will be educated on a broad spectrum of essential domain matters to ensure that you have a thorough understanding of the sector and are well prepared for your career in the industry.\xa0', 'Bootcamp 33 will give you the opportunity to take a deep dive into the full project life cycle and work in this complex domain & data environment. You will gain real-world experience and gain critical domain knowledge. This is not a training course; this is a real-world project training environment designed to overcome the critical challenge of preparing a group of junior data scientists to become the Future Leaders of tomorrow.\xa0', 'Successful graduates from our program become members of our exclusive group of Prospect 33 Future Leaders, acknowledged across the world as being the best career accelerator in the industry of financial services.', 'BOOTCAMP 33 - PROJECT SIMULATION BOOTCAMP 3 MONTHS (START DATE NOV 30th, 2020)', 'Plan, lead and execute large change initiatives in our simulated environmentStrategically implement end-to-end data management solutionsExperience real-world agile software developmentTake a deep dive into the full project life cycle', 'Knowledge, Skills, and Education Requirements', 'This is not a data science course. We will not teach you the fundamentals of data science. You should know that already.', 'Gain insider knowledge into a complex industry with intricate data', 'HOW DOES OUR PROGRAM DIFFER FROM OTHER BOOTCAMPS', 'https://www.prospect33.com/jobs/1733-bootcamp-33-data-science-in-financial-services-bootcamp', 'Successful participants from the Immersion Bootcamp will be invited to enter our project immersion training program. This program was specifically designed to enhance your data knowledge, get real project experience, and accelerate your career.\xa0', 'BOOTCAMP 33 - INTRODUCTORY IMMERSION BOOTCAMP 2 DAYS (NOV 19th & 20th, 2020)', 'HOW WILL BOOTCAMP 33 ACCELERATE YOUR CAREER?', "A master's degree in Data Science, Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Computer Science, or other related fields OR an equivalent combination of education and experience or other credible Data Science BootcampsIf not in a program that is specifically related to data science then you must have significant data science project experience and/or 2 years of relevant work experienceMust be strongly capable with SQL, Python and associated Data Science librariesTime to dedicate to a 2-day Bootcamp that requires attendance for the entirety of both days 0900-1800 ESTTime to dedicate to the programme should you be successful at Bootcamp (8-12 hours per week)", 'Our program combines our deep domain knowledge with real-world data science solutions in an immersive three month program. During the project, you will work in our simulated cloud environment using the latest big data and data science tools and techniques to help solve real-world problems.', 'Become a data expert in the most complex data environmentMentored by industry leaders and subject matter expertsBoost your resume with valuable project experience and an AI software solution to Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Anti-Financial Crime (AFC), Know Your Client (KYC), and the complex matter of Client Lifecycle Management (CLM)', 'Experience real-world agile software development']

['', 'Success Outcomes/Key Responsibilities: ', 'History of success in fast-paced startup environments and in the management of designers.', 'Your job is to deliver a user experience that is empathic, ergonomic, empowering and safe for people working in the complex, high stakes healthcare environment. ', 'We’re just getting started. Patterns must be fixed and consolidated. New design solutions must be discovered to unlock the next level of ergonomics for collaboration, safety, and voice modalities. It’s time for a professional designer to lead us forward. ', 'Canvas Medical seeks an experienced User Experience Research & Designer to establish and lead Canvas’ new Product Design team.  ', 'Implement a product design process that prioritizes customer problems, facilitates cross-functional ideation, and drives new features to completion. ', 'Perform research to understand workflows and clinician pain points, shape the roadmap, and test design solutions. ', 'Experience facilitating structured brainstorming and design-thinking exercises. ', 'An opportunity to advance the state-of-the-art of medical technology and HCI, with direct benefit to clinicians and patients across the United States. ', 'Maintain consistent abstractions and grow the component and pattern library to empower engineering to move faster. \xa0 ', 'Experience designing complex enterprise and/or clinical software for sophisticated users. ', 'Guide, nurture and protect Canvas’ high-level design vision. Collaborate with engineers and data scientists to develop new contextually-aware interfaces powered by predictive analytics and machine learning. Implement a product design process that prioritizes customer problems, facilitates cross-functional ideation, and drives new features to completion. Perform research to understand workflows and clinician pain points, shape the roadmap, and test design solutions. Maintain consistent abstractions and grow the component and pattern library to empower engineering to move faster. \xa0 Design, prototype and deliver low or medium-fidelity design for new features. Evangelize design-thinking across the organization and to our partners and customers. ', 'You will work closely with the Chief Executive and Medical Officer to assume ownership of the product vision and scale Narrative Charting to new frontiers. ', 'Design, prototype and deliver low or medium-fidelity design for new features. ', 'Fluency in modern product design and prototyping tools, processes and best practices. ', 'Collaborate with engineers and data scientists to develop new contextually-aware interfaces powered by predictive analytics and machine learning. ', 'Qualifications/Required Experience: ', 'Enthusiasm for translating research into actionable insights. Strong presentation and communication skills to share findings across the organization. ', 'Canvas is a new kind of Electronic Medical Record differentiated by a groundbreaking user interface innovation. Instead of navigating forms and menus, clinicians simply type the patient story as the visit progresses. ', 'See Narrative Charting in action:\xa0https://bit.ly/3dHOZin ', 'An opportunity to advance the state-of-the-art of medical technology and HCI, with direct benefit to clinicians and patients across the United States.', 'Strong understanding of HCI theory and principles, by way of practice or academic background. ', 'Experience designing and performing qualitative and quantitative UX research, such as workflow analysis, usability studies, and analysis of behavioral data. ', 'Exceptional product design talent with contributions spanning system design, component design and implementation of features. ', 'Evangelize design-thinking across the organization and to our partners and customers. ', 'Guide, nurture and protect Canvas’ high-level design vision. ', ' ', 'Experience designing complex enterprise and/or clinical software for sophisticated users. Strong understanding of HCI theory and principles, by way of practice or academic background. Experience designing and performing qualitative and quantitative UX research, such as workflow analysis, usability studies, and analysis of behavioral data. Enthusiasm for translating research into actionable insights. Strong presentation and communication skills to share findings across the organization. Exceptional product design talent with contributions spanning system design, component design and implementation of features. Fluency in modern product design and prototyping tools, processes and best practices. Experience facilitating structured brainstorming and design-thinking exercises. History of success in fast-paced startup environments and in the management of designers.']

job_title: Technology, Media and Telecom (TMT) Research Consultant
job_text: ['', '• Market leader for Networking Infrastructure: Data-driven pricing and discounting strategy based on, competitive price-points, customer willingness to pay and historic transactions', 'Location: Flexible', '• Support senior team members/individually engage with senior stakeholders in client organizations to understand the big-picture and accordingly carve out the consulting/strategy solutions', 'Job Posting | Technology, Media and Telecom (TMT) Research Consultant', 'We work with clients across a wide range of industries and business functions, helping them to make better decisions faster; reach new levels of efficiency and effectiveness; and see a tangible impact on their top and bottom line.', 'Requirements', '• Professional Development Assistance', 'Evalueserve is a global professional services provider offering research, analytics, and data management services. We’re powered by mind+machine – a unique combination of human expertise and best-in-class technologies that use smart algorithms to simplify key tasks. This approach enables us to design and manage processes that can generate and harness insights on a large scale, significantly cutting costs and timescales and helping businesses that partner with us to overtake the competition.', 'Our clients rely on us for the most important business decisions for a wide range of business problems. A few examples of our recent projects are highlighted below:', '• Competitive compensation ', 'Associate Consultants would join the rapidly expanding TMT consulting practice. We support leading TMT giants in the formulation of strategic recommendations to help them grow at above-market growth rates. Our clients include senior executives who are responsible for growth strategy formulation, business process optimization, sales and marketing transformation, product and technology roadmaps, M&A strategy, etc. We lead with a framework based approach and provide compelling solutions to help transform our client organizations.', 'Compensation & Benefits:', 'TMT Consulting Practice at Evalueserve', 'As an Associate Consultant, you will play a key role across the lifecycle of a consulting/ strategic research assignment. This includes attending diagnostics workshop at the beginning to fully understand the client’s business objectives to co-design optimal execution roadmaps and finally ensure stellar delivery of the project. You will work with a team of researchers and data scientist to integrate findings from different sources to create a compelling story for clients.', 'Department: Corporate and Professional Services', 'Evalueserve is committed to providing equal employment opportunities (EEO) globally, eliminating discrimination and promoting good relations among employees, regardless of age, disability, race, ethnicity or origin, religion or belief, sex, gender assignment, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital or civil partnership status. Evalueserve is an inclusive employer and is proud of its diverse workforce.', '• MBA degree preferred', 'Position Overview', '• Prior experience of working closely with C-suite and senior leadership teams', '• Cross-collaboration – can work in tandem with parallel teams such as data analytics and business research to develop a joint solution and convey the results', 'Duration: Permanent', 'Requirements:', '• Can pro-actively identify challenges from key engagements and develop innovative solutions/frameworks in the area of business/GTM strategy to address client problems', '• Exceptional interpersonal and presentation skills – ability to convey business value propositions', '• 5+ years of consulting experience from management consulting firms or corporate strategy role; should have good exposure to projects related to market opportunity/entry assessments, product and competitor tear-down, trends and business environment analysis, pricing & GTM strategy development, etc.', '• Complete benefits package ', '• Should be able to analyze industry and technology trends and distil large amounts of data into insightful and actionable ideas suited to client. Should be familiar with latest trends and disruptions in the technology vertical', '• Market leader in PLM & Simulation tools: Market opportunity assessment including TAM/SAM/SOM estimations. Develop a 5 year go-forward plan based on market attractiveness, internal technology and GTM readiness and competitive environment', '• Leading provider of Cloud Infrastructure and AI/ML tools: Compete teardown of key competitors to to equip field with talking points and identify product gaps that require immediate attention', 'evalueserve.com ©2020 Evalueserve. All rights reserved.', '• Leading edge global work environment ', 'Responsibilities:', '• Should have great analytical capability – should be able to structure business problems and can take framework-based approach to solve the same']

['', 'Have proven experience in research roles in B2B and B2C companies with expertise in qualitative, quantitative, and mixed method exploratory research', 'Attentive is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We’re committed to diversity and maintaining a work environment that is free from harassment and discrimination. We’re committed to them because our core values demand it. Values like Integrity First, Listening & Cultivating Discussion, and Default to Action. Applicants from all backgrounds are encouraged to apply, and will not be discriminated\xa0against on the basis of any protected status under federal, state, or local law.', 'Hold a degree in a human behavior related field, such as human-computer interaction, psychology, sociology, communication, information science, media studies, computer science, or economics5+ years experience in applied product researchHave proven experience in research roles in B2B and B2C companies with expertise in qualitative, quantitative, and mixed method exploratory researchExperience with analytics tools, such as Looker, Amplitude, Fullstory, and how they can be used to supplement qualitative researchHave strong interpersonal skills and can easily connect with partners in product, engineering, business, and designIs a self starter and can proactively identify where research and strategy can provide the most value', 'Regular company-wide social events (even virtually!)', 'Work cross-functionally with design, product management, data science, content strategy, engineering, and marketing', 'Identify gaps in our use of quantitative research; help guide us in filling those gaps, whether it’s vouching for a new tool to utilize or pulling applicable data from tools we already have in place', '5+ years experience in applied product research', 'Lead the strategy for user research within Product Design but even more broadly across the organization\xa0Be the UX expert to support and guide research initiatives; this includes reviewing research plans, making suggestions and acting more broadly as a mentor\xa0Lead and communicate any new research processes to design and product; effectively guide the team in upholding these processes\xa0\xa0\xa0Identify gaps in our use of quantitative research; ['', 'Required minimum qualification: BS or BA in microbiology or highly related field, Ph.D. in virology or highly related field', 'Preferred Qualifications: Experience in the development of molecular and serological diagnostic assays (i.e., primer/probe design for high throughput qPCR, ELISA ).Experience in flow-cytometry (viral RNA and protein detection) and western blot techniques.Experience in virus isolation and primary cell culture. Experience in protein expression in prokaryotic and eukaryotic systems.Experience in cloning and reverse genetic for ARN virus infectious clones production', 'A successful candidate will be expected to carry out biomedical research from experimental design to publication on the swine infectious diseases. The candidate will lead and participate in collaborative projects to understand host-pathogen interaction and characterization of the immunological target of specific RNA and DNA swine pathogens, using in vitro and in vivo models. While they will work with the principal investigator on overall lab goals, they are expected to work independently at the bench and to drive their project forward both experimentally and theoretically, inclusive of experimental design, bench work, analysis of data, and manuscript preparation. Working alongside the PI, they will serve as a mentor for graduate and undergraduate students, ensuring that lab personnel is reaching experimental and program goals. The position will also have some laboratory management duties inclusive of assisting with reagent preparation, laboratory inventory, ordering supplies, and maintaining records regarding biological/chemical inventories, environmental health and safety compliance, and grant preparation.']

['', ' Partner with in vivo translational and bioanalytical scientists to design and analyze nonclinical studies and help elucidate the relationship between vector-gene administration and measures of efficacy and safety. The incumbent will analyze data, interpret results, develop predictive models and provide guidance to project teams. Serve on project teams as the pharmacometrics SME throughout candidate selection, nonclinical proof-of-concept, IND-enabling, and early clinical development phases. Provide statistical support for study design, study power and significance testing. Devise dosing schemes, select sample collection timepoints and establish dose-response relationships. Perform modelling, including allometric analysis, to understand the translation of PK/PD data across animal species, including humans. Propose first-in-human doses based on PK/PD analysis of animal data. Advance clinical candidates; review and draft nonclinical and/or clinical pharmacology sections of regulatory (IND/CTA/BLA) filings and contribute to clinical protocol development. ', 'Experience with rare-disease indications.', '#GSD (Get Stuff Done)', 'May Have/Preferred', 'Care Deeply – for our patients, each other and our work', 'Experience performing PK/PD analysis, in particular with large molecules.', 'Why Work for Us', 'Be BOLD:', 'About You', '#GSD', 'Provide statistical support for study design, study power and significance testing.', 'Experience using and maintaining software platforms such as Phoenix WinNonLin, R, MATLAB/Simulink, NONMEM or other relevant data analysis and simulation programs.', 'Experience working with gene therapy.', 'Serve on project teams as the pharmacometrics SME throughout candidate selection, nonclinical proof-of-concept, IND-enabling, and early clinical development phases.', 'Perform modelling, including allometric analysis, to understand the translation of PK/PD data across animal species, including humans.', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or on the basis of disability.', ' Experience working with gene therapy. ', 'Must Have/Required', 'Care Deeply', 'Devise dosing schemes, select sample collection timepoints and establish dose-response relationships.', ' A PhD in Pharmaceutics, Pharmacometrics, Pharmacology, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or a related field, with a minimum of 7 years of industry experience. Experience using and maintaining software platforms such as Phoenix WinNonLin, R, MATLAB/Simulink, NONMEM or other relevant data analysis and simulation programs. Experience performing sophisticated statistical analysis. Experience performing PK/PD analysis, in particular with large molecules. Solid understanding of pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic principles, as well as the drug development process. Excellent critical thinking and scientific skills, and a demonstrated ability to analyze, interpret, and clearly communicate complex results Ability to work effectively and collaboratively on cross-functional teams. Excellent oral, presentation and written communication skills. Required ', 'Manage the handoffs to DataOps team to ensure proper support and maintainability, as well as be available for support remediation and troubleshooting.', 'Create standards and best practices.', 'Develop and maintain advanced analytics capabilities (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning). Ingest, transform, and prepare data for consumption by our various lines of business. Work with the lines of business on reporting, data visualizations and overall data consumption. Mentor Data Engineers and team members. Collaborate with other teams in Operations & Technology, including Software Engineering, Enterprise Architecture, and Infrastructure teams as well as our support teams. Manage the handoffs to DataOps team to ensure proper support and maintainability, as well as be available for support remediation and troubleshooting. Create standards and best practices. ', 'Work with the lines of business on reporting, data visualizations and overall data consumption.', "Bachelor's Degree or equivalent combination of education and experience Mathematics, Computer Science, MIS, Data Science, Analytics, or related. ['', 'The successful candidate will be part of a highly inter-disciplinary team that conceptualizes, designs and eventually validates forward models in lens-based coherent x-ray diffraction imaging applied to microstructure characterization. This project unifies efforts in a wide range of computational and experimental areas like synchrotron experimentation, optics, wavefront analysis and solid state/materials physics. Candidates with experience in these areas are encouraged to apply.\xa0', 'Good technical writing, communication and presentation skills.', 'A PhD in physics, materials science, electrical engineering or equivalent (obtained within the last 3 years).Proficiency in one of the following: x-ray science, computational methods, signal/image/data processing, coherent wave optics, scientific programming, materials microstructure, synchrotron instrumentation.Good technical writing, communication and presentation skills.Willingness to learn and collaborate across different scientific disciplines in a fast-paced research environment.Familiarity with one or more of the following not required, but will be highly valued:\xa03D geometry, crystallography and reciprocal space, mathematical symmetries.', 'The Synchrotron Studies of Materials group is looking for a post-doctoral candidate to develop coherence-enhanced dark-field x-ray microscopy (DFXM) techniques for characterizing nanometer-scale structural heterogeneity in\xa0crystalline/polycrystalline\xa0materials.\xa0', 'DFXM has gained recent importance at third-generation synchrotron light sources as a lens-based technique for fast micron-scale characterization of materials structure. The imminent upgrade of the Advanced Photon Source will enable a several-fold increase in coherent x-ray flux, opening up the possibility of many new types of measurements. This includes fast, targeted imaging of specific microstructural heterogeneities (defects, inclusions, interfaces) enabled by tuning the parameters of a lens-based imaging system. Through this, a variety of coupled physical phenomena in materials of interest may eventually be studied non-destructively (structural evolution, polarization, magnetization fields). This project aims to lay the foundations of such capabilities by exploiting the effects of high beam coherence in the context of DFXM experiments, in terms of theory, simulation, and experimental demonstrations. The project is primarily focused on developing new lens-based methods of rapid in situ visualization of crystallographic defects in bulk materials.\xa0', 'The selected candidate will lead the effort in one or more major aspects of the project, namely: (1) design and simulation of lens-based coherent x-ray\xa0propagation/scattering\xa0models to optimally image specifically targeted types of micron-scale material heterogeneities (transmission mode, as well as analyzing a Bragg-diffracted beam with a lens), (2) construction of the new DFXM system at the Sector 6 beamline of the APS, (3) validation of the developed computational methods on model structures and material systems, (4) carrying out experiments and data collection/analysis on materials of actual scientific interest. The selected candidate will present simulation, experimental and analysis results at conferences and in peer-reviewed journals.', 'A PhD in physics, materials science, electrical engineering or equivalent (obtained within the last 3 years).', 'Familiarity with one or more of the following not required, but will be highly valued:\xa03D geometry, crystallography and reciprocal space, mathematical symmetries.', 'Willingness to learn and collaborate across different scientific disciplines in a fast-paced research environment.', 'Proficiency in one of the following: x-ray science, computational methods, signal/image/data processing, coherent wave optics, scientific programming, materials microstructure, synchrotron instrumentation.', 'Qualifications:']

["As our Customer's first Senior UX Researcher, you will shape the end to end UX Research process for a hyper-growth product development organization. You will be planning and conducting user research studies and experiments across multiple products and digital experiences, collaborating closely with our UX Designers, Product Managers, and other key stakeholders. ", "Our Customer is one of the leading global interconnection platforms and the world’s largest data center provider. They connect the world's leading businesses to their customers, employees and partners inside the world's most connected data centers in 52 markets across five continents. Their mission is to protect, connect and power the digital economy. ", 'Company Industry:', 'Opportunity:\xa0The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a\xa0Senior User Experience ResearcherCommitment Level:\xa0 40 hours per week, on-site ', 'Responsibilities-Identify and prioritize research opportunities-Lead efforts to craft and refine customer personas-Apply quantitative and qualitative methodologies to collect and analyze user behavior data and communicate actionable recommendations to stakeholders-Partner with engineers and designers to develop requirements for interactive prototypes-Own the end-to-end user research lifecycle and optimize processes to make it easier for teams to apply research in the software development cycle. Develop processes to ensure consistency, rigor, and accuracy-Partner with analytics teams to leverage insights from data sources-Manage the user outreach program and curate the participant panel program-Build and maintain the UX research repository of past reports, study templates, guides, and other deliverables-Evangelize user research internally, mentor fellow researchers, and nurture a culture of experimentation through proactive knowledge sharing across teams ', ' ', 'Opportunity:', 'Commitment Level:', 'Company Industry:\xa0Information Technology and Services ', 'Qualifications-7+ years of relevant work experience within user experience research-5+ years of UX Research experience for Cloud/SaaS, PaaS and/or IaaS products-Bachelor’s degree in Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, Psychology, Sociology, or related field required; Master’s degree or Ph.D. preferred-Experience with generative/evaluative research using quantitative/qualitative methodologiesStrong understanding of the strengths and shortcomings of different research methods, including when and how to apply them during the product development process-Direct hands-on experience leading and facilitating research studies and experiments, such as in-person and remote testing, concept evaluation, card sorting, A/B testing, iterative prototype testing, field research, survey design, etc.-Experience with leading Research Ops for a small but growing research team']

['', 'Job Code: ', 'Your Superpowers', 'You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.', 'You have 5+ years of experience in data science in the life science/healthcare industry.', 'You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science. ', 'You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.', 'You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You have 5+ years of experience in data science in the life science/healthcare industry.You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science. You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.Job Code: ', 'You will help to radically lower drug prices and expand access, by identifying novel opportunities for partnerships and delivery across the complex web of interrelationships that bring drugs from pharma companies to patients. You will speed the development and trialing of novel medicines through the unification, comprehension, and modelling of human health and disease across data sources. You will drive the adoption of machine learning for the improvement of human health in building a radically different, digital-native and data-first life sciences company, where we bootstrap our way to rapid increases in scale and efficacy across functions. You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, to drug pricing and delivery, powering a novel, modern paradigm in drug development.', "The Impact You'll Have", 'You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.', 'You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.', 'You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.', 'EQRx is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.']

company: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
job_text: ['', 'Experience in the design, building, modeling, and laboratory testing of space instrumentation', 'In-depth knowledge of space plasma physics including the heating and acceleration of the solar wind, and acceleration, transport and loss mechanisms of energetic particles. ', 'Demonstrated and effective leadership and management skills. ', 'You Meet Our Minimum Qualifications If You Have...', 'A PhD in physics or a related field.', 'Focus on advancing our understanding of the solar wind heating acceleration and energetic particle dynamics using in situ and remote observations including new data from the NASA Parker Solar Probe mission.', ' Focus on advancing our understanding of the solar wind heating acceleration and energetic particle dynamics using in situ and remote observations including new data from the NASA Parker Solar Probe mission. Participate and lead new space instrument development programs, as well as team with SES staff to develop novel concepts for future heliophysics and planetary mission opportunities. ', 'Expertise in modeling, data analysis, and scientific interpretation space plasma physics data.', 'Demonstrated and effective communication skills.', 'Expertise in the development and writing of proposals for spaceflight instruments and missions.', 'Demonstrated ability to obtain external funding for space-based instrumentation and data analysis projects.', 'Participate and lead new space instrument development programs, as well as team with SES staff to develop novel concepts for future heliophysics and planetary mission opportunities.']

['', 'Moderate usability research sessions with confidence and poise to gather key insights on potential use events that occur. ', 'You are curious. ', 'Write and execute generative and evaluative research protocols, analyze research insights and data, and write test reports. ', 'Assist in defining user needs, translation of needs into measurable specifications, and the heuristic review of device-user interfaces. ', 'Your Purpose', 'More About You ', '\xa0', 'You have excellent writing, presentation, and interpersonal skills – all needed for research, facilitation, interviews, and client presentations. Your writing is concise, grammatically correct, and has the appropriate tone. You are an effective listener and contributor at client meetings and have demonstrated your ability to document pertinent information/action items/opportunities, as well as provide a written summary post-meeting. You possess strong empathy and exceptional verbal communication skills that allow you to communicate with anyone, and unlock what users are thinking and feeling about a product. ', 'You like to explore new territories and learn from others. You can successfully lead clients through problem definition and the innovation process during workshop sessions. You have a deep understanding of user research methodologies, concepting processes, approaches, and tools, and take the initiative to improve them. You’re also comfortable with global travel (role may include up to 30% travel), either on your own or as part of a team and feel confident leading research teams wherever you’re operating. ', 'Provide input on FDA and Global usability regulatory standards (IEC 62366-1:2015, ANSI/AAMI HE75, EU MDR) ', 'As a Senior Human Factors and Usability Researcher, you’ll work on the West Coast, primarily conducting studies in the San Francisco and Los Angeles areas. You will work in collaboration with our interaction designers, industrial designers, and engineering team to ensure that products are safe and easy to use by the end-user. You will guide your colleagues and our clients to be compliant with usability regulatory standards and guidance across the globe. You will be challenged to lead every phase of human factors research for products, both medical and consumer in nature, from planning to data collection to reporting. ', 'You are confident. ', 'Do you have experience doing hands-on usability research?  We’re looking for someone who is passionate about improving product safety, usability, and efficacy for our clients’ products to lead studies with our West Coast research team!    ', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Your Team ', 'At Bresslergroup, we are a motivated lot of thinkers, makers, and problem solvers. We challenge and inspire each other every day. BGers are curious, clever, and confident, and we look for candidates who are all those things and more. Our firm is technically grounded, so we can take any idea — no matter how complex — and make it a reality, while simultaneously keeping our design simple and clean. With six disciplines under one roof, we work in multidisciplinary teams whose combined research, creative, and technical expertise add value throughout a collaborative product development process. This is how we remain reliably innovative.  The research team at Bresslergroup works to provide insights to our design and engineering teams, as well as directly to our clients, to ensure that all research, design, and development efforts remain firmly grounded in user needs. ', 'Key Responsibilities ', '\xa0 ', 'You can conduct studies and lead client projects in California. In addition to your research skills, you may have experience in graphic design, photo, video, and/or audio recording/editing. ', 'You have established yourself in thought-leadership within the research industry. You are comfortable with ambiguity and complexity, because sometimes that leads to the most unique, unexpected design solutions. You possess a strong work ethic and are willing to “do what it takes” to get the job done. ', 'You are clever. ', 'Build human factors and usability research proposals and budgets. ', 'Please send your resume and portfolio to career@bresslergroup.com!', 'Work with the Human Factors and Usability Manager and Director of User Research on improving departmental processes around human factors and usability research. ', 'Your Purpose ', 'Design, execute, and report on usability (human factors) research at various stages of product development, from early prototypes to validation testing required by FDA. ', 'Your Team', 'You have a true passion for evaluative product research and human-centered product design, as evidenced by your education and career choices. You have a deep familiarity with all forms of evaluative product research and can confidently guide a client in defining the user groups, intended uses, and use environments of the product. You can write effective proposals, plans, technical reports, and publications, and use them to improve the effectiveness, safety, and usability of consumer products and medical devices. You have extensive experience conducting formative testing and validation studies. You demonstrate high standards of workmanship and attention to detail and can help improve departmental processes and best practices. You can develop, support, and defend design recommendations based on your experience with design research, ergonomics, and human factors principles. ', 'You have an advanced degree in human factors engineering, engineering psychology, or another research-heavy discipline. You have at least 7 years of hands-on, professional applied human factors research experience. You have a track record of delivering regulatory compliant validation research and providing guidance leading to the successful launch of physical products. Ideally, you have worked in a consulting environment for at least one year and are familiar with how they operate. ', 'Do you have experience doing hands-on usability research?  We’re looking for someone who is passionate about improving product safety, usability, and efficacy for our clients’ products to lead studies with our West Coast research team!     ', 'More About You', ' ', 'Translate uFMEA, risk/hazard analysis, and/or IFU into an appropriate usability testing protocol. ']

['', ' Must be a U.S. citizen. - Must be eligible to be granted a security clearance. - Must have a minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale. - Must be currently enrolled in a degree-seeking college or university program; must have completed the junior year of undergraduate career prior to the internship, and have at least one semester remaining following the internship. - Undergraduate and Graduate students are eligible. - Must provide unofficial or official transcripts. - Must major in Human Resources, Business, Marketing, or Psychology with a documented Human Resources minor. - Must be available for an operational interview and other applicable processing between the months of December 2020 and March 2021. Additional Qualifications: Candidates are expected to have completed courses in at least one of the following areas of study: - Compensation and Benefits. - Data Science. - Economics. - Employee and Labor Relations. - Employment Law. - Statistics. - Organizational Behavior. - Organizational Research. - HR Analysis. - HR Strategy. - Global HR. - Workforce Planning and Staffing. - Performance Management. Skills and Abilities We are seeking candidates who can demonstrate a variety of skills and abilities including: - Customer Service to anticipate and identify the needs of customers. - Consulting Skills to build effective relationships with line managers to help them strategically manage their human resources. - Written and Verbal Communication Skills to articulate HR strategies, initiatives, options and advice. - Ability to interpret and apply legislation and policies related to HR. - Work Management and Organizational Skills to manage multiple activities to accomplish desired end results.', 'DCIPS Disclaimer', 'Pay, Benefits, & Work Schedule', 'Responsibilities', 'How To Apply - External', ' Students are paid a competitive salary commensurate with their education level. - Receive annual leave, sick leave and paid federal holidays. - Participation in agency-wide extracurricular programs. - Daily transportation to and from work is not provided. Students participating in the program are highly encouraged to bring a vehicle. Carpooling with other students MAY be available but NOT guaranteed. - Subsidized housing accommodations are available upon request if school is located in excess of 75 miles from NSA main HQs campus.', 'Job Summary', 'Qualifications']

['', '·\xa0\xa0Experience working with cross-functional teams', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Productionalize models', 'As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity in creating unique algorithms and leveraging your NLP expertise. You will add to their implementation for machine learning for both internal and external projects. With a rich and varied dataset to work from, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and algorithmic techniques to all types of data sets to detect trends before anybody else in the world.', 'Washington, DC', 'THE ROLE', 'More than anything', 'KEYWORDS', 'USD $165,000 - $185,000 + Great PTO/Benefits + Equity', '·\xa0\xa0Extensive software engineering experience, working with models end to end', 'More than anything - You will need proven, commercial expereince as a machine learning engineer!', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have a great attitude and want to work with a high performing team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have strong experience in BERT, spaCy, and TensorFlow', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with a cross-functional team of machine learning engineers and OPs', '·\xa0\xa0Commercial experience developing machine learning and deep learning algorithms being put into production', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'THE BENEFITS', 'YOUR QUALIFICATIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop end to end AI and machine learning models', 'THE COMPANY', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Help innovate the way AI is used within the company', 'Please register your interest by sending your CV to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.', 'Data Science, Machine Learning, Information, Technology, Team Lead, Tech Lead, Software Engineering, Software Engineer, AI, Deep Learning, Robotics, NLP', 'A competitive base salary of $165,000 – $185,000 + amazing benefits', 'This is an opportunity for an innovate machine learning engineer to use their expertise in NLP to find trends around the world and identify major correlations on what will happen next. You will work in one of Worlds’ most innovative tech startups where they have captured the global capacity of supply chain relationships.. They have seen great success attracting clients and investors because of their completely unique commitment to machine learning in this domain.', 'This is a start-up supply chain risk company that is changing the way the marketplace reacts and interacts with fluxuations in the market due to phenomena, enterprise, and news. As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll find yourself working closely with both Data leaders and engineering teams and will enjoy the pace and innovation that runs through the company culture. For those ready for a start up environment, you’ll enjoy the perks that this company can offer you – I hope you bring a good sense of humor!', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer you will be required to:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fluency in Python, and ML/NLP Libraries', 'Senior Machine Learning Engineer (NLP)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0PhD or Master’s in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or Quantitative Fields']

job_title: Lead Data Scientist - Large Healthcare Company
job_text: ['', 'SKILLS:', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits and moreA tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first businessAutonomy and end-to-end ownershipOpportunity for fast growth & promotion', "5-10 or more years of progressively complex related experience.Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Economics, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.Master’s degree or Ph.D. preferred.Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.Strong organizational, management, and leadership skills.Deep knowledge of advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.Strong skills to effectively communicate and negotiate across the business and in the external health care environmentDemonstrates proficiency in all areas of mathematical analysis methods, machine learning, statistical analyses, and predictive modeling and advanced in-depth specialization in some areas.Demonstrates a strong ability to communicate technical concepts and implications to business partners.Solid understanding of the healthcare industry, products, and systems is a plus.\xa0", 'Interacts with internal and external peers and management to share highly complex information related to areas of expertise and/or to gain acceptance of new or enhanced technology/business solutions.', '\xa0', 'A tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first business', 'Demonstrates a strong ability to communicate technical concepts and implications to business partners.', 'Strong organizational, management, and leadership skills.', '\xa0The Lead Data Scientist will have a broad impact and true ownership; driving business decisions and mentoring junior team members to provide technical advice.', 'For more info please reach out to theodore@intelletec.com', 'ON OFFER:', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Economics, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.", 'My client with one of the US Leading Healthcare firms. They are going through a massive transformation and are looking for a Lead Data Scientist to join their team.', '\xa0If you want to make a difference in healthcare in the US and beyond this could be a great opportunity!', 'Develops complex algorithms and statistical predictive models and determines analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes.Performs analyses of structured and unstructured data to solve multiple and complex business problems. utilizing advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses and specialized expertise in the organization and/or industry.Applies analytical rigor and statistical methods to analyze large amounts of data, using advanced statistical techniques.Manages large and complex analytical projects from data exploration, model building, performance evaluation and testing.Collaborates with business partners to develop technical /business approaches and new or enhanced technical tools.Interacts with internal and external peers and management to share highly complex information related to areas of expertise and/or to gain acceptance of new or enhanced technology/business solutions.', 'Master’s degree or Ph.D. preferred.', 'Solid understanding of the healthcare industry, products, and systems is a plus.\xa0', 'Develops complex algorithms and statistical predictive models and determines analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes.', 'As a Lead Data Scientist you will:', 'Demonstrates proficiency in all areas of mathematical analysis methods, machine learning, statistical analyses, and predictive modeling and advanced in-depth specialization in some areas.', 'Autonomy and end-to-end ownership', 'Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Applies analytical rigor and statistical methods to analyze large amounts of data, using advanced statistical techniques.', 'Opportunity for fast growth & promotion', 'Performs analyses of structured and unstructured data to solve multiple and complex business problems. utilizing advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses and specialized expertise in the organization and/or industry.', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits and more', 'Deep knowledge of advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.', 'Collaborates with business partners to develop technical /business approaches and new or enhanced technical tools.', 'Manages large and complex analytical projects from data exploration, model building, performance evaluation and testing.', 'Strong skills to effectively communicate and negotiate across the business and in the external health care environment', '5-10 or more years of progressively complex related experience.']

['', 'Graduate degree in a technical or quantitative field', 'Contributing to academic research papers', 'Demonstrated interest in or knowledge of investments, asset allocation, portfolio optimization, and cash flow modeling techniques', 'Strong mathematical and statistical modeling skills', 'Experience applying advanced quantitative techniques to solving highly complex data-intensive problems', 'Graduate degree in a technical or quantitative fieldPrior experience at a buy-side (equities) firm in a quantitative research or portfolio management roleExperience applying advanced quantitative techniques to solving highly complex data-intensive problemsCreativity, modeling intuition, superior analytical and problem-solving skillsStrong mathematical and statistical modeling skillsDemonstrated interest in or knowledge of investments, asset allocation, portfolio optimization, and cash flow modeling techniques', 'Prior experience at a buy-side (equities) firm in a quantitative research or portfolio management role', 'A tier-1 Private Equity firm is seeking individuals with a strong Quantitative Research background who are interested in utilizing their expertise in the Private Equity space. They are looking for someone with demonstrated abilities or interests in portfolio construction, factor modeling, asset allocation, alpha generation, and python.', 'Developing investment models and shaping insights into alpha production and asset allocation', 'Develop and maintain automated tools to assist with investment due diligence and asset allocation decisions', 'Developing investment models and shaping insights into alpha production and asset allocationDevelop and maintain automated tools to assist with investment due diligence and asset allocation decisionsConstructing data sets and applying quantitative techniques to generate investment insightsConduct model backtesting and stress testing analysisContributing to academic research papersAdvise on potential portfolio outcomes', 'Other responsibilities include:', 'Creativity, modeling intuition, superior analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Constructing data sets and applying quantitative techniques to generate investment insights', 'Advise on potential portfolio outcomes', 'Experience:', 'This talented and experienced quantitative researcher will be responsible for conducting rigorous quantitative analysis utilizing advanced statistical techniques to test hypothesis, generate investment insights, and develop portfolio construction and asset allocation tools utilizing proprietary data sets for private equity investing.', 'Conduct model backtesting and stress testing analysis']

['', 'Analyzed, reviewed and translated product management artifacts like product requirements documents and product roadmaps, into actionable engineering requirements documents.', 'Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is required', "Building and deploying large-scale, complex data processing pipelines.Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is requiredPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQueryYou've led planning, launching, optimizing, and refactoring phases of data pipeline platforms.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.", 'Evaluated new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', "You've led planning, launching, optimizing, and refactoring phases of data pipeline platforms.", 'The Life Sciences Product team is looking for a Senior Data Engineer to help us build next generation data pipelines, data infrastructure and databases, and to develop data processing that is scalable, reliable and automated. The ideal candidate has demonstrated experience going from understanding business use cases and whiteboard designs all the way through to the nuances of implementation and rollout. The ideal candidate would have experience with product development and has gone through different phases of product growth and maturity.', 'Collaborated closely with the Product and Program Management team to build out new data features.', 'Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate our data infrastructure and our data pipelines.', 'Collaborated with Data Scientists to implement descriptive, forecasting, and predictive algorithms and models using latest technologies.', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. Komodo Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data processing pipelines.', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'What you bring to Komodo:', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'Designed, developed, and implemented data infrastructure, data pipelines and data processing code for product features.', 'This is an opportunity to help solve complex challenges, and be a part of a team of folks accomplished in diverse Engineering disciplines; focused on using the best of what lies at the forefront of technology and skills to address complex, real-world problems in the Healthcare and Life Science space. Some of the tools we use are: Spark, Snowflake, Airflow, Python, Amazon AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Kubernetes, and Docker.', 'Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery', 'Designed, developed, and implemented data infrastructure, data pipelines and data processing code for product features.Analyzed, reviewed and translated product management artifacts like product requirements documents and product roadmaps, into actionable engineering requirements documents.Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate our data infrastructure and our data pipelines.Evaluated new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborated closely with the Product and Program Management team to build out new data features.Collaborated with Data Scientists to implement descriptive, forecasting, and predictive algorithms and models using latest technologies.', 'Experience with...', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health']
