job_title: Research Scientist I - PRISM, Hit Triage
company: Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard
job_text: ['', ' Ph.D. degree in cellular biology, chemical biology, cancer biology or a related discipline with 0-2+ years of research experience in cancer biology and drug discovery. ', ' Previous experience in a collaborative team environment is critical for success. ', ' Navigate and interpret PRISM high-throughput screening data to prioritize hits and present hypotheses and recommendations ', 'Job Description', ' Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Protected Veterans/Disabled ', ' Knowledge of chemical biology and/or chemistry preferred. ', 'Overview', ' Excellent communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with all levels of staff and with internal departmental contacts, as well as external collaborators, in a fast-paced environment. ', ' Write scientific papers and give presentations at internal and external meetings. ', ' Check out this video for a look into our community!', ' All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status. ', ' Plan, optimize, and interpret the results of genome-scale genetic modifier screens (e.g., CRISPR knockout and CRISPR activation) ', ' Extensive tissue culture and lentiviral infection experience. ', ' EEO is The Law - click here for more information ', ' Navigate and interpret PRISM high-throughput screening data to prioritize hits and present hypotheses and recommendations  Plan, optimize, and interpret the results of genome-scale genetic modifier screens (e.g., CRISPR knockout and CRISPR activation)  Identify new technologies/ assays to help identify mechanism of action  Work independently and actively mentor junior team members.  Write scientific papers and give presentations at internal and external meetings. ', ' Must be able to use sound judgment to handle a variety of tasks and to shift priorities simultaneously, as well as to effectively solve problems. ', ' Ability to effectively interpret experimental data. ', ' Strong analytical skills and ability to navigate and manipulate large screening datasets; basic programming proficiency (e.g., in R) preferred. ', 'Qualifications', ' Must have a thorough understanding of genetics, genomics, and cell biology ', ' Practical experience with basic molecular and cellular biology techniques including PCR, cloning, protein-based assays, cell-viability assays, and CRISPR and/or shRNA-mediated gene perturbation. ', 'Check out this video for a look into our community!', ' Ph.D. degree in cellular biology, chemical biology, cancer biology or a related discipline with 0-2+ years of research experience in cancer biology and drug discovery.  Extensive tissue culture and lentiviral infection experience.  Practical experience with basic molecular and cellular biology techniques including PCR, cloning, protein-based assays, cell-viability assays, and CRISPR and/or shRNA-mediated gene perturbation.  Must have a thorough understanding of genetics, genomics, and cell biology  Ability to effectively interpret experimental data.  Strong analytical skills and ability to navigate and manipulate large screening datasets; basic programming proficiency (e.g., in R) preferred.  Knowledge of chemical biology and/or chemistry preferred.  Previous experience in a collaborative team environment is critical for success.  Excellent communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with all levels of staff and with internal departmental contacts, as well as external collaborators, in a fast-paced environment.  Must be able to use sound judgment to handle a variety of tasks and to shift priorities simultaneously, as well as to effectively solve problems. ', ' Work independently and actively mentor junior team members. ', ' Identify new technologies/ assays to help identify mechanism of action ']

['', 'Maximize ROAS for each game, channel and user cohort, ensuring acquired customers meet objectives for overall revenue and volume.', 'Own our Growth marketing service across a portfolio of awesome games and apps spanning a variety of channels worldwide.', 'Collaborate with creative teams to construct exciting campaigns, landing pages, creative directions, and messaging.', 'Positive attitude, passion for games, and a love for problem solving.', 'Excellent communication skills to develop strong relationships with creative partners.', " Positive attitude, passion for games, and a love for problem solving. 5+ years of mobile experience managing mobile performance-based user acquisition campaigns. Highly analytical, with deep understanding of cohort analysis and customer acquisition metrics including LTV, CPC, CPA, and payback period. Experience with A/B and multivariate testing and creative, copy, and landing page development. Excellent communication skills to develop strong relationships with creative partners. Has built a team of successful people. Excited to work in a lean, small team environment working with the world's leading developers. ", 'Help Tilting Point becoming a beacon of Growth Marketing excellence on the mobile apps market.', 'Your Future at Tilting Point', 'Tilting Point provides equal employment opportunity to all individuals regardless of their race, color, creed, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by state, federal, or local law. Discrimination of any type will not be tolerated. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, promotion, termination, time off, and compensation.', 'Highly analytical, with deep understanding of cohort analysis and customer acquisition metrics including LTV, CPC, CPA, and payback period.', ' Own our Growth marketing service across a portfolio of awesome games and apps spanning a variety of channels worldwide. Maximize ROAS for each game, channel and user cohort, ensuring acquired customers meet objectives for overall revenue and volume. Collaborate with creative teams to construct exciting campaigns, landing pages, creative directions, and messaging. Work closely with our Data Scientist team to consistently upgrade and enhance our User Acquisition Tech. Build and groom our Growth marketing team successfully. Help Tilting Point becoming a beacon of Growth Marketing excellence on the mobile apps market. ', 'Work closely with our Data Scientist team to consistently upgrade and enhance our User Acquisition Tech.', 'Has built a team of successful people.', '5+ years of mobile experience managing mobile performance-based user acquisition campaigns.', 'Experience with A/B and multivariate testing and creative, copy, and landing page development.', 'Build and groom our Growth marketing team successfully.', "Excited to work in a lean, small team environment working with the world's leading developers.", 'Your XP & Skills']

['', 'Develop perception algorithms to detect and identify objects, etc. for autonomous driving systems.', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.\xa0', 'Our team is commercializing a world-class driverless system. The Motional team is behind some of the industry’s largest leaps forward in the last decade, including the first fully-autonomous cross-country drive in the U.S, the launch of the world’s first robotaxi pilot, and operation of the world’s most-established public robotaxi fleet. Strategically formed by Hyundai Motor Group, one of the world’s largest vehicle manufacturers offering smart mobility solutions, and Aptiv, a global technology leader in advanced safety, electrification, and vehicle connectivity, Motional is fundamentally changing how people move through their lives.\xa0', 'Partner with colleagues to design innovative algorithms in motion planning, and control.', "What You'll Bring:", 'Experience with MATLAB.', 'Experience with simulation environments', 'Develop perception algorithms to detect and identify objects, etc. for autonomous driving systems.Collect data and analyze the results of benchmarks, road, and regression tests.Partner with colleagues to design innovative algorithms in motion planning, and control.Integrate perception software into prototype autonomous driving systems.', '5+ years of experience in C++, Python, or other programming languages.', 'Our Principal Research Scientist will play a key role in making the vehicle of the future a reality by developing technologies that deliver a turnkey, fully autonomous driving system for our customers, and enable Mobility on Demand (MoD). As we expand our global footprint, we are looking for exceptional perception engineering talent to research and apply innovative solutions to our products. Do you enjoy working with prototypes? Do you have a knack for developing algorithms to identify objects and occlusions? If the answers are yes, we’re looking for you.', "What You'll Do:", 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to learn.', 'About Us', '\ufeff', 'Experience with mathematical modeling.', 'Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Robotics, ECE, Computer Science, or a related field.Experience with Radar, LiDAR, computer vision, sensor fusion, probabilistic perception, point cloud processing, object tracking, data association, optimization, and/or machine learning is a plus.5+ years of experience in C++, Python, or other programming languages.Experience with MATLAB.Experience with mathematical modeling.Experience with simulation environmentsStrong problem-solving skills with the ability to learn.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Flexible and creative thinking.', 'Integrate perception software into prototype autonomous driving systems.', 'Experience with Radar, LiDAR, computer vision, sensor fusion, probabilistic perception, point cloud processing, object tracking, data association, optimization, and/or machine learning is a plus.', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.', 'About Us\xa0', 'Flexible and creative thinking.', 'About this position:', 'Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Robotics, ECE, Computer Science, or a related field.', 'Headquartered in Boston, Motional has operations in the US and Asia. For more information, visit www.Motional.com and follow us on Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.', 'Collect data and analyze the results of benchmarks, road, and regression tests.']

['', ' Staff Scientist ', '  Medical Technologist  – Desired experience includes: Certified by the American Society for Clinical Pathology; Experience in phlebotomy; Experience with various hematology and chemistry systems; Experience working with whole blood and component collections using an apheresis unit; An understanding of HIPAA and securing donor information. ', 'Citizenship And Clearance Requirements', ' Senior Research Investigators ', ' Senior Biomedical Research Associates – ', ' We are an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer of individuals with disabilities and veterans. We are proud to state that we do not discriminate in employment decisions on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status. If you are a person with a disability and you need an accommodation during the application process, please click ', '  Staff Scientist  – Desired experience includes: Experience performing thromboelastography, aggregometry, and other techniques used to determine contribution to coagulopathy; Experience working with cellular components that contribute to normal and dysfunctional coagulation of whole blood; Experience with cold stored platelet, freeze dried plasma, and/or testing of blood components under different environmental and physiological conditions; Experience leading small teams of technical staff; Experience with mechanotransduction non-Newtonian flow, navier-stokes, and the rheological behavior of blood. ', ' Must be a US citizen. ', ' Medical Laboratory Technician – ', ' May be required to travel to annual conferences up to 15 days per year. ', '  Develop and submit proposals for research funding to extramural and intramural Department of Defense (DoD) organizations to include but not limited to the U.S. Army Medical Research and Development Command (USAMRDC), the Congressionally Directed Medical Research Program (CDMRP), biotechnology companies, foundations, government, and research institutes.   Assist with developing a project management approach to aid Blood and Coagulation Research Department develop their project management plan (PMP) for proposal/project, providing a firm and well-documented technical foundation for the program/capability.   Conduct laboratory research in reference to established project management plan while adhering to federal, state, and local statutes, rules, and regulations.   Conduct animal laboratory research in reference to established SEP/protocol/proposal while adhering to federal, state, and local statutes, rules, and regulations.   Provide support and management of research blood donor center operations to include: 1) donor screening, consenting, and collection of blood and blood products, 2) process specimens, analyze samples, and verify results, 3) general laboratory support and management, and 4) document and records management.   May be required to travel to annual conferences up to 15 days per year.  ', '   Biomedical Research Associates  – Desired experience includes: Experience with flow cytometry and data analysis software; Capability to build panels from scratch and document panel objectives and procedures for future use; An understanding of cellular surface antigens, fluorochromes, and flow cytometer function/capability; Experience working alone and unsupervised while still providing data and running panels in a timely manner; Experience with isolation and detection of the cellular populations and ability to quantitatively determine if change to population has occurred; Experience normalizing data and setting gate in accordance with best flow cytometric practices to ensure sound and accurate data.    Senior Biomedical Research Associates – Desired experience includes: Experience with flow cytometry and data analysis software; Capability to build panels from scratch and document panel objectives and procedures for future use; An understanding of cellular surface antigens, fluorochromes, and flow cytometer function/capability; Experience working alone and unsupervised while still providing data and running panels in a timely manner; Experience with isolation and detection of the cellular populations and ability to quantitatively determine if change to population has occurred; Experience normalizing data and setting gate in accordance with best flow cytometric practices to ensure sound and accurate data.    Medical Laboratory Technician – Desired experience includes: Associate’s degree in a related field; Experience with collection of small volumes, collection of whole blood units, apheresis platelets and plasma, and manual blood component separation; experience with sample processing and analysis on clinical coagulation and hematology analyzers, blood smears, slide preparations, and manual differential counts, and manual blood component separation.    Medical Technologist  – Desired experience includes: Certified by the American Society for Clinical Pathology; Experience in phlebotomy; Experience with various hematology and chemistry systems; Experience working with whole blood and component collections using an apheresis unit; An understanding of HIPAA and securing donor information.    Data Analyst – Desired experience includes: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field; experience with Microsoft tools; experience in providing data analysis in DoD/biomedical research field.    Staff Scientists  – Desired experience includes: Experience performing proteomics and molecular biology; Experience leading small teams of technical staff; Ability to learn new equipment/procedures for implementation in novel studies; Ability to prepare DNA/RNA library for sequencing and analyzing data; Experience performing various analytical techniques used to quantify biological markers; Ability to perform Quantitative Real-Time Polymerase Chain Reaction and determine gene expression levels while selecting the appropriate gene for normalization; Experience writing about the chemical and biomolecular interactions that occur before, during and after combat injuries; Experience developing a hypothesis driven scientific approach to solve complex problems.    Staff Scientist  – Desired experience includes: Experience performing thromboelastography, aggregometry, and other techniques used to determine contribution to coagulopathy; Experience working with cellular components that contribute to normal and dysfunctional coagulation of whole blood; Experience with cold stored platelet, freeze dried plasma, and/or testing of blood components under different environmental and physiological conditions; Experience leading small teams of technical staff; Experience with mechanotransduction non-Newtonian flow, navier-stokes, and the rheological behavior of blood.    Senior Research Investigators  – Desired experience includes: Experience with in vitro testing of pharmaceuticals for FDA approval; Experience developing high throughput cellular models for reclassifying current FDA approved drugs and therapeutics; Capable of supporting multiple proposals in a functionalized matrix organization; Experience creating standard operating procedures for the conduct of laboratory work.  ', '  Must be a US citizen.   Must obtain a favorable National Agency Check with Inquiries (NACI). ', 'LI#JR1', 'Lead investigators meetings and protocol training meetings.', ' Master’s Degree, PhD, PharmD, or M.D. with clinical trial/drug development Phase 1-3 expertise highly desirable The ideal candidate will have 5+ years technical, operational and managerial experience in planning, executing, reporting and publishing clinical studies in a pharmaceutical company and/or contract research organization The skills required for success in the job include scientific and analytic ability, ability to think strategically and tactically, an interest in applied clinical research, ability to work effectively in multifunctional and multinational teams, as well as the ability to multitask and prioritize Proven experience in developing effective relationships with key investigators    ', and Phase II data reviews with investigators.', 'Set up and management of investigator initiated clinical and/or pre-clinical trials', 'Summary Of Key Responsibilities', 'Assist in forecasting trial resource needs.', 'Develop effective working relationship with key investigators in assigned programs to optimize scientific quality/innovation of clinical study design, execution, reporting and publication. Contribute to trial-related advisory boards. Lead investigators meetings and protocol training meetings. The Clinical Scientist is responsible for analyzing and interpreting study data from an individual study and translating study level clinical data across the program of studies for a particular drug, ensuring that all studies are conducted with the highest level of ethical and safety standards and are in compliance with GCP and all regulatory policies.   ', 'Assist in developing clinical outsourcing specifications to facilitate bid templates and selection of CROs and other 3rd parties. ', ' Working with the Vice President as well as Medical Director(s), to create key strategic documents including clinical development plans, protocol concepts and full protocols for product(s) in early development along with contributing to activities for product(s) in later stages of development, including NDA filings. Contribute to the development of clinical sections of regulatory documents such as Investigators’ Brochures, briefing books, safety updates, IND/NDA submission documents, responses to Health Authorities questions, and contribute to Clinical Development Plans Performing medical data review during study execution to ensure integrity of accruing study data and appropriate safety follow-up. Set up and management of investigator initiated clinical and/or pre-clinical trials Develop effective working relationship with key investigators in assigned programs to optimize scientific quality/innovation of clinical study design, execution, reporting and publication. Contribute to trial-related advisory boards. Lead investigators meetings and protocol training meetings. The Clinical Scientist is responsible for analyzing and interpreting study data from an individual study and translating study level clinical data across the program of studies for a particular drug, ensuring that all studies are conducted with the highest level of ethical and safety standards and are in compliance with GCP and all regulatory policies.    Prepare and run dose escalation meetings with investigators (phase 1). Coordinate the real time availability of quality clinical trial data, including safety, efficacy, pharmacokinetic and biomarker data, to provide consolidated information for dose escalation meetings and Phase II data reviews with investigators. Assist in forecasting trial resource needs. Assist in developing clinical outsourcing specifications to facilitate bid templates and selection of CROs and other 3rd parties. The Clinical Scientist is responsible for analyzing and interpreting study data from an individual study and translating study level clinical data across the program of studies for a particular drug, ensuring that all studies are conducted with the highest level of ethical and safety standards and are in compliance with GCP and all regulatory policies. job_title: Associate Research Scientist, Mass Spectrometry Proteomics
job_text: ['', 'Position Summary: ', 'Education, Certification/Licensure, and/or Experience', ' Detail oriented with ability to capture and record complex scientific data accurately and reliably. ', ' Maintain laboratory records in accordance with company standards. ', 'Requirements', ' Customer Service Focus – Demonstrate a focus on listening to and understanding client/customer needs and then delighting the client/customer by exceeding service and quality expectations. ', 'Job Responsibilities', ' May perform reviews of analytical data for acceptability of calibration, control values, response curve characteristics and quantitative limits. Provide reports and documentation for quality control performance of instruments and data sets. ', ' Collaborate with other Research Scientists and Associates to design and conduct experiments, collect data and analyze results in support of department project development objectives. ', ' For proteomic data processing positions: desire experience with vender specific proteomic data analysis software platforms, as well as third-party software platforms such as Max Quant, Byonic, Skyline, and Scaffold. Knowledge and experience with programing platforms such as R (R Studio), and other informatics tools such as MS Stats is a plus. ', ' Accepts other duties as assigned. ', ' Ability to problem solve independently and in collaboration with others. ', ' Drive for Results (Service, Quality, and Continuous Improvement) – Ensure procedures and processes are in place that lead to delivery of quality results and continually reassess their effectiveness to achieve continuous improvement. ', ' Follow standard workflows, and develop and optimize novel workflows for the preparation of various biological samples for analysis using mass spectrometry. ', ' Experience and extensive knowledge in the mass spec-based proteomics field of science, with an emphasis on protein biomarker discovery, analysis, and quantitation, as it relates to cancer biology. ', ' Communication – Proficient verbal and written communication skills. Willingness to share and receive information and ideas from all levels of the organization in order to achieve the desired results. ', ' Operate, maintain, and calibrate LC-MS/MS systems. Diagnose and troubleshoot instrument problems and schedule repair service as required. ', ' Operate, develop methods, and maintain automated platforms for sample preparation. ', ' Follow all standard operating procedures, safety and security policies and prescribed practices, policies and guidelines; use Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) manual as reference to support work performed. Completes all necessary paperwork related to job duties. ', ' Strong team skills, with ability to both lead and work with other employees in a positive and constructive way. ', ' Ability to develop and deliver complex directions and develop, deliver and defend complicated scientific project plans. ', ' Interested parties should apply on-line and email their CV/Resume and Cover Letter to Kristen Robinson at   krobinson@carisls.com   ! QualificationsThank you for applying!Your resume and application will be carefully reviewed against the requirements of our current open positions. Should your experience and skills match an available position, you will be contacted by a member of our recruiting team.Thank you for your interest in Caris Life Sciences.Sincerely,Caris Life Sciences', 'Knowledge, Skills, and Experience', ' Strong knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite, specifically Access, Word, Excel, Outlook, and general working knowledge of Internet for business use. ', ' For mass spectrometry operation positions: desire experience with operating, maintaining, and troubleshooting Thermo Scientific Orbitrap type mass spec instruments, such as the quadrupole-Orbitrap systems or the Tribrid systems. Experience with other vender platforms will be also be considered. Experience with operating, maintaining, and troubleshooting nano-LC and UHPLC chromatography systems is required. ', ' ! ', ' krobinson@carisls.com ', '  B.S. or M.S. in chemistry-related or biology-related sciences.   Experience and extensive knowledge in the mass spec-based proteomics field of science, with an emphasis on protein biomarker discovery, analysis, and quantitation, as it relates to cancer biology.  ', ' Process mass spec proteomic data using established workflows for biomarker discovery and relative and absolute quantitation; for bottom-up, middle- and top-down data analysis; using data dependent, data independent, PRM\\MRM acquired data. ', ' Excellent protein biochemistry or molecular biology skills and experience with implementing biological sample preparation strategies for downstream mass spec analysis. ', ' B.S. or M.S. in chemistry-related or biology-related sciences. ', ' Outstanding understanding of scientific process, including hypothesis development, experimental design, selection of controls, etc. Ability to weigh the relative pros and cons of alternative experimental designs and make decisions based on a thorough understanding of the potential problems. ', ' Excellent analytical chemistry skills with a working knowledge and hands-on experience developing bottom-up and top-, middle-down proteomic data collection methods using nano- and microliter flow LC-MS systems. ', ' Excellent written and verbal data presentation skills and the ability to use software tools to produce high impact presentations of data, highlighting key takeaways. ', ' Teamwork – Commitment to the successful achievement of team and organizational goals through a desire to participate with and help other members of the team. ', ' For proteomic sample preparation positions: desire experience with various standard in-solution and in-gel proteomic sample prep protocols for bottom-up mass spec data collection, as well as with alternative workflows, such as FASP, S-trap, etc. and automated systems such as the Bravo. Desire working experience with mass-tag labeling protocols using TMT or ITRAQ, or SILAC. ', 'Qualifications', 'Interested parties should apply on-line and email their CV/Resume and Cover Letter to Kristen Robinson at   krobinson@carisls.com   ! QualificationsThank you for applying!Your resume and application will be carefully reviewed against the requirements of our current open positions. Should your experience and skills match an available position, you will be contacted by a member of our recruiting team.Thank you for your interest in Caris Life Sciences.Sincerely,Caris Life Sciences', ' Engage in continuous learning and skill development, including both scientific and laboratory technology education. ', ' Assists as needed to perform other related duties and special projects as required. ', ' Assist in the preparation of scholarly articles for publication. Present results of independent research; write reports/summaries for internal communications as well as patents and complete scientific papers for peer reviewed journals, publishing abstracts, manuscripts, or industry requirements. ', ' Good business judgment and ability to align scientific goals with business objectives. ', ' High level of knowledge with respect to the mathematical methods and theories underlying the various concepts and strategies used for processing mass spec proteomic acquired data. ['\xa0', 'Some of the things you will be involved in:', 'Identifies new pricing segment or product structure opportunities and directs or supports the analytical work necessary to assist Product Managers with competitive analyses, actuarial analyses and their ultimate deployment.', 'Develops analytical strategies to penetrate and expand markets for our non-standard auto product.', 'Indentify hires, manage and develop product staff to grow the team', 'Responsible for ongoing modifications to forms, agency manuals, product announcements, etc.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Do you have some experience of the P&C industry (ideally personal lines)?', 'Determines profitable and salable price levels and program structures for all company programs.', 'Obtains regulatory approval for filings', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Do you have a good sense of what is "good business" - in other words commercial acumen?', 'Our client is looking to recruit a Senior Product Manager with P&C insurance experience (ideally personal lines auto but other lines are ok). This is a role with significant autonomy and responsibility. You will be responsible for the Profit and Loss (P&L) of a large state or group of smaller states and ultimately will manage other Product Managers and/or analysts.\xa0This role is responsible for developing program structures and pricing to achieve the company’s aggressive growth and earnings targets.\xa0The SPM will be directly involved in analyses to dramatically improve point-of-quote risk selection, company placement and price segmentation and will collaborate with our Head of Analytics and other Product staff to standardize and automate the rate revision process.\xa0Identifying and developing new rating variables or product structures are key responsibilities of the role.', 'Identifies product/pricing issues and opportunities and performs or directs the analytical work necessary to complete national, group, state or product level analyses.', 'The base salary will be very competitive (likely range $130-150k) with a 30% cash bonus. The salary and bonus offered will be on the basis of the quality of experience that the candidate brings to the table. Please note that we are also looking for a Product Manager (with a lower comp and bonus range). You only need to apply once and we will evaluate what role you are best suited to.', 'We are NOT looking for an actuary, a machine learning data scientist etc. This is a product manager role, not an actuarial pricing role. A diligent, conscientous insurance professional with good solid spreadsheet skills and perhaps a BI tool and/or SAS/R would be more than enough. What matters is that you can get things done, you spot opportunities and you work well with colleagues. As mentioned earlier, this role is ideally tailored to a Product Manager who wants to step up.', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Do you have good GENERAL analytical skills (perhaps you've used SAS, R or Python, or a business intelligence tool such as Tableau)?", 'Responsible for policy form and endorsement construction and ancillary form construction (cancellation notices, applications for insurance, etc.)', 'Indentify hires, manage and develop product staff to grow the teamDevelops analytical strategies to penetrate and expand markets for our non-standard auto product.Determines profitable and salable price levels and program structures for all company programs.Responsible for extraction and analysis of statistical data for decision-making purposes.Identifies product/pricing issues and opportunities and performs or directs the analytical work necessary to complete national, group, state or product level analyses.Identifies new pricing segment or product structure opportunities and directs or supports the analytical work necessary to assist Product Managers with competitive analyses, actuarial analyses and their ultimate deployment.Obtains regulatory approval for filingsResponsible for policy form and endorsement construction and ancillary form construction (cancellation notices, applications for insurance, etc.)Responsible for ongoing modifications to forms, agency manuals, product announcements, etc.', 'If the answer to the above is yes, we would be interested to see your application. Our client is a holding company that underwrites and distributes primarily non-standard personal automobile insurance products to individuals in Southern US. They offer coverage that is typically provided to insureds who are unable to obtain standard insurance because of their payment history, driving record, age, vehicle type, or other factors. These policies generally require higher premiums than standard policies for comparable coverage. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are currently licenced to write auto insurance in 24 states and active in 10.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Are you a highly driven and motivated P&C insurance professional with a solid background in P&C product management?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Would you be interested to work for a private, dynamic, entrepreneurial company?', 'Responsible for extraction and analysis of statistical data for decision-making purposes.', 'The role will be remote/WFH until covid-19 has been brought under control. Thereafter it will be office-based.']

job_title: Principal Scientist II, Drug Designer, Oncology Research Chemistry
job_text: ['', 'Embraces the ideas of others, nurtures innovation and manages to reality', 'Track record of having impacted programs through drug design.', 'Key Leadership Competencies', 'Builds strong relationships with peers and cross functionally with partners outside of team to enable higher performance.', 'For The Principal Research Scientist II Level', 'Creates a learning environment, open to suggestions and experimentation for improvement.', 'Ability to take an initial hit and design to improve potency and address metabolic issues.', 'Significant Work Activities', 'Schedule', 'Raises the bar and is never satisfied with the status quo.', 'Clear communication of the results of computational experiments, interpretation of structural models and rationalization of SAR to team members accelerating the discovery of new drugs is expected.', 'Learns fast, grasps the ‘essence’ and can change the course quickly where indicated.', 'Experience working with multi-disciplinary teams is required.', 'Expert knowledge of the state-of-the-art for computational chemistry, and experience with commercial molecular modeling packages and data mining software from such vendors as Schrodinger and Chemical Computing Group is expected including experience in most of the following areas: structure-based/ligand-based drug design, homology modeling, cheminformatics, ligand/receptor docking, molecular dynamics, quantum mechanics, fragment-based design and diversity/similarity analysis.', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Ability to script workflows and implement new algorithms in a high-performance computing environment is preferred.', 'Job Type', 'About AbbVie', 'Qualifications: ', 'Qualifications', 'Travel', 'Demonstrates excellent problem-solving skills.', ' BS, MS, or PHD in Computational Chemistry or related discipline, with typically 16+ (BS), 14+ (MS) or 8+ (PhD) years of experience in the application of molecular modeling to drug discovery. Expert knowledge of the state-of-the-art for computational chemistry, and experience with commercial molecular modeling packages and data mining software from such vendors as Schrodinger and Chemical Computing Group is expected including experience in most of the following areas: structure-based/ligand-based drug design, homology modeling, cheminformatics, ligand/receptor docking, molecular dynamics, quantum mechanics, fragment-based design and diversity/similarity analysis. Ability to script workflows and implement new algorithms in a high-performance computing environment is preferred. Experience working with multi-disciplinary teams is required. Clear communication of the results of computational experiments, interpretation of structural models and rationalization of SAR to team members accelerating the discovery of new drugs is expected. Demonstrates excellent problem-solving skills. Ability to take an initial hit and design to improve potency and address metabolic issues. Track record of having impacted programs through drug design. Key Leadership Competencies Builds strong relationships with peers and cross functionally with partners outside of team to enable higher performance. Learns fast, grasps the ‘essence’ and can change the course quickly where indicated. Raises the bar and is never satisfied with the status quo. Creates a learning environment, open to suggestions and experimentation for improvement. Embraces the ideas of others, nurtures innovation and manages to reality ', 'BS, MS, or PHD in Computational Chemistry or related discipline, with typically 16+ (BS), 14+ (MS) or 8+ (PhD) years of experience in the application of molecular modeling to drug discovery.', 'Job Level Code']

['Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. ', 'Position Description', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Position Description ', 'Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. ', 'Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. ', 'The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. ', 'Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. ', 'This position is integrated into the development team and responsible for research and development around algorithm strategies, pricing signals, and TCA.  The position also will work with salespeople and clients to explain and customize our execution offering. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. 2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Required Experience/Skills:', 'NEW YORK ', 'FULL-TIME ', 'Required Experience/Skills: ', 'Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. ', 'Data Scientist', 'Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. ', '2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). ', ' ', 'Data Scientist ', 'The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. ']

['', 'Job Code: ', 'Your Superpowers', 'You’re energized by the prospect of rolling up your sleeves to tackle important problems in drug development and reimbursement', 'You want to build a career in clinical data analysis (biostatistics, health economics, RWE, etc.)', 'You are problem focused, creative, and practical in how you apply data to problems', 'You are an excellent communicator – you can use data to tell a clear and compelling story and can communicate complex analyses to many types of stakeholders', 'Bonus points if you have experience in genomic data analysis or oncology data experience', 'You hold a Masters or PhD in biostatistics, epidemiology, health economics, public health, computational biology or another quantitative scientific discipline, with 1-3 years of work experienceYou are problem focused, creative, and practical in how you apply data to problemsYou love working with data and live for the “aha!” moments where you use it to answer meaningful questionsYou have experience applying observational and statistical methods to conduct rigorous scientific analysesYou’re energized by the prospect of rolling up your sleeves to tackle important problems in drug development and reimbursementYou can program fluently in a modern statistical programming software (e.g., R) and want to develop your skills further. You’ve worked with data scientists and software engineers to put code into production – you think about scalable ways to improve the reach of your work.You want to build a career in clinical data analysis (biostatistics, health economics, RWE, etc.)Bonus points if you have experience in genomic data analysis or oncology data experienceYou are an excellent communicator – you can use data to tell a clear and compelling story and can communicate complex analyses to many types of stakeholdersYou have a curious mind and are excited to learn new skills, tools, and about novel types and uses of data.Job Code: ', 'The Impact You Will Have', 'Our mission is to make innovative drugs affordable and accessible. You will be instrumental in making that vision a reality. We are working to build a truly modern and efficient clinical development organization, with data at the core of what we do. You will play a key role in analyzing this data in support of our development programs.', 'You have a curious mind and are excited to learn new skills, tools, and about novel types and uses of data.', 'You love working with data and live for the “aha!” moments where you use it to answer meaningful questions', 'You have experience applying observational and statistical methods to conduct rigorous scientific analyses', 'You can program fluently in a modern statistical programming software (e.g., R) and want to develop your skills further. ', 'You hold a Masters or PhD in biostatistics, epidemiology, health economics, public health, computational biology or another quantitative scientific discipline, with 1-3 years of work experience', 'EQRx is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'You’ve worked with data scientists and software engineers to put code into production – you think about scalable ways to improve the reach of your work.']

['', 'Applied Business Acumen: Provides recommendations to business stakeholders to solve complex business issues. Develops business cases for projects with a projected return on investment or cost savings. Translates business requirements into projects, activities, and tasks and aligns to overall business strategy. Serves as an interpreter and conduit to connect business needs with tangible solutions and results. Develops knowledge of current data science and analytics trends.Data Source Identification: Supports the understanding of the priority order of requirements and service level agreements. Helps identify the most suitable source for data that is fit for purpose. Performs initial data quality checks on extracted data.Data Modeling: Analyzes complex data elements, systems, data flows, dependencies, and relationships to contribute to conceptual, physical, and logical data models. Develops the Logical Data Model and Physical Data Models including data warehouse and data mart designs. Develops efficient data flows. Analyzes data-related system integration challenges and proposes appropriate solutions. Creates training documentation and trains end-users on data modeling. Oversees the tasks of less experienced programmers and stipulates system troubleshooting supports.Code Development and Testing: Writes code to develop the required solution and application features by determining the appropriate programming language and leveraging business, technical, and data requirements. This includes broad tissue culture expertise, biochemical assay technologies, and protein and RNA expression analysis.', ' Medical/Dental Plans Health Reimbursement Accounts Life and AD&D Insurance Short and Long Term Disability 401(k) with Company Match Paid Time off and Sick Days Paid Holidays Discounted Gym Membership', 'CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer', ' Life and AD&D Insurance', ' Expertise in flow cytometry (FACS) analysis of cell surface expression in cultured cells and isolated human or rodent primary cells.', 'Your Right to Work', ' The incumbent is expected to independently develop, perform, interpret, and troubleshoot a broad range of in vitro assays including immune cell profiling in blood and tissues, functional assays using primary cells such as T cells, NK cells and macrophages, cytokine profiling, as well as cytotoxicity/apoptosis assays using primary and/or cultured cells.', ' He/she is also expected to effectively present both internally at team and departmental meetings and externally to collaborators and scientific communities.', ' Great work/life balance', ' Experience in quantitative determination of cytokine levels using biochemical and molecular techniques including but not limited to ELISA, Western, and qPCR. Experience with multiplexed technologies is a plus.', ' Experience with small animal handling, drug administration, blood withdrawals, tissue collection, primary cell preparation is preferred.', ' 401(k) with Company Match', ' Communicate effectively at all levels, within teams, with internal and external collaborators. Strong organizational skills. Maintain research data and records with highest integrity. Ability to multitask in fast-paced environment.', ' Great work/life balance Growth Competitive Pay!', ' This hands-on position requires strong scientific training and laboratory skills in the immunology, immuno-oncology and oncology, as well as expertise in and dedication to innovative assay development and implementation. The incumbent is expected to independently develop, perform, interpret, and troubleshoot a broad range of in vitro assays including immune cell profiling in blood and tissues, functional assays using primary cells such as T cells, NK cells and macrophages, cytokine profiling, as well as cytotoxicity/apoptosis assays using primary and/or cultured cells. He/she will innovate and expand our assay portfolio by identifying, evaluating, and implementing new assay technologies through literature research, academic collaborations, and adaptation from other groups within the company. He/she is also expected to effectively present both internally at team and departmental meetings and externally to collaborators and scientific communities.', 'Email Your Resume In Word To', ' M.S. with over 3 years, or Ph.D. graduate with 0-3 years academic or industry experience in biological sciences, immunology, immuno-oncology or oncology.', ' Short and Long Term Disability', ' Discounted Gym Membership', 'Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. Be flexible and prioritize tasks based on team and company goals.', ' Paid Holidays', ' Experience in isolating, culturing, and functionally characterizing subsets of immune cells from human or rodent blood and tissues is strongly desired.', ' Innovative and independent in experimental design, execution, and troubleshooting.', ' Experience in cell-based immunological assays, such as T cell activation, T cell and NK cell-mediated toxicity, macrophage phagocytosis, and immune cell differentiation, is preferred.', ' M.S. with over 3 years, or Ph.D. graduate with 0-3 years academic or industry experience in biological sciences, immunology, immuno-oncology or oncology. Extensive experience in cell biology, biochemistry, and/or molecular biology. This includes broad tissue culture expertise, biochemical assay technologies, and protein and RNA expression analysis. Expertise in flow cytometry (FACS) analysis of cell surface expression in cultured cells and isolated human or rodent primary cells. Experience in quantitative determination of cytokine levels using biochemical and molecular techniques including but not limited to ELISA, Western, and qPCR. Experience with multiplexed technologies is a plus. Experience in isolating, culturing, and functionally characterizing subsets of immune cells from human or rodent blood and tissues is strongly desired. Experience in cell-based immunological assays, such as T cell activation, T cell and NK cell-mediated toxicity, macrophage phagocytosis, and immune cell differentiation, is preferred. Experience with cell proliferation and killing assays, using a variety plate-reader-based and/or flow-based methodologies is preferred. Other preferred cellular skills include fluorescence microscopy, 3D cell culture, and primary tumor cell culture and characterization. Experience with small animal handling, drug administration, blood withdrawals, tissue collection, primary cell preparation is preferred. Innovative and independent in experimental design, execution, and troubleshooting. Collaborative team player. Be flexible and prioritize tasks based on team and company goals. Communicate effectively at all levels, within teams, with internal and external collaborators. Strong organizational skills. Maintain research data and records with highest integrity. Ability to multitask in fast-paced environment.', ' This hands-on position requires strong scientific training and laboratory skills in the immunology, immuno-oncology and oncology, as well as expertise in and dedication to innovative assay development and implementation.', ' He/she will innovate and expand our assay portfolio by identifying, evaluating, and implementing new assay technologies through literature research, academic collaborations, and adaptation from other groups within the company.', ' Experience with cell proliferation and killing assays, using a variety plate-reader-based and/or flow-based methodologies is preferred. Other preferred cellular skills include fluorescence microscopy, 3D cell culture, and primary tumor cell culture and characterization.', ' Paid Time off and Sick Days']

job_title: Quantum Computing Applications Researcher (Yorktown Heights, NY)
job_text: ['', ' Strong verbal and written communication skills ', ' Job responsibilities: Collaborate with IBM Researchers to drive fundamental knowledge of quantum computing applications and algorithms in industry domains such as finance, optimization, machine learning, and chemistry. ['', 'Two years of demonstrable experience working with large and noisy datasets, and particular experience with datasets that have nevertheless have sparsity in some dimension (e.g., spatially, temporally) would be a big plus', '\xa0', 'We are data detectives and our job is difficult because although we have Big Data, we exist in a persistent state of spatio-temporal data starvation. The work is fast-paced, highly iterative, and continuously trading off between what works and what’s best. Along with our team of data scientists, you’ll work with product managers, sales, and software engineers to build data-driven products and solutions. ['', 'Qualified candidates must have:', '-Demonstrated ability to provide thought leadership and\xa0supervise (or mentor) junior data scientists.', '-At least five years of demonstrated success in database design, data mining, and reporting.', 'Leading food service distributor seeks an optimization expert to provide thought and people leadership throughout the organization. You will provide data driven insights to address key business questions within Supply Chain and beyond. By designing and creating data sets, developing analytical tools and reports, you will support the business, product owner and other members of the Insights and Analytics team. Ultimately, you will collaborate throughout the organization to create sustainable approaches, tools, processes, and programs to solve problems for business partners.', '-MS/PhD in an analytical field with AT LEAST five years of progressive data analytics/science industry experience in food distribution, retail, CPG or a related industry.', '-Five + years of optimization-oriented, analytical problem solving in an industrial setting with open source tools such as Python and R.', '-Pronounced consulting and influencing skills.', '\ufeff']

', 'Requirements', 'Ability to quickly and effectively share research results ', 'UX Researcher\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0REQ ID: 1098199', 'Experience with remote testing tools ', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written and oral presentations. ', 'Conduct and evaluate quantitative and qualitative research. ', 'Mentor and coach junior UX researchers on the team. ', 'Job Description', "If this sounds like something you'd be interested in please email Lindsey Moltz at lmoltz@apexsystems.com ", 'Bachelor’s or MS in a human behavior related field (or equivalent and demonstrable work experience) ', 'A strong desire for creative problem-solving with a positive attitude ', 'Use a diverse set of UX research tools. ', 'Conduct primary and secondary user research. ', 'Plan and implement user research strategies and methodologies. ', '\xa0 ', 'Responsibilities', 'Five or more years of UX research experience Bachelor’s or MS in a human behavior related field (or equivalent and demonstrable work experience) Ability to quickly and effectively share research results Ability to perform all research-related tasks including research, planning, evaluating, and iteration Ability to formulate specific, answerable, and practical questions Ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders and act as a strategic partner in product decisions Experience with remote testing tools A strong desire for creative problem-solving with a positive attitude Excellent time-management skills', 'Ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders and act as a strategic partner in product decisions ', 'Ability to formulate specific, answerable, and practical questions ', 'Five or more years of UX research experience ', 'Excellent time-management skills', 'Ability to perform all research-related tasks including research, planning, evaluating, and iteration ', 'Conduct primary and secondary user research. Conduct and evaluate quantitative and qualitative research. Perform market and ethnographic research. Work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and evaluate research topics. Plan and implement user research strategies and methodologies. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written and oral presentations. Mentor and coach junior UX researchers on the team. Perform usability studies with consumers. Ask questions, gather data, and analyze data. Use a diverse set of UX research tools. ', ' ', 'We are looking for an experienced UX researcher to join our team. You will be responsible for helping define and drive the future of our products. You will reveal what our users need from our products by conducting research, working with cross-functional teams, and performing usability studies. These responsibilities also include inspiring change, delivering oral and written presentations, evaluating qualitative and quantitative data, and helping the UX team better understand what would make a user’s experience more intuitive, accessible, and seamless. ', 'Perform market and ethnographic research. ', 'Work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and evaluate research topics. ']

['', '·\xa0\xa0Experience working with cross-functional teams', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Productionalize models', 'Remote', 'As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity in creating unique algorithms and leveraging your NLP expertise. You will add to their implementation for machine learning for both internal and external projects. With a rich and varied dataset to work from, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and algorithmic techniques to all types of data sets to detect trends before anybody else in the world.', 'THE ROLE', 'More than anything', 'KEYWORDS', 'USD $165,000 - $185,000 + Great PTO/Benefits + Equity', '·\xa0\xa0Extensive software engineering experience, working with models end to end', 'More than anything - You will need proven, commercial expereince as a machine learning engineer!', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have a great attitude and want to work with a high performing team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have strong experience in BERT, spaCy, and TensorFlow', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with a cross-functional team of machine learning engineers and OPs', '·\xa0\xa0Commercial experience developing machine learning and deep learning algorithms being put into production', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'THE BENEFITS', 'YOUR QUALIFICATIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop end to end AI and machine learning models', 'THE COMPANY', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Help innovate the way AI is used within the company', 'Please register your interest by sending your CV to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.', 'Data Science, Machine Learning, Information, Technology, Team Lead, Tech Lead, Software Engineering, Software Engineer, AI, Deep Learning, Robotics, NLP', 'A competitive base salary of $165,000 – $185,000 + amazing benefits', 'This is an opportunity for an innovate machine learning engineer to use their expertise in NLP to find trends around the world and identify major correlations on what will happen next. You will work in one of Worlds’ most innovative tech startups where they have captured the global capacity of supply chain relationships.. They have seen great success attracting clients and investors because of their completely unique commitment to machine learning in this domain.', 'This is a start-up supply chain risk company that is changing the way the marketplace reacts and interacts with fluxuations in the market due to phenomena, enterprise, and news. As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll find yourself working closely with both Data leaders and engineering teams and will enjoy the pace and innovation that runs through the company culture. For those ready for a start up environment, you’ll enjoy the perks that this company can offer you – I hope you bring a good sense of humor!', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer you will be required to:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fluency in Python, and ML/NLP Libraries', 'Senior Machine Learning Engineer (NLP)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0PhD or Master’s in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or Quantitative Fields']

['', ' Health Reimbursement Accounts', ' Extensive experience in cell biology, biochemistry, and/or molecular biology. This includes broad tissue culture expertise, biochemical assay technologies, and protein and RNA expression analysis.', ' Medical/Dental Plans Health Reimbursement Accounts Life and AD&D Insurance Short and Long Term Disability 401(k) with Company Match Paid Time off and Sick Days Paid Holidays Discounted Gym Membership', 'CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer', ' Life and AD&D Insurance', ' Expertise in flow cytometry (FACS) analysis of cell surface expression in cultured cells and isolated human or rodent primary cells.', 'Your Right to Work', ' The incumbent is expected to independently develop, perform, interpret, and troubleshoot a broad range of in vitro assays including immune cell profiling in blood and tissues, functional assays using primary cells such as T cells, NK cells and macrophages, cytokine profiling, as well as cytotoxicity/apoptosis assays using primary and/or cultured cells.', ' He/she is also expected to effectively present both internally at team and departmental meetings and externally to collaborators and scientific communities.', ' Great work/life balance', ' Experience in quantitative determination of cytokine levels using biochemical and molecular techniques including but not limited to ELISA, Western, and qPCR. Experience with multiplexed technologies is a plus.', ' Experience with small animal handling, drug administration, blood withdrawals, tissue collection, primary cell preparation is preferred.', ' 401(k) with Company Match', ' Communicate effectively at all levels, within teams, with internal and external collaborators. Strong organizational skills. Maintain research data and records with highest integrity. Ability to multitask in fast-paced environment.', ' Great work/life balance Growth Competitive Pay!', ' This hands-on position requires strong scientific training and laboratory skills in the immunology, immuno-oncology and oncology, as well as expertise in and dedication to innovative assay development and implementation. The incumbent is expected to independently develop, perform, interpret, and troubleshoot a broad range of in vitro assays including immune cell profiling in blood and tissues, functional assays using primary cells such as T cells, NK cells and macrophages, cytokine profiling, as well as cytotoxicity/apoptosis assays using primary and/or cultured cells. He/she will innovate and expand our assay portfolio by identifying, evaluating, and implementing new assay technologies through literature research, academic collaborations, and adaptation from other groups within the company. He/she is also expected to effectively present both internally at team and departmental meetings and externally to collaborators and scientific communities.', 'Email Your Resume In Word To', ' M.S. with over 3 years, or Ph.D. graduate with 0-3 years academic or industry experience in biological sciences, immunology, immuno-oncology or oncology.', ' Short and Long Term Disability', ' Discounted Gym Membership', ' Medical/Dental Plans', ' Growth', ' Competitive Pay!', ' Collaborative team player. Be flexible and prioritize tasks based on team and company goals.', ' Paid Holidays', ' Experience in isolating, culturing, and functionally characterizing subsets of immune cells from human or rodent blood and tissues is strongly desired.', ' Innovative and independent in experimental design, execution, and troubleshooting.', ' Experience in cell-based immunological assays, such as T cell activation, T cell and NK cell-mediated toxicity, macrophage phagocytosis, and immune cell differentiation, is preferred.', ' M.S. with over 3 years, or Ph.D. graduate with 0-3 years academic or industry experience in biological sciences, immunology, immuno-oncology or oncology. Extensive experience in cell biology, biochemistry, and/or molecular biology. This includes broad tissue culture expertise, biochemical assay technologies, and protein and RNA expression analysis. Expertise in flow cytometry (FACS) analysis of cell surface expression in cultured cells and isolated human or rodent primary cells. Experience in quantitative determination of cytokine levels using biochemical and molecular techniques including but not limited to ELISA, Western, and qPCR. Experience with multiplexed technologies is a plus. Experience in isolating, culturing, and functionally characterizing subsets of immune cells from human or rodent blood and tissues is strongly desired. Experience in cell-based immunological assays, such as T cell activation, T cell and NK cell-mediated toxicity, macrophage phagocytosis, and immune cell differentiation, is preferred. Experience with cell proliferation and killing assays, using a variety plate-reader-based and/or flow-based methodologies is preferred. Other preferred cellular skills include fluorescence microscopy, 3D cell culture, and primary tumor cell culture and characterization. Experience with small animal handling, drug administration, blood withdrawals, tissue collection, primary cell preparation is preferred. Innovative and independent in experimental design, execution, and troubleshooting. Collaborative team player. Be flexible and prioritize tasks based on team and company goals. Communicate effectively at all levels, within teams, with internal and external collaborators. Strong organizational skills. Maintain research data and records with highest integrity. Ability to multitask in fast-paced environment.', ' This hands-on position requires strong scientific training and laboratory skills in the immunology, immuno-oncology and oncology, as well as expertise in and dedication to innovative assay development and implementation.', ' He/she will innovate and expand our assay portfolio by identifying, evaluating, and implementing new assay technologies through literature research, academic collaborations, and adaptation from other groups within the company.', 'Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : AS3-ResearchScientistImmunooncology -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***', ' Experience with cell proliferation and killing assays, using a variety plate-reader-based and/or flow-based methodologies is preferred. Other preferred cellular skills include fluorescence microscopy, 3D cell culture, and primary tumor cell culture and characterization.', ' Paid Time off and Sick Days']

['', 'Experience designing and building statistical forecasting models.', 'Help define the analytical direction and influence the direction of the associated engineering and infrastructure work.', 'About The Job', '2 years of relevant work experience (e.g., as a data scientist) or equivalent. Analytical engagements outside class work while at school can be included.', 'Excellent problem-framing, problem-solving and project management skills.', ' Lead projects with hands-on analysis and modeling, drawing from multiple of analytical methods to choose the right tool and right level of complexity appropriate for the business challenges. Engage broadly with the organization to identify, prioritize, frame, and structure complex and ambiguous challenges, where advanced analytics projects or tools can have the biggest impact. Identify and communicate the challenges and opportunities that the group should be working on. Help define the analytical direction and influence the direction of the associated engineering and infrastructure work. Articulate business questions and use mathematical techniques to arrive at an answer using data. Translate analysis results into business recommendations. ', ' PhD in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Statistics or related field. 4 years of relevant work experience (e.g., as a data scientist), including experience applying advanced analytics to planning and infrastructure problems. Excellent customer service and team collaboration skills. ['', 'Application cover letterCurriculum VitaeList of publicationsShort research statement (max 4 pages)', 'PhD in Astronomy, or related field', 'Travel:', 'Application cover letter', 'Position Summary:', "Successful candidates will use data from SOFIA's suite of instruments, which do polarimetry, spectroscopy, and imaging in the mid- and far-infrared. They will also be encouraged to develop research ideas that utilize the SOFIA data archive.Applicants must have a Ph.D. in astronomy or a closely related field as well as previous experience in astronomical observing and/or modeling leading to publications in refereed journals. Experience in infrared observing and/or modeling is highly desirable but not required.Successful candidates may spend up to 20% of their time supporting the operation of the SOFIA observatory. Tasks may include (but are not limited to) reviewing proposals, analyzing calibration data, assessing instrument performance, planning and scheduling observations, representing SOFIA at conferences and workshops, and supporting in-flight observations.", 'Successful candidates may spend up to 20% of their time supporting the operation of the SOFIA observatory. Tasks may include (but are not limited to) reviewing proposals, analyzing calibration data, assessing instrument performance, planning and scheduling observations, representing SOFIA at conferences and workshops, and supporting in-flight observations.', 'Curriculum Vitae', 'Origins of Life: investigate the cosmic synthesis of molecules and particles necessary to create and sustain life; compile inventory of water and organics in protostars to understand chemical pathways from simple molecules to prebiotic species.', 'Evidence of potential for high level of achievement as an independent researcher.', 'Experience in astronomical programming (Python or similar).Evidence of potential for high level of achievement as an independent researcher.Ability to work as a team member to accomplish goals.', 'Essential Duties/Responsibilities:', "Evolution of Planetary Systems: infer the physical sizes, atmospheric structures, and chemical compositions of planets, comets, and asteroids; monitor temporal and spatial changes of planetary atmospheres in our Solar System as analogs to exoplanets; determine the molecular composition of comets as a possible source of the Earth's oceans and organics.", 'Experience with astronomical observing and/or modeling.', 'Working Conditions:', 'Good track record of publications in leading scientific journals.', 'Applicants must have a Ph.D. in astronomy or a closely related field as well as previous experience in astronomical observing and/or modeling leading to publications in refereed journals. Experience in infrared observing and/or modeling is highly desirable but not required.', 'www.usra.edu', 'Knowledge, Skills & Abilities: ', 'Education:', 'List of publications', "Successful candidates will use data from SOFIA's suite of instruments, which do polarimetry, spectroscopy, and imaging in the mid- and far-infrared. They will also be encouraged to develop research ideas that utilize the SOFIA data archive.", 'Experience:', 'Experience with astronomical observing and/or modeling.Good track record of publications in leading scientific journals.', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Birth of Stars and Planets: determine the role of magnetic fields, turbulence, and feedback in star and planet formation; determine the composition and dynamics of protoplanetary disks to trace water to habitable zones and determine disk masses.', 'Physics of the Distant Universe: calibrate high-redshift galaxies by detailed examination of nearby analogs, specifically, by measuring far-infrared lines and magnetic fields in local star forming regions, the galactic center, and nearby galaxies.', 'Experience in astronomical programming (Python or similar).', 'Ability to work as a team member to accomplish goals.', 'Short research statement (max 4 pages)', "Birth of Stars and Planets: determine the role of magnetic fields, turbulence, and feedback in star and planet formation; determine the composition and dynamics of protoplanetary disks to trace water to habitable zones and determine disk masses.Origins of Life: investigate the cosmic synthesis of molecules and particles necessary to create and sustain life; compile inventory of water and organics in protostars to understand chemical pathways from simple molecules to prebiotic species.Physics of the Distant Universe: calibrate high-redshift galaxies by detailed examination of nearby analogs, specifically, by measuring far-infrared lines and magnetic fields in local star forming regions, the galactic center, and nearby galaxies.Evolution of Planetary Systems: infer the physical sizes, atmospheric structures, and chemical compositions of planets, comets, and asteroids; monitor temporal and spatial changes of planetary atmospheres in our Solar System as analogs to exoplanets; determine the molecular composition of comets as a possible source of the Earth's oceans and organics."]

job_title: Cellular Biology Research Scientist, Genome Sciences
job_text: ['', 'Minimum Requirements', 'The Novartis Group of Companies are Equal Opportunity Employers and take pride in maintaining a diverse environment. We do not discriminate in recruitment, hiring, training, promotion or any other employment practices for reasons of race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation, marital or veteran status, disability, or any other legally protected status.', ' Experience with library preparation, amplification technologies and NGS', ' Contribute to medicinal chemistry drug discovery efforts using compounds and genetic reagents.', ' Experience with liquid handling robotics or other automation.', 'Job Description', 'Functional Area', 'Shift Work', 'Country', 'Company/Legal Entity', 'Employment Type', ' Organized & detail-oriented, and adept at troubleshooting.', ' Execute mid to large screens using various types of automation.', 'Work Location', ' Develop and implement emerging cutting-edge technologies for disease-relevant cellular and biochemical assays compatible with HTS.', ' Perform NGS library construction.', 'Division', ' Track record of innovation.', 'Business Unit', ' BS/MS with at least 5 years of technical experience or recent PhD in Cellular or Molecular Biology with no or minimal post-doc experience.', 'EEO Statement', 'Job Type', ' Maintain cell lines and culture of primary cells.', ' Ready to engage with multidisciplinary project teams to design, execute, and interpret experiments.', ' Proficiency in molecular, biochemical and cell biology techniques. May include Western Blots, transfection/transduction of multiple cellular models, gene expression analysis (RNA extraction, cDNA synthesis and rt-qPCR).', ' BS/MS with at least 5 years of technical experience or recent PhD in Cellular or Molecular Biology with no or minimal post-doc experience. Experience with liquid handling robotics or other automation. Proficiency in molecular, biochemical and cell biology techniques. May include Western Blots, transfection/transduction of multiple cellular models, gene expression analysis (RNA extraction, cDNA synthesis and rt-qPCR). Ready to engage with multidisciplinary project teams to design, execute, and interpret experiments. Organized & detail-oriented, and adept at troubleshooting. Track record of innovation.', ' Develop and implement emerging cutting-edge technologies for disease-relevant cellular and biochemical assays compatible with HTS. Contribute to medicinal chemistry drug discovery efforts using compounds and genetic reagents. Execute mid to large screens using various types of automation. Perform NGS library construction. Maintain cell lines and culture of primary cells.']
